name: Justin Lowder
text: Stopped coming here at night because been asked for money more times than I can count from people they let hang out around. I wouldn't recommend going here in general, but definitely not at night.

name: Ken Chris
text: Bathroom was filthy as usual and neither dispenser had soap. When I went to the counter to check out, I informed the lead (thick Caucasian female), she replies “yeah”. When I asked her were they out she replies “No, we have soap, just don’t have time to put it in”. Followed by her huffing as if it was an issue. Very unsanitary when there’s so much traffic at this location. How long does it take to change out the soap dispenser?

name: Stuart Smith
text: This is a very nice gas station. The parking lot is very roomy.

name: Dimja Shireen
text: I had to run a few errands in Charlotte about a week or two ago which is a total pain, as most of you know. Especially during rush hour, it’s absolute hell coming down 77 and Tryon Street area. To make things worse I heard a ding in my car and looked down to see that I was low on gas. Great, I thought. I pulled into this quick trip and although it was crowded, they were plenty of spaces for me to pull into. While filling up a decided to go inside to grab a snack and a soda. As soon as I walked through the door, my presence was announced with glee by the staff member behind the register. I felt so welcomed And I even asked if I needed any help. I asked where the sodas work, and they pointed me in the right direction. I know it’s not a huge deal, but I definitely appreciate feeling welcomed in places that I’ve never been before. I grabbed my snack, grabbed my soda, filled my tank up, and left happier than I came in. That’s always a great sign. Thank you Quiktrip for hiring great people and always having a great selection of snacks available for daily drivers like me. I cannot wait to visit this location again. Thank you so much.

name: Tal Kelsey
text: Every single time I have been to this QT, panhandlers have been outside loitering around all of the entrances. They are either begging or trying to sell you something. It does not seem to be a safe location, as it is a popular hangout spot for homeless people. Their Air Pump machine is broken.

name: Joseph Karzennofftheller
text: An easy place to fill up and get a quick bit to eat.

name: A.F. James MacArthur
text:
Love this brand and have become used to their high standards. Maybe on this particular visit on this particular day at this particular location they were having an off day.

Went to the men's room to wash my hands, they were out of soap. Bought a salad, there was no salad dressing left. Looked for a fork to eat my salad with, nothing but spoons in the whole store. Staff told me they were all out of forks.

Only reason this isn't a single star is because staff were exceptionally friendly and pleasant.

name: alan Madrid
text: The cooks talk a lot.  they take a long time to prepare the food👎

name: Jim Rasmussen
text: It'll be a Solid 5 Stars if it weren't for the panhandlers in the parking lot

name: Ellen Blalock
text: Always so clean and great service. Love QT!

name: TyLan Witherspoon
text: I love these stores

name: Samuel Garcia
text: Great customer service

name: Marc Norman
text: The last 5 times I've been here the coffee machines are either out of order or empty not a great experience

text: The fish was mushy, but the shrimp were huge & tasty. The coleslaw was not good at all. It had a strange taste unlike any coleslaw I've had before. On top of that, it tasted like it was full of onions.

name: Patrick George
text: Fresh fish cooked while you wait and served on white bread hot! It's the real deal.

text: That's some fresh fish right there! Keep it up guys!

text: So this was a huge let down. I put in the address and it took me to a commercial kitchen…. No food trucks here. Get your Google maps up to date please.

name: Juan Ceron
text: Was excited to try the Greek Chicken Salad, but they ran out of chicken. I stood at the window and no one greeted me for a while. I had to ask if I could order. Employees worked slowly and during the rush one was on the phone in the front of the truck. No sense of urgency.

resp.text: So sorry to hear that Juan :( We pride ourselves in our service so 100% need to make it up to you!  Can you shoot us an email at info@freshmedclt.com and we’ll figure out a way to make this up?  We truely appreciate your business.

name: Ryan Dearth
text: Great food, great service. One of the best food trucks in Charlotte area. And I got utensils and a napkin. Food is certainly fresh.

resp.text: Thank you Ryan!  Keep checking us out :)

name: Kristen Gore
text: I am Spartacus! Also, ignore that jackwagon who have the 2 star review. He probably wants glue. Food is great. Service is great. Med is fresh.

resp.text: Appreciate the feedback Kristen!  Thanks so much and keep on visiting us for the Sparty :)

name: Kristen Gore
text: I am Spartacus! Also, ignore that jackwagon who have the 2 star review. He probably wants glue. Food is great. Service is great. Med is fresh.

resp.text: Appreciate the feedback Kristen!  Thanks so much and keep on visiting us for the Sparty :)

name: Scott C. Reed
text: We tried many items and found them all to be very good.  The speed of service from a food truck was really good compared to others.  I think this is a legit truck that I want to see around.

name: Ryan Dearth
text: Great food, great service. One of the best food trucks in Charlotte area. And I got utensils and a napkin. Food is certainly fresh.

resp.text: Thank you Ryan!  Keep checking us out :)

name: Skye Compton
text: Awesome food! Great service and very friendly staff. They can customize to your liking and they're super fast.

name: Emily Abernathy
text: Your driver almost killed me and the baby in my car today. They switched lanes while I was right beside them, causing me to go up onto the curb while laying on my horn. Not a great representation of your business.

resp.text: Emily we are so sorry about what you have experienced.  We try our best to make sure we are driving on main roads in order to have space for our fellow drivers.  I'd love to hear more and if you could reach out to info@freshmedclt.com hopefully we can resolve this issue.

name: Chris Williams
text: Best Chicken Pita I've ever had!

name: Steven Kotsokalis
text: Great Mediterranean food! Highly recommend

resp.text: Thank you Steven, can't wait till your next visit!

name: Mike Haberman
text: Unbelievable fettucini alfredo balls...with BACON!!! Lamb butger on Naan, yes please. Friendly courteous staff that brings me food and I don't have to leave my beer. I love Thursdays, Kit's Trackside Crafts and Fresh Med food truck a divine pairing.

resp.text: Awesome Mike!!! We love being there on Thursdays, great place, awesome people and we'll keep providing the bomb food!

name: Emily Abernathy
text: Your driver almost killed me and the baby in my car today. They switched lanes while I was right beside them, causing me to go up onto the curb while laying on my horn. Not a great representation of your business.

resp.text: Emily we are so sorry about what you have experienced.  We try our best to make sure we are driving on main roads in order to have space for our fellow drivers.  I'd love to hear more and if you could reach out to info@freshmedclt.com hopefully we can resolve this issue.

name: Richie N
text: Fresh TASTY Fast FILLING! Nap time :-)

resp.text: Thanks Richie!  We appreciate your FRESH feedback :)

name: Katerina Rivera
text: Love!! The ceviche was amazing! Especially with their plantain chips and garlic sauce. Menu has a variety of dishes representing a number of Latin countries. Stay away from the sangria, but the mixed drinks were good. The location is small but the decor is nice and the music is on point. Overall a great experience!!!

name: Angela Moretto
text: So good!!!! Were from south Florida and it's so hard to find good Cuban and Peruvian food up here in NC. The food is so beyond delicious. You can tell the head chef really loves what they are doing. You can taste it in the food.

name: ss karup
text:
Delicious meal with great service!  Taylor, our server, was very accommodating on our first visit to a new spot in Plaza Midwood.  Tried several of the most popular dishes- the Cuban
Rice was our favorite. Being a Tampa girl, loved seeing the Tampa Cuban and salad named after The Columbia Restaurant;)

name: F G
text: An AMAZING experience from start to finish. Truly delicious ceviche and entrees. Jenny from the block is service personified. So funny, knowledgeable and personable. Loved loved loved this dining experieence

name: Mindy Donovan
text: Best tuna I have ever eaten. SO delicious.

name: Gabrielle McCarthy
text: We tried Calle Sol for the first time last night. It’s been getting a lot of hype, which always makes me suspicious, however, it was worth the hype! The cocktails were delicious and not overly sweet. The ceviche was fresh and delicious. The entrees were creative yet true to the cuisine. We will be back!

name: Stephanie Burgdofer
text: The experience was fantastic. Staff was friendly and the food was authentic and delicious.

name: Wesley Barr
text: Oh man, where to begin… The food and staff are amazing. 10/10 drinks and the best Cuban food in Charlotte

name: Ms. Pilar
text: What can I say! It is not authentic Cuban or Peruvian food. However for the Charlotte Plaza Midwood area it works I guess. The decor is absolutely beautiful inside and has this nice vibe which I can respect. I ordered a Mojito and it was terrible. I ordered the souvenir drink and no souvenir cup to take. Drinks were more ice than actual drink, but I guess I should have expected that. For my food I ordered the Vaca Frita and there was alot of vaca, but the flavor wasn't fully there. Additionally, I ordered the Cuban Fried Rice and the lechon had barely any flavor. Overall, I spent $100 and I felt I could have kept $85 of it. I did like my Ceviche wasn't authentic, but was delicious. It was the best part of my meal. Lastly, get some Jupina please.

name: Pame Martinez
text:
Amazing flavors in both of
the dishes I ordered loved the shrimp!!!  Also loved  the take out window so convenient!
Friendly staff.
Definitely going back!

name: Courtney V
text: Really enjoyed the overall experience here! Giving 5 stars for the staff and for how fast our food came out. Everything was very quick and tasty! A lot of good flavors and offered a “house” hot sauce as well that added SO much more to each dish we ordered! I will say we did wait a little while to be greeted while sitting at the bar while there was two bartenders, which I can’t say I was a big fan of but it was good. The drinks we had were tasty too! I would say this is a great spot for quick food with different flavors and a little added spice. The peaches and cake was also delicious. Overall I don’t see the food as very high quality but again, quick eats with good flavors. Would return!

name: Riko Range
text: Omg! I am coming back for sure for the ceviche! Their selections are incredible. Food was very tasteful, Drinks were delicious and service was the best I have had. I’m so happy I found this place!!! Make sure you order the guava dessert it’s so good!

name: J D
text:
What a cool place! My friend and I got the Miami and Tampa cubans, with plantains, they were great!
Good location, thankfully we found some parking a block away. Nice customer service, and atmosphere was enjoyable. Will return.

name: Kai Cianflone
text: One of the best places in Charlotte

name: Enrique Rosende
text: As far as authentic Cuban, it was a complete miss.   As a Cuban born Miami raised and currently living in Charlotte, I was very disappointed.   The one positive was our server, cool beans.  My daughter also has a huge issue with the cultural misappropriation of the "ventanita"

name: Michelle Hawkins
text: Ordered (to go) the Miami Cubano Sandwich & Mojo Fries.  I would give 10 stars!! I believe the best Cuban sandwich I’ve ever had. Super flavorful and the fries were sooo good! And everything was fresh & hot when I picked up, which is a huge plus! Will absolutely get this again!

name: Michael Abadi
text: Authentic ceviche, innovative menu, good service. Will likely have more items in a few weeks time. Only negative coment is lack of parking in the neighborhood

name: Chuck Pleasant
text:
I've eaten here twice and enjoyed both experiences.
I particularly like their Chino-Latino menu.

name: Micah Darte
text: Great food, atmosphere, and menu. Had the Tampa Cuban, ceviche, and lo mein, all very good. Will be back soon.

name: Daniel Jackson
text: Great food and great service.  Drink menu is very nice as well.

name: Krystal Hall
text: What wonderful peruvian food!! The 6 of use also ordered take out because it was so good. Ceviche perfecto! Pork fabulouso! Must make reservation. Only advice would be to improve the mixed drinks.

name: Sara Sheppard
text: Outstanding cuban/peruvian style food in the old penguin spot. We ordered the plantain chips appetizer / cuban bread and butter, the 1205 salad with the sherry vinegarette, Tallerin with shrimp, the tampa cuban sandwich, and cuban fried rice. When I say everything was fantastic, please consider that an understatement. Usually within the first week of a restaurant opening, there are some understandable growing pains, but that’s not true at all for our experience. The service was friendly, the food was flavorful/well seasoned/unique and authentic in the best kind of way and made with so very much love, the prices are almost too good to be true for quantity and location, and the manager is a gem! She was very in control and went around to touch every table, she asked us what we would change if we could and that’s such a powerful and appreciated question. I wish I had a better answer for her! Everything was just too darn good! We will be back and we will be telling everyone how great our experience was! Ps) must orders: the tallerin and cuban fried rice. salad was noteworthy as well!!

name: Kesh
text:
Excellent service ! Food was great, very tasty and huge portions !
Recommend the Aji Amarillo Ceviche, Bread & Butter, Lechon Asado, Empanizado and Guava Maria !

name: Alexandra R
text: The type of restaurant Charlotte has been missing! Amazing food, friendly staff, good prices, and an all around cultural experience.

name: Alex Benz
text: Great atmosphere, amazing service and delicious food.

name: Bailey Coggins
text: 5 stars all around!

name: Jamar Caldwell
text: Phenomenal food and service!

name: Shane Shaffer
text: Great service as well as food!!!

name: Bobby Price
text: Amazing food,  wonderful staff

name: Sidney Forrest
text: Loved it

name: Ed Morris
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent Cuban sandwich!

(Original)
Excellent Cubano sandwich!

name: Mike Bifulco
text: No frills, solid Italian pizza place. By-the-slice and ready to eat, or get a whole pie. Tasty!

name: David Stollmack
text: Thank goodness they finally opened. Best pizza in Charlotte now conveniently located on Park Road. They’re even doing slices. This place is hopping and pretty soon they’ll need valet parking

resp.text: David it is always a joy seeing you. You keep us on our toes and that's what we need sometimes.

name: Susanne Robicsek
text: Sal's isn't just pizza.  I mean, the pizza is great, but the Italian dishes at Sal's are also good. Everything I have tried has been great, but I have a hard time staying away from their eggplant parm. Thinnly sliced and layered with cheese and a really nice tomato sauce.  I love it.  Everything is cooked fresh and it really tastes homemade. Hat tip to the staff too.  They are super nice, and do a great job making you feel valued as a customer. This is a great addition to Dilworth.

resp.text: Thank you Susanne. We always look forward to seeing you come in! Eggplant for life!

name: Brian Pizzuti
text: Simply the best pizza in town and I've been in Charlotte since 86'.

resp.text: That QC local love is oh so sweet.

name: Brian Pizzuti
text: Simply the best pizza in town and I've been in Charlotte since 86'.

resp.text: That QC local love is oh so sweet.

name: Robert Weil
text: Love being able to grab a slice in the neighborhood, food and service are just as good as the original

resp.text: Thank you! Being in Dilworrh is something special. We love it over here!

name: David Williams
text: Great pizza and service

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words!
Thank you Bill
Appreciate that!

name: Sarah Lynch Allred
text: Truffle fries are amazing! Wings are good. Mac and cheese bites, wow! Solid place! Pool tables! Small and homey!

name: Christopher “CJ” Matarese
text: On Friday they serve there Prime Rib Sandwich, order your ample portion cooked the way you like it. Served with hand cut seasoned curly fries or traditional cut, comes with two types of delicious dipping sauces, on golden grilled roll. They sometimes sellout during the lunch shift. So if you're going to go there in the evening hours maybe shoot a round of billiards with an ice cold brew. Call and reserve your grinder. You'll won't be disappointed, great time

name: Mike Nottingham
text: Philly steak and cheese! Next week Prime rib sub. The wings are excellent!! Give them a try bet you will go back, I know I will.

name: Lin Mitchell
text: Have always loved Whooli's!  The food is great!  They now have a full bar as well.

name: Mary Seely
text: Great from scratch food topped only by their great & friendly service.  Best Buffalo wings south of NY.

name: Joe Steinkamp
text: A great watering hole for lunch or dinner. Staff is very friendly and they remember their regulars. I generally get the wings and just about anything fried here. burgers are good and sandwiches are large if you get the larger size. Beer on tap, if you are looking for a large variety seek out a tavern, and a pool table is waiting for you if you are into a relaxing game. Complementary peanuts in the evenings are good to munch on until your onion rings arrive! i frequent this place often. but it is hard to find if you don't know the area well. I know because a few uber and lyft drivers have been confused by the location.

name: Kathryn Middleton
text: Great food and drinks, best wings, play pool or chat with friends. Been coming here for years, come join us!

name: Shannon Chapman
text: I will always come here for the amazing wings and the shrimp are one of my favs too. The atmosphere is always pretty chill and staff always friendly and it's always a nice visit.

name: Brett Bixby
text: Their wings are very good. Love the sauce!

name: Jason Cohen
text: New ownership dont bother you can get ignored anywhere for less money. New owners know nothing about customer service or the hospitality business hope they wise up and sell to someone who knows whats going on. It used to be a great little bar hate to see it die like this

name: Jack Stutts
text: The best Cuban sandwich in Charlotte. Friendly people, lively atmosphere.

name: Landon Collins
text: Great hangout spot..  Awesome staff friendly clientele..

name: Anne Bowen
text: Awesome food! Everything is good my top picks are homemade soup French dip sandwich and whooli's special.

name: Jeffrey Cutrell
text: This place has the best hamburger ever and the service was excellent!

name: Catherine Robinette
text: My favorite little bar! Great service, great beer and OMG the wings are amazing!

name: bBrian M
text: Used to be a better place to visit when Guy owned it. The new people are slow with food and not the same quality it used to be. Waited an hour for a lunch check order for four people,even after calling it in ahead of time.

name: jaqwonna brooks
text: Food was really good. Not to fond of the "whooli sauce" but I still ate it. Philly steak and cheese was really good. The cooks seemed a bit racist but the cashier lady was nice. For a cheese steak, 6 wings, and a corona came up to $22 not a crowded place for lunch. they only serve food during certain hours of the day so make sure you call first. I would recommend atleast trying it if you're in the area. Check out pics above all see food

name: Adam Bernas
text: Bartenders don't come to tables. Flies are bothersome. Whooli's burger is hugh & tasty, saved the experience...

name: Caleb Upton
text: Best wings in Charlotte and they always cook them how I like them (well done) unique atmosphere and friendly smiling staff.

name: Kevin McGuire
text:
Great wings and friendly service!
Still the Best wings anywhere!!

name: Amy Baker
text: I'm forever in love with the wings! Also, those cheese fried Mac and cheese balls are AMAZINGGGG!

name: Ashley McMillan
text: Great bar,great service, and nice people

name: Johnny Gaither
text: 2 words: 'Whooli's Special' - the BEST hoagie in Charlotte.  Shiner Bock on draft doesn't hurt either ;-)

name: Zak B
text: Awesome food with awesome service!!!

name: Robert Ochoa
text: Love the Whooli's special, it's been the same special for over 15 years!

name: Stephen Hughes
text: We order quite frequently for office lunches. Food is delicious.

name: TA Fowler
text: Their wings drenched in the whooli sauce are amazing

name: Stephana Nesbit
text: Food and,service is good

name: Brad Wilson
text: Great food,  love the owners!

name: Evelyn
text: Great Food! & service

name: pete toomey
text: Great food, great people!

name: Freddy Lee
text: Love me some whoolis

name: Dave Brown
text: Didn't have buffalo wings

name: Nico Bach
text: Great food.

name: Mitchell Jones
text: Whooli's is closed for business.

name: Larry Hathcock
text: Delish¡!!!!!¡

name: Choc Da Bartender
text: It's always a great experience with Boss women of Charlotte! Come check it out for yourself. Missing Iesha!

name: Lance Holmes
text: This is strictly for grown folks Janae was great and very tentative to our needs super hospitable just a great place to go relax on a Friday or Saturday and not worry about the Riff Raff and enjoy yourself! Definitely will be one of my go-to spots for grown folks relaxation!

name: Shawn Boyd
text: Nice ambiance. Really liked the back open porch

name: Reba Davis
text: It will get better. Nice place to go chill.

name: Twanna Smith
text: It was okay Captain needs it's all right

name: STEPHANIE H
text: Janae is the best!! Great atmosphere, pool tables & great music!!

name: Precious Johnson
text: Its definitely for the 30 and over crowd

name: Wendall Thompson
text: Lit👍🏿

name: Nick McDougal
text: A slow cook

name: Krishna Kishore Kandi
text: Tasty Biryani ... Very clean and friendly staff .

name: Mir Masood Ali
text: Nice!! "Combo 3 Non veg" with chicken 65 and chicken curry with Naan, Rice in $8 and taste is very good.

name: Diane DL
text: Excellent selection for lunch. Attentive servers who help you if you are not sure what to order. Their vegetarian offerings are delicious. Do try the Masala Chai...savor...it's that good.

name: David Knott
text: Always quick and tasty, this Indian to-go shop seems to start running out of dishes around 1:30. Prepared cafeteria style service is complemented by a stark but clean and modern dining area.

name: Stephanie Allen
text: I've had much better in VS. I kept getting bone fragments in my mouth.

resp.text:
Dear Stephanie Allen,

Thanks for taking time to rate us. Your feedback is important to us as a small business we are dependent on our customers feedback to help us improve. We would be very thankful if you could tell us why we could not meet your expectation today you can write to us at persischarlotte@gmail.com.

Thanks Again,
Team@ Persis Cafe

name: Arya Offer
text: If you are craving for Indian food in gateway village, you cant avoid Persis Cafe which serves delicious biryani. It's like a hot spot for lunch for people in gateway village area. if you are downtown Charlotte, don't forget to dine here for a good Indian biryani experience.

name: Vinay Kumar
text: One of the good Indian restaurants

name: Mehul Shah
text: Good Indian food.

name: orlando hawkins
text: Exelent service thank

name: Sanil VelappanNair
text: Indian buffet was good

name: Watchthisvideo
text: Good Indian food

name: Leonardo Scarpati
text: This is a family owned rotisserie chicken place. One of the best rotisserie chicken places in Charlotte. This is El Salvadoran chicken and it doesn't disappoint. I ordered a 4 piece chicken plate with 2 sides and my wife ordered the chicken quesadilla. Generous portions and affordable. We will definitely be back!

name: Ben Airing
text: Amazing roasted chicken!

name: uticax
text: Food was super fresh, made to order quick. Good portion sizes, for the prices. Staff was friendly and accommodating. Restaurant was clean and cozy.

name: WILLIAM MAYOR
text: NICE EXCELLENT PRICE AND DELICIOUS FOOD

name: Joshua Fernandez
text: I love this place. I haven't tried a single thing there that wasn't delicious. Try the torta sandwich!

name: oneyda reyes
text:
My new favorite place to eat!
Good service,

name: Recetas Deliciosas Con Santos Viva
text:
(Translated by Google) Very rich excellent Latin flavor.
At last we will find a delicious chicken in Charlotte blessings and successes.

(Original)
Muy rico excelente sabor latino .
Por fin encontraremos  un rico pollo en Charlotte  bendiciones y éxitos  .

name: Yvette Rivera
text:
(Translated by Google) Very tasty

(Original)
Muy sabroso

name: Toccara Martin
text: Delivered a load to the warehouse. Staff was really friendly.  It was a rather long wait. My appt was at 1130am and I arrived at 1045am. I signed in and waited in their yard. I didn't get a phone call until 12:50 pm and they finished unloading me by 2pm. So roughly 3 hours.  It was a Friday and the young lady unloading my trailer didnt even get a chance to eat lunch so I was grateful and 3 hours isnt  as bad as 6 or 9 hours!

name: Ary Wright

text: I order a chicken ranch sandwich to go. I don't know what kind of sandwich I got.  No ranch, large chunks of chicken tenders, Ham cheese and pizza sauce. They didn't wrap it up just put tin foil over it, it was cold by the time a got home. I was only person in there. I won't be going back

name: Jessica Barbour
text:
I don't know what has happened to this location but my last experience with them was the icing on the cake.

First, it took TWO hours to get our pizza and after calling THREE times to see what the hold up was they finally offered us 25% off (which never showed on my credit card statement by the way).  I was satisfied at the time because I just wanted it to get there already.

Second, the pizzas finally arrive and are cold and the middle wasn't even cooked all the way through.

Third, I call the following week and the new GM tells me to wait it out on the 25% refund,  it will show, it never did.  She says to come into the restaurant if I want to get it resolved.  Who has time for that?!

At this point I just want to spread the word that you shouldn't waste your time ordering from Fuel in Park Road Shopping Center.  I won't waste my time getting my $48 back but I will waste my time writing this review to save others the hassle of a bad experience.

text: Just ate here for the 1st time tonight for my B-day. It was delicious!! My wife and I both had the Tres Primo (Three Cousins) dinner. It has a little pico salad, guacamole, chicken, bacon wrapped shrimp, skirt steak (with a scallion), a light rice and beans. It comes with corn tortillas as well. They were thicker than what I'm used to. We both left good and full. The staff were very friendly. We will definitely be back!

name: Leslie Smith
text: Ana, the owner, couldn't have been any nicer! I settled on seafood and she suggested Fillete Relleno de Mariscos (#55). WOW!  This was perfect! The tilapia was very lightly coated and fried but not heavy, battered or oily. We all know you risk rubber ordering calamari. No rubber! Two fried tilapia fillets with the calamari served between. Easily 2 meals and I'm a "good eater." The sauteed veggies and rice were also, cooked just right and would have been a great vegetarian meal on it's own. My friend ordered the pupusa moroco con queso. I've found pupusas heavy before but these were a really good. Great food, clean restaurant,  and nice people! Saving this one.

name: Brett Daviau
text: Good vegan food stand. Order at the counter, eat outside. Chickpea pancakes and rainbow toast are good.

name: Erin S.
text:
We went to Plant Joy at Camp North End at 8:30 on a Friday night. They were out of some things, like the Mershroom Croissant, so make sure you go on the earlier side. Everything at Plant Joy is vegan.

We split between 3 people. It was a good amount of food. Here’s what we got:
- Rainbow Toast ($6): 3 different hummuses on toast with a Brussels sprout and some pickled onions. Good.
- Falafel Tower ($15): Falafel nachos with pita chips. There wasn’t enough falafel for the amount of pita chips.
- Nice Caesar ($15): Super good. Good portion.
- Grilled Greens ($11): Good, but kind of expensive for just a sandwich.

Everything was super good! It was very nice to have a fully vegan option.

name: Sylvia Abney
text: The food is fantastic, you won't regret a visit to Plant Joy. The Yam and Cheese sandwich was savory and satisfying, and don't get me started on the rainbow toast. If the food wasn't good enough, the presentation is impeccable. You can also pick up a Nourish premade meal to take home with you - you're welcome.

name: Devian Nikei
text: I got to visit Plant Joy! It's a great food stand with very polite staff. The food was very flavorful. My friend and I made a sammy sampler and tried The Greens Sammy (my favorite) The Yam and Cheese sammy and The Mershroom sammy. I was struck by their menu which had a pay what you can plate and stated food is a human right. I just love that. I can appreciate a place that shows humans the same compassion as animals. I give 4 stars because they were out of some things I wanted to order. The Mershroom sammy that we ordered had a very heavy pickled flavor that just didn't quite set with my palate but my friend  did like it so that's just me. If you're looking for a great vegan treat I would recommend.

name: Satya Jvala
text:
I can't say enough amazing things about Plant Joy. I have now tried everything on the menu and have a very hard time deciding what to order each time I go. Everything is so fresh and I don't ever feel weighed down or groggy like I would after eating at a lot of restaurants. You can tell that they really care about their ingredients.

The staff is incredible, attentive and kind. I really can't say enough good things.

name: James Bullard
text:
I went completely overboard at this beautiful, colorful, healthy meal break from a hectic day.  The rainbow toast was GORGEOUS--flavorful, bursting with color and texture.  While waiting in line, I was tempted by the sweets (shocker), so I had a GF pumpkin/oatmeal whoopie pie while I waited for my polenta fattoush (?!?!) to be prepared.  Unreal.  The spicing, the mixtures of tart, grease, and green exploded on my taste buds.  I'm an animal protein kinda guy--I usually walk right on by anything with a vegan label.  SO glad I found this place so I can get outta my cramped little box and try these INCREDIBLE combinations, finding new tastes and experiences I love so much.

Not only was the cuisine outstanding, the customer service was exceptional.  Personable, knowledgeable, professional.  I was thoroughly impressed with this experience from every angle.  Thank you, Plant Joy for this glorious new venue!

name: jackie rubino
text: 3 of us went for the first time last night..it will definitely be the first of many times! The Rainbow 🌈 platter was amazing and perfect for us to share! Also, the staff were wonderful..super friendly! Highly recommend!!!

name: Abbie Kiefer
text: If I could eat this every day for the rest of my life I 1000000% would. Everything they make and I mean EVERYTHING is insanely good. Also the workers there are some of the nicest people!!! And my doggies are obsessed with their doggie treats a fun bonus. Love love love Plant Joy!

name: #1man1year150
text:
We loved loved loved it!

We got the falafel tower and Socca and salad dishes. We didn't know what to expect because we haven't heard of the place yet and happened to be going to the van gogh exhibit and being vegan, it's tougher finding a place to eat out so thankfully we have places like this popping up.

It's a walk-up window and super friendly service, combined with how good the food was gives this an easy 5 stars. Places to sit all around too.

We want to come back and try more!

name: Greg Searle
text:
Great food and amazing place. A must if you are in the Charlotte area and looking for great healthy and delicious food. The staff is super friendly and helpful if you are needing help picking from there menu.
Tried the Falafel Tower and would differently get that again. Great mixture of flavors that blend so well together that your tastes buds jump fr joy!
I will be back!!

name: Mickey Nash
text: Everything I've eaten is indescribably delicious, and everyone I've interacted with behind the counter had been wonderful. Grilled Greens is possibly the best sandwich I've ever had, no exceptions. The hot chocolate is... I don't know, there really aren't words-- nectar of the gods seems pithy, but it really wouldn't be inappropriate. Also, free house-made dog treats for the puppers!

name: Michelle Jackson
text: The food was delicious! The service was top notch quality. The owners are friendly, polite, knowledgeable and just awesome.

name: Allie Nelson
text: As a long time fan of Nourish I was SO excited to hear about plant Joy's opening. Their menu is fresh, colorful, and delicious! I cannot recommend the falafel tower enough. I have also tried the grilled greens which were delicious.

name: Lura Dean
text: I wish I could review more options but I can't stop ordering the grilled greens sandwhich.  Ive never had a sandwhich as delishous as this one.  I literally dream of it daily haha

name: Megan Tafoya
text: The falafel tower was amazing. I could eat it every day. Can't wait to go back.

name: vince feliciano
text: Awesome food here... If your vegan, everything is excellent

name: Damon Hemmerdinger
text: I'm so happy that there's another healthy and delicious food option in the North End. If you've never had good vegan food, don't be scared by the label --- it's so good!

name: kristin climer
text: This place was delicious. Loved the falafel tower and the grilled greens sandwich. The falafel tower is enough for 2 but it's so good you wint want to share! The sesame kale is yummy. I am not a vegetarian but I love finding good comforting meat free places and this is one!

name: Nick Cash
text: Plant Joy was amazing!! Very helpful staff and delicious food!!!

name: Max R
text: Grilled greens and halva hot chocolate are incredible

name: Al D
text: Good food

name: Kawaii Mom
text: I got the Yam & Cheese and a Strawberry Lavender juice...omg what a combination 🌞 #HappySummerdays

name: Emmanuel Connor
text: The FLAVORS in the foods will make your taste buds explode! I will definitely be back for the all can eat jerk chicken. This place really stands out compared to the other Caribbean places I've been to. I got the brown stew chicken it came with red bean rice and curry vegetables and I got the jerk ribs which came with curry vegetables and red bean rice I also got a small side of Mac and cheese and plantains. I had to try their hot jerk sauce with my ribs, it as some kick to it but it's not an overbearing hotness.

name: Teasapooh Thomas
text: I went today for first time my daughter and I. Food was delicious.  Big plates, friendly staff and big restaurant.  Would definitely go back.

name: phatnjuicey alldatime
text: Went there for the 1st and last time... the line workers are unaware of what prices are.. We spent $32..on dry ribs..they don't give enough for the prices.. I guess Sunday is the best day Buffet$19.99 so you can taste and throw away what you don't like...wow...

name: Kelle Pressley
text: The food is exploding with flavor. Not overpowering at all. The lunch special was perfect for my 'Hide in the car meals'.  Just look at the menu.....they are the real deal!!! The family is from Brooklyn and they have some of the best hospitality! Oh, the location is the former Broderick's BBQ spot. Which is very convenient to the interstate! Ya'll better get Ya'll self some good hot food! I'm definitely going back!

name: Margaret Brunston
text: Food was delicious very friendly service;but was not given full vegetable servings.Restaurant was too hot to sit down inside. Serving area was narrow.Grill outside.

name: 1 Pushing Forward
text: The food looks DELISH! Im a food delivery driver and the staff are always very pleasant to me! Good customer service goes a long way! Way to go!

name: Debora White
text: This place is closed. However,  2hen this restaurant was open the food was ok. They left the food out until it was to hard and dry. Restaurant had a horrible odor...plus not that clean.

name: Kenya Cunningham
text:
I did not enjoy this food at all! I don't know if it was the seasoning, but the cabbage was over cooked, the oxtails were bland. I will not go back.
Plus it's overly price. The staff was very nice,

name: Julien St. Aubin
text: I'm from Albany/Brooklyn NY originally, and have an excellent gauge as to what I should expect. The fried plaintains, curry goat flavor, and brown stew chicken are good but mild on savory level(goat is skimpy, fatty, and bony as usual. Jerk chicken is delicious grilled chicken. It is nowhere close to authentic jerk chicken and has almost no heat/spice level on top of that... So if you want tasty chargrilled Jamaican spice accented chicken, go for it. But it's dry and not Jerk chicken. The ribs tender, and great, but got baby Ray's when I ordered NC sauce. Anyway ribs aren't an island item so it doesn't apply. The beef patty was one of the most delicious patties I've ever had... Perfect spicyness level, no grizzle. Some may complain not enough beef but it was filled with deliciousness, I'll take that over Walmart grizzle. I have no complaints here on the amazing beef patty.

name: HaitianBeauty Kim
text: Food bland. Mac & cheese I don’t even know where to start.... No flavor - lack of seasoning... food looked dried out... smh.. waste of money

name: Covia Boyd
text: Be prepared to spend $12.50 for the small plate. Good taste, though.

name: DO Moore
text: For $16.50 I expected to get more than 2 very small ox tails. They were more like the very tip of the tail. The majority of the meat was neckbones and it was very little considering the overpriced rip off I recieved. I will not be ordering thr ox tails again. However the Jerk Chicken was great.

name: Joron Howey
text: Great food friendly staff good proportions of food

name: Mezzanne Satterwhite
text: I'm so happy they opened.

name: Dae McDowell
text: It's not Bodricks its Cocoas now and its damn good!

name: Latina Jordan
text: Everything I try is delicious 💜

name: Darlene Timmons
text: It doesn't look like the pictures that's for sure.

name: Marvin Guinyard
text: Food was good.

name: C C GREEN
text: Didn't have all items on menu

name: Kwame Scott
text: Even  though I had to wait for the oxtails, it was worth it.

name: Seun Matthias
text: Terrible food and cooks.

name: Donald Rozzi
text: Not to bad

name: Victoria Duncan
text: Good oxtails

name: Sherman Hampton
text: Good

name: Anthony Little
text: Amazing

name: Kristin Hill
text:
I've been here several times.  The food is pretty good. My favorite item is the fried pork chop.
The lemonade is also delicious.
The employees are very friendly and that's the main reason I keep going back.

name: Rachelle Oluyede
text: Food is delicious. Fresh, and taste like it's prepared with love. The staff is outstanding and will help you decide if you have questions. The meatloaf was so moist and the yams are tender and sweet.

name: Tameka Michelle
text:
This spot just recently opened its second location on N. Tryon so I decided to check it out.

I usually order online when possible for convenience when grabbing a to go meal and that's what I did here. After placing my order I received a called about 10 minutes later stating that 2 of the items I ordered were not available. Which were wings and wedges I mainly went for the wings so I asked to cancel. For some reason I was not able to have my order cancelled. They suggested I come the next day to get my order. I did just that. This was a big inconvenience it would be so much easier if they were able to update out of stock items on their ordering site.

I was able to eventually get my meal the next day and the food was really good. I enjoyed everything the Mac n cheese was flavored just right. The wings were crispy and tasty. The candied sweet potatoes were also good.

I'd probably return in the future but just order in per

name: BRENDA DAYS
text: Great variety on menu, my mother loved her food and said this is her resturant of choice.    I thought food could have used a little more salt and pepper.   The wings were excellent, yams were good and banana pudding was fresh and tasty.  I will go back.

name: Trisa Pickett
text: The food is good at both locations. HOWEVER the apple or peach pie is ALWAYS full of crust. I've had to take it back four times. So I will never order dessert from here again.

name: Marcus Mason
text: Good food. A lil salty on the smothered pork chops but the meatloaf was decent. Mash potatoes are instant. Veggies are good. Still not Queen's Soul Food

name: Vanessa Tolbert
text: Beautiful Wedding Venue complete with extravagant decorations and really great food!!! They finally have a 2nd location in the University!!! They are hiring and will have a grand opening in 1 week

name: Mary McNeely
text: I was on my way to Walmart when I discovered this place. So I decided to try it. I went on Saturday, when they had barbecued ribs. The ribs were meaty and falling off the bone tender. They were delicious. I also had mac and cheese and collard greens. Everything was delicious. I did go back..the very next day. I'd recommend everyone to give it a try.

name: Christopher Peterkin
text: Service is consistent and food is always good quality.

name: Angela Jacobs
text: Too high priced for food that's not really soul food and is eaten out of styrofoam with plastic utensils.

name: Milo Blake
text: Great food and atmosphere

name: michael byers
text: Good food home cooking

name: Milton King
text: Very delicious!

name: Carlton Gill Sr
text: The place is nice

name: Renee Davis
text: Unfortunately food was not that good!

name: Lizy Ayala
text:
(Translated by Google) Spectacular I love it, very healthy food

(Original)
Espectacular me encanta ,comida muy saludable

name: Renee
text: I like it when the manager is NOT there (or at least when he's not making the sandwich). When he is making the sandwich he skimps, so bad, on all the toppings. It's always clean and the sandwich artists are always nice. 5 stars when the manager isn't there.

name: Jai TheeGoddess
text: Service isn't good here.. they're super slow and the Middle Eastern Lady has an attitude problem. The food could be better. I ordered a cheese pizza with veggies, she was stingy with the veggies, sheesh! Lol and the tomatoes are always old and soggy.

name: John Murr Rhame
text: Asked for meal with drink and cookies. Charged separately for drink and cookies, an extra $0.79. Sleazy way to overcharge.

name: Dottie Garrett Reaves
text: all depends on which location u go to sandwiches are ok

name: Overtop Media
text: Considering the neighborhood this is really nice.

name: Dennis
text: Fresh Fast

name: Sentaria Tobias
text: Not friendly at all

name: Sandip N
text: Ok

name: Heather Channel
text: The best sushi in Charlotte. Seriously. Go. It was soft and so fresh it melted in my mouth like butter. Every roll we had was great! The devil dice roll was spicy and I loved it!

name: Reginald Carpenter
text: Always ready to try a new sushi restaurant. The experience, food and service, was good. If you're in the area, it's worth checking out.

name: Chris Guella
text: We enjoyed dinner on this day. Sushi Sashimi combo was fresh and tasty. Other tools we're great as well. Nice place. BYOB for now as no liquor license at the time.

name: CraZLex _1922
text: Loved the sushi... wasn't so crazy about the entree. It was good, but I wasn't blown away. I would likely try something different next time.

name: Gwiz “Gwizbud” Bud
text: Great food, tables by garage doors that open to outside are nice.

name: Rick Benfield
text: This place is brand new, so I'm sure they are trying to work some kinks out.  The Sushi was warm when it arrived to the table, usually Sushi is much cooler.  That was disappointing.   I will give it some time before I go back, and hopefully give them time for improvement

name: Nicole Steiger
text: Ordered pickup from them the other day. Food was REALLY good. Quick too. The inside is spacious and the rest of their menu items looked great and very reasonably priced. Will be back!

name: DeNeisha Bailey
text: Best sushi and customer service

name: Charlie Thach
text: Very fresh and tasty! Polite staff and good atmosphere

name: Alexandra R
text: My fiancé and I went for lunch. The sushi was fresh and the steak was especially delicious. Our waiter, Gidi (?) was extremely friendly, and the entire staff was welcoming. This will be a frequent stop in the future!

name: Jai Stocks
text: Sushi was amazing! But the appetizers were so doughy and the shrimp tempura app didn’t even use panko while the other app’s used Panko? It was so weird. I’ll be back for the sushi tho!

name: Luis Palacios
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent, fresh and delicious food.
Attention A +

Excellent place.
Fresh & delicious food 😋

(Original)
Excelente, comida fresca y deliciosa.
Atención A+

Excellent place.
Fresh & delicious food 😋

name: Mike Easton (Mortgage Broker Mike)
text: This is one of the best new spots in charlotte! Lianne is a fantastic sever and if you are looking for a 5 star dining experience then make your reservation to be served by her!!!!! Tell her Movement Mortgage Mike sent you for VIP treatment

name: Jonathan Bui
text: Sushi is fresh and good. Entrees were lacking a little character. Appetizers were good. They have some more exquisite items on the menu that you sometimes can't find at other more generic sushi places. Highlight are the excellent cocktails and generous drink pours. I have been here twice and service has been excellent both times. We were also given complimentary apps to try and deserts on occasion. Only downside is the somewhat high-end price fitting the locale. Overall a nice spot. Hope it does well.

name: Matthew B
text: I really liked the lay out, look, and taste of the food. The people were very nice and the service was excellent. The feel and look of the restaurant is very clean and welcoming. I enjoy sushi when I want to have a fine dine and this seemed to give me that type of experience I was looking for. It helped tremendously to have the free 2 hour valet complimentary parking!

name: Chase Taylor
text: If you look at my other reviews you'll see I don't throw many 2's out there. Maybe my expectations were too high. Maybe they are still working out the kinks. Food was hit or miss but the prices never let up. Service was way below what we expected for a $250 bill. I will say the cocktails were on point. We'll be back to give it another chance because we love the concept and my guess it will improve as they mature a bit.

name: Steven Pearce
text: Well, where do you begin when most everything went wrong? I'll provide a list of what went right and what went wrong. First, the things that went right: good location. Things that went wrong: slow service, overpriced menu, poor tasting food (rubbery chicken, slimy vegetables), cold food, fried rice without any vegetables, and it took over an hour to receive food. Lastly, the manager did comp our whole table because nearly everyone's food was well below expectations - that was appreciated. I like most foods. I like Asian food. However, this food was just plain bad. I don't plan on going back.

name: Frank Ferris
text: Took my wife here for a lunch date. She likes Sushi. She was happy when we left. Mic drop.

name: Joshua Martin
text: Very nice atmosphere  friendly staff and good food.

name: Mike de Boer
text: Great service and good sushi

name: Kaycee Steele
text: Was great until they closed

name: Anthony Vella
text: Expensive, but amazing food

name: Mo3blessed
text: Went in one Friday night for after dinner dessert. There was a Small selection of desserts, not well rounded, and they were not displayed. I wanted chocolate so I ordered the layered chocolate cake with ganche. It was tasteless, so underdone. Not for the chocolate lover. I sent that back and they offered a chocolate molten cake with ice cream. This cake was nothing special tasted like it came from a big box store. And the ice cream was not all natural leaving that waxy feeling on the pallet, not like real ice cream melts in your mouth. The coffee tasted like it was reheated from this morning.The reason for the three stars , if any, is the crepe cake. It was very creamy and delicate.  The owners and staff were really nice and the decor beautiful

name: Walker Langley
text: The Gallery is a great little spot that's a mix of wine bar and art gallery in an up and coming part of Charlotte. The owner (Ana) is extremely kind and her husband is the artist whose paintings provide some color to the white-walled brick interior.  If you're looking for a tasty charcuterie plate, a nice glass of wine, or a quite spot for brunch, The Gallery has you covered.

name: Lauren Bilski
text:
Here on a Monday. Pretty quiet as I had hoped. Had some work to do and I knew there was half off wine to reward myself after getting some work done. Got a Americano, which was good. At most there were 3 people in the place; which is pleasant, clean and inviting.
A few hours later my qualm arrives from being the only person in the place and receiving a dirty wine glass. Lipstick marks are to get off, trust me, I am in the industry.  But for being the only customer, not acceptable. I will definitely be back, I like the place, but a clean glass is basic.

name: Emily Currie
text: The place is super cute with art and nice decor. Was disappointed cause I have heard good things about their crepe cake. My husband and I went to try one and it was frozen. The girl told us that it wasn't dethawed yet.

name: Ian Inquimboy
text: Awesome place!  Relaxed atmosphere.   Best coffee in town.   If you're visiting Charlotte, stop by this place for a dessert

name: Alexandra Flores
text: Súper cute atmosphere. Coffee was good and the dessert is delicious. Also very comfy chairs and plugs everywhere

name: Stephen Loych
text: Great dessert and coffee! Unique environment.

name: Victoria Bellamy
text: Customer service was awesome, the coffee tasted fancy, and the artwork was lovely. I also like how they have a couch where you can sit on.

name: Khoy Blasi-Diggs (King Blazi)
text: Great place, great service and wonderful owners!

name: John Fuller
text: Good Coffee, comfortable place for a meeting.

name: Yanmin Ma (Mike)
text: This is actually the Lady M, but with less crepe varieties.

name: Overtop Media
text: Art, coffee, AAAAnd desert. What? That's the spot.

name: Boshu Ru
text: Sadly their business was closed in 2016.

name: Chau Nguyen
text: Clean and styled

name: Uriah Jackson
text: Wine, Art, Desert

name: Tyson Presnell
text: Nice/helpful employees, but the systems to print one of their own labels are absurd. They can't scan it; you have to either login to your email to print it paying by the minute, or pay more to email to them and have them print. I get the charge to print the label for you but they should just be able to scan and print. Took almost 25 minutes just to return a package. If you're going to nickel and dime people, at least make it convenient.

name: Nichie [nikki] Cole
text: I have traveled many miles and passed up many other ups stores just to make it to this location for the 630 pickup. I love the staff and the service has always been pleasant. Which makes it my number one reason why i stay on the highway until I reach this location.

name: Almighty KI York
text: Went there to get a letter notarized, lady told me I needed to download a form to fill out in order to notarize my letter and that it was a new law. I went to a bank where not only did they notarize for free, but searched for so called new law that doesn't exist, I believe the woman wouldn't help me because I am a black male.

name: Martin Rooster Wing Jr
text: Outstanding small business. Low employee turnover rate tells me a lot. Some legitimately decent people working at this establishment and the owner takes great care of them.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind words and for taking the time to leave us a review; we strive for great service and it is important to me to receive feedback about where we stand.  We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Gerald S
text: I don’t know why UPS stores only do this, but they love to close early if they aren’t busy. This one isn’t an exception.

name: David Coleman
text: I have always had a good experience at this store. Staff is really helpful and gets you sorted and on your way fast. Matt yesterday helped me ship a package and it was a great experience.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time out of your day to leave us a review David, we greatly appreciate your feedback.  We strive to offer great service and I am happy to hear you are satisfied.   I own this UPS Store and my name is Andrew, please feel free to reach out to me anytime if there is ever anything I can do to help you further!

name: Pete Freedman
text: This local UPS Store is the BEST shipping and office needs store we have ever used! We ship, receive, get printing and pretty much use this location as our second office. We moved further away and still drive here because of how professional and courteous the crew here are. Thanks for the great IT help Andrew!

name: Scott Clinton Photography
text:
This is the best UPS store in Charlotte...  Possibly one of the best small businesses in Charlotte.   I have been using this store since 2009 when I moved to Charlotte.   The ownership has changed (which is a good thing) and the interior has changed (which is a good thing).   The current owner and his staff are some of the best around.   They make regular customers feel like family and new customers like old friends.

If you read the negative reviews, you will find that people are generally complaining about the costs associated with shipping via UPS corporate.   The individual stores do not set these prices....  Please do not ding the store for corporate's policies.   Send those negative comments to the freight service.

If you need packaging, printing (including 3D), layouts, or even a notary, this is your place!

name: Upgrade Me BB
text: Great uptown location,  a bit hard to get to at the moment because of construction.

name: Richard Benedict
text: We have used this store repeatedly for over 6 years and the service has always been excellent and the staff always very friendly and helpful. I recommend this store to everyone I meet that tells me they need something printed, packaged or shipped. They are very professional.

name: Daniel Evans
text: They have lit candles near cardboard boxes. This has to be a fire code violation.

resp.text: I appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We do have candles every holiday season but use a candle warmer rather than lighting them.  A new employee did light one of the candles early not knowing the policy we have and has since been informed that it is a hazard and is not to be done in the future.

name: Cami Castillo
text: This is the best UPS store in charlotte.  Always friendly kind staff. Thanks Kate for your awsome customer service.

name: Joe Myers
text: I've been a customer of this UPS store for many years and always had great, timely service. Andrew and his team are awesome.

name: Curtis Stone
text: I needed a last minute large print for my new bakery and the UPS Store hooked me up within 15 minutes. Thanks :)

resp.text: Thank you, we are always happy to help.  Good luck with your new bakery, we will be sure to stop by!

name: Mitchell Coles
text: The staff here are always professional, courteous and efficient.

name: Keith Henny
text: I just moved back to Charlotte & this location is very convenient to my residence.  I have been buying the boxes & dropping off pre boxed items with pre printed labels for a couple of months.  These people here are have been genuinely super nice & even greet you when walking through the door.  I went to buy a box the other day & the guy asked me what I was shipping.  I replied, "a laptop," but insisted on seeing the box list so that I could choose the correct dimensions.  He brings out some "laptop" box with some extra cardboard that probably cost $15-$20 & says they can pack it.  I tell him that I will pack it and print a label myself, & ask again to see the box list.  He refuses to give me the list while explaining why I need the $20 "laptop" box. I told him that I ship over $100k of electronics annually & I only need the boxes that I choose from the box list.  He then replies that this box list is nonexistent.  I reply that I have seen it several times & asked the other employee (who had been tuning in the entire time).  She quickly reaches directly in front of this jerk & pulls out this coveted box list.  I pick the boxes that I need, she gets them & rings me up.  The price is almost twice as much as the cost on the box list and she says, "our prices have changed."  BS. I said nevermind & walked away.  It's so funny how they try & cheat you to pay their inflated prices for whatever services they provide & when that doesn't work, they make up rules & price changes on the spot. I can only imagine how they rip off people who are ignorant to their methods.  They totally would have ripped someone like my mom off...

name: Megan Amberly
text: Always fast and efficient!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review; we try our best to offer great service and its always great to hear feedback like this.  we appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again!

name: Robby Scruggs
text: Every time everyone is so nice and helpful.

name: Stuart Smith
text: Ok Starbucks. A bit slow.

name: Gilbert Hayden
text: I don't hate the place, I just don't care for them like that...

name: Margaret Webb
text: Will have to find a different coffee shop on the way to work. This one is consistently terrible. Either they are out of what I order or my drink is made wrong. Always a long wait as well. To top it off, workers are unfriendly.

name: steve singer
text: Store is clean and well stocked. Staff are friendly. Seating is limited. All in all I would have no problem giving the store 4- 5 stars... HOWEVER...the store is located inside a Harris Teeter supermarket. I am here at many different times of day. There are almost always Harris Teeter employees sitting at the tables. There are seven tables. I have come in here only to find as many as three of the tables occupied by supermarket employees. I am not being a jerk. This is a perfect place for a coffee break. The folks who work here are great. They deserve and should have a coffee break during their workday. Where I get frustrated is that significantly more often than not these folks are not buying Starbucks coffee or food. This is a Starbucks, not a Harris Teeter break room.

name: Rod D
text: Relatively new but a nice and convenient Starbucks, great location. The cashiers / customer service could use a little work in terms of personality. Can easily be perceived as not very welcoming. I have visited this location several times at various times of the day. On most occasions they are not very busy but usually none or very few of the tables are ever cleaned. I think this location only does tables twice a day opening and closing.

name: Trisha Presnell
text: Love the Iced Chai Latte and the banana bread.

name: James Herlihy
text: Dawn of the dead!! Clerk just looked at me when I walked up. He never said a word the whole time. The coworker chewed her gum like a cow chews cud.she poured. He handed it to me. I said thank you. He turned and walked away. Not a word. The worst customer experience I think I have ever had at a Starbucks. Starbucks! Harris teeter whatever. I don't need your coffee this bad. And I can shop elsewhere for food

name: Wilson Diaz
text: Cozy place. Spot to feel relaxed. Even romantic. For sure great tastes.highly recommended.

name: deobeon
text: I left a compliment when I visited last. Brings back amazing memories!

name: Andrew Coffman

text: I'm so glad that I had friends order this the other   night. So far the San Lorenzo pasta is probably the best pasta I've had, great blend of spices and peppers and pasta texture was perfect. The American pepporini is good for one slice but they are very generous on the pepperoni so if your a meat lover you would like this one. The staff was also very polite and helpful. Cant wait to try more items soon.

name: TamptheChamp2
text: It’s not often I give an easy 5 star review on my first visit to a restaurant, but this is one of those rare exceptions.  This location is a self serve Showmars-style restaurant that specializes in Italian food: pastas, pizzas, and sandwiches mainly.  Even the atmosphere was what you’d expect from a good Italian restaurant.  Considering there is a Wendy’s right next door in the same building, I considered this a major plus.  Clean restrooms. Friendly staff.  All food made from scratch.  My order of Chicken Carbonara pasta and a drink cost right at around $12, but the quality of the dish was right near what I’d expect from a visit to the Olive Garden!  Of course, I would have been paying close to double had I ordered it there. What a pleasant surprise in a world with so few left!  Can’t wait to come back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking them time to give us a 5 star with feedback! We love that you loved us! We hope to see you back again soon!

text: I could have given it a five star but the people who work there could care less had to ask for my own plates had to ask for everything kids behind the counter could not care less it's a shame because the pizza has a lot of quality to it food was delicious

resp.text: Thanks so much I will share your feedback

name: Megan Hinkle
text: I researched the best pizza in Charlotte before ordering delivery for my daughter's birthday party at a hotel LESS THAN ONE MILE from Capishe's Southpark location. The food was delivered by DoorDash, quicker than the timeframe estimated when I placed the order. Upon delivery, the pizzas were cold and the salad was lukewarm. I called the restaurant to complain, and the call taker, his manager, and then the kitchen manager all said it was to be expected from food delivery and blamed it on DoorDash. You can tell Capishe uses quality ingredients but do not order their food via delivery, and if you do ever have a problem with their food, don't expect them to make it right. They refunded my money but I still had cold pizza and lukewarm salad. I would have gladly paid for quality food.

name: Brandon L. (Goosey)
text:
DELICIOUS ALL THE WAY AROUND!!!

I ordered via DoorDash.

My gelato was so calorie free it wasn't even in the bag.

Also, when peppers are requested to be added as a pizza topping please be considerate and use them without stems.  I could have really done without gagging on pepper stems all evening (and I don't even have a gag reflex).

Other than that, the food was AMAZING!

I give 1 star because I'm at my limit with places not being able to fill my order properly and leaving me hanging out to dry.  THAT IS YOUR JOB!! ACT LIKE YOU CARE ABOUT IT.   Would you buy a car with three wheels and still be happy to pay full price for it?

********* UPDATE

Now that I got my rant out.  😂. The food is super. And thank you, Capishe Owner for responding to me.  Door Dash refunded my card for the Gelato so no worries at all!

You're correct - the delivery person has accountability there. I do think it would be a little better to trim the stem off the peppers.  I think they've finally all harpooned out of me now.

Can't wait to eat there again!

resp.text:
Hi Brandon I’m sorry to hear that you were not happy with your experience. I would be happy to refund you for gelato and peppers! If you can give me the last 4 digits of your Cc I can do that for you! We typically leave the stems on for the Calabrian peppers but appreciate the feedback - as for the gelato I’m sorry that was an oversight!

Also wanted to encourage you to call Doordash- your Dasher is supposed to confirm your order and it’s contents upon pick up. Because Gelato will melt we keep it separately in the freezer so there is an extra step in getting that added last minute before he or she leaves - while our staff should also have checked too, the Dasher is heading out the door with your order and it should have been confirmed.

I love Ryan and Calvin and request them when they are available. the prices are a little higher than other places but the place is gorgeous clean and doesn't have that salon smell. they also offer wine and cocktails. The tech was cold and didn't offer me anything to drink the entire appointment, as soon as I finished she gave me the ticket n said go pay at the front as she walked off to go talk w another tech...this was my first and probably last time, her work was standard but there are too many other options in charlotte that have excellent customer service on top of great product....good luck management

name: Desiree M
text:
My nail tech did a great job on my sns, however instead of doing the normal last step she put clear gel top coat and had me place my nails in UV lamp. I have had SNS done many times at other locations and this was never done. Sadly, that day I noticed the gel coat coming off already and the flat matte powdered base is showing through. Of note she only applied one coat and I only cured under the lamp for 30 seconds, my left hand was even less as she took it out. My left hand is where I saw the gel top coat
Coming off almost immediately.

I know have to take time out of my busy schedule to try to get this fixed.  Not sure why she did such a beautiful job and did not follow through with standard sns application. Maybe she needs better training. I put my trust in her she knew what she was doing but clearly not. I would prefer just a refund as I cannot come. You can see from the picture the matte color is coming through.

Edit:

Spoke with manager and I am expected to take time out of my busy schedule to come to have them fix their poor workmanship or poor quality sns product. I will avoid using cachet all together as I have had poor quality at south end location as well. I was also told by manger some of the “sns” products require a gel coat?

name: Cheryl Clarke
text: WAY Overpriced for what you get!  They don’t use name brand nail polish, yet they’re more expensive than other salons. My friend‘s gel polish fell off her entire nail bed within 2 days, the others are peeling off. Nail shapes are unevenly shaped and polish was put on in a way that my nails look bumpy.  The complimentary wine is the smallest amount of ever received at a salon and if you want a refill it’s $9. The staff was nice, that’s the only reason I gave 2 stars.

name: Ashley Hannah
text: Love this place ... friendly service... love the foot massages and they have mimosas! 🍾🔥🙌🏻

name: B Robinson
text: Got SNS done on Mothers day by Tuesday the top coat was peeling off and 3 nails were lifting. I have gotten SNS done before and have always lasted 3 to 4 weeks. Spoke with the manager Mika (not sure if that's how you spell her name) she said I had to come in within 3 days. I advised I got off after they were closed and Friday (today) was the only day I could come in. I was advised when I got my nails done they only do appointments M-Sat. And I explained that to the manager. I can understand if I got a regular mani. Or my nails were chipped, no they are lifting and top coat is peeling off, that should not happen I. Less than a week with gel pr SNS. SNS  should last 2 weeks min. They refused to fix or even look at the obvious proof they were done incorrectly. They much rather lose potential clients than fix an issue they obviously created.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to inform us of your experience. I was very disappointed when I seen your review stating that your SNS did not last as long as it should have. I also noticed that you were misinformed about our 3 day policy. I want to extend a sincere apology to you for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We understand that our customers have busy lives and don't always have the availability to come back to the boutique within 3 days. Our policy only requires that the customer contacts us within 3 days to inform us of any issues for a fix, at which point the customer can come in to get the repair done whenever their schedule permits. We aim to please our customers and it is very disappointing when we fail to do so. We would like the opportunity to improve any issues you may had with your previous visit and to earn back your business. We truly value our customers and look forward to providing a high level of customer service. Hope to see you again in the near future. Thanks again and you have an awesome day.

name: Ondrea Nightingale
text: "We take our last customer at 7pm"...then your "closed" time is 7pm. Not 8pm.

resp.text: We are sorry if our last appointment time is an inconvenience or confusing for you. Allow me to explain. At Cachet we value our technicians’ time as well as our customers’ and prefer to go by the motto: Quality Over Quantity. We want to assure you have the BEST experience at Cachet so we dedicate an allotted time for each service. After 7, if the clients’ desired services takes a long time, then our employees can’t go home to their families by 8. We hope that you understand!
