name: Crystal Barco
text: Went in today looking for a thermogenic was greeted as soon as I entered the store which was nice. I truly wish I could remember both of the gentleman's names who helped me because they were amazing. The store associate asked me what I was looking to do and I gave him the run down. He selected several products all the while explaining what each one would do for me and how they worked together so I could reach my goals. Very knowledgeable I felt comfortable with his suggestion. While checking out, the manager offered several deals as well as broke down how to use each item I purchased. He was extremely knowledgeable as well. I left feeling confident in my purchase, well informed, and excited to begin using my new supplements. These guys are a great team and the customer service is amazing. I will be continuing to make future purchases at this location. Definitely recommend!

This is my worst Subway experience ever. I wanted a tuna salad. It's what I like. It's what I always order. Well this location didn't have the dressing I normally get on my salad, this location didn't wafer crackers. This location only give you 2 small ice cream scoops of tuna. I will be even more disappointed if you don't get extra. 😠
At the counter the cashier/manager asked me if I would like to leave a tip. 🤔
"Leave a tip for what?" I asked. You don't have the ingredients to complete my salad. She replies, "a tip for making your salad. But isn't that your job?  I didn't know I could make my own salad.

text: Really good food. We were the only people in the place so we got great service too.  Caesar salad was great. Regular salad was not so great. The bread (both kinds)was wonderful. The bean salad with the bread was super delicious. I didn't care for the traditional spaghetti and meatballs. I felt it was a bit bland. The scampi caprese was really good. The shrimp in it was probably the best shrimp I've eaten in a long time. Tasted very fresh.

resp.text: Thanks for your review.  We are glad you enjoyed your meal!   We feel our wine prices are competitive with other dining establishments like Mezzanotte.   We do offer 1/2 off select bottles of wine on Sunday and Wednesday and $5.00 select wines by the glass on Thursday.

name: Charles “Chip” Payet
text: Overall, pretty good Italian food and wine, but yikes, it gets loud in there.  If you're at a table for 6, it's impossible to hear what the people at the other end are saying without almost shouting.  Service is good, though sometimes a bit slow.  Reasonably priced.

name: Marcilio Depaula
text: Horrible service not a kids friendly establishment. Short 4"9 Mexican server that has no idea what his doing probably was pulled from the dish pit by accident. We brought a 10 month old and the first thing he asked was . do u need a high chair ? Lol. What a moron. Had to ask for a kids menu. Pizza was ok nothing special. Like Hawthorne's much better . This place is highly overpriced .

resp.text: We were sorry to hear about your experience at Mezzanotte.  Families are always welcome at Mezzanotte where we strive to provide great service and great food.  We were recently selected as one of the top 4 restaurants in Charlotte for authentic Neapolitan pizza.   We hope you will give us another try.

name: cynthia cosgrove
text: Mezzanotte hits every note- starting with the sound of Frank Sinatra's voice wafting through the parking lot.. Fabio welcomes you in like family and ushers you to your table as if he's been saving it all day just for this special  moment.  Crusty, warm bread appears in a basket and the menu is explained with pride and in detail. The portions are generous and the recipes truly satisfying and delicious! My husband and I went there on a Wednesday evening and enjoyed a relaxing dinner with a lovely half priced bottle of Montepulciano.  We topped the meal off splitting a heavenly tiramisu and left with enough food for lunch the next day. This is a restaurant that feeds & treats you like your Italian grandma would if you had one..Highly recommended!

name: April Mackenzie
text: Went here with friends a few months ago, food was decent but not overwhelming, decor was pretty good, service was average at best.  Ordered one of the pizzas, I would probably give it a 7 out of 10, have definitely had better in Charlotte, but have had worse.  Would I come back here?  Maybe, but doubtful.

text: All the juices, smoothies, and treats here are awesome!  It's a little pricey, but worth it if you have the funds!  Their wheatgrass shots are awesome

name: noneya business
text: They Could change the name of this place to clean city instead of Queen city why because you could get a clean thing here most likely. This cute little place is recessed in the strip mall to where it’s kind a like pushed back in a little which is kind of a cute touch. It is amazing how good you feel if you really get in the juicing it really does work for a lot of people I’m telling you.

name: Beau Johnson
text:
I've really gotten on board with the natural and homeopathic lifestyle and seen a lot of great results. Luckily, in this massive heatwave we have been having I came across this place. I was having this nagging headache all day and had been sweating and needed something to reset if you will.

I told the guy how I was feeling and they whipped up this "green" concoction of all this healthy and fresh awesome stuff. It tasted like banana and well "green". It was super fresh and tasted great. The vibe of the place was very laid back and original if you will. The place is a little pricey but it is all fresh and mostly if not all organic. They whip the stuff up right in front of you and its just pure fresh. Stop and refuel naturally from all this sweltering summer heat and humidity!

name: Michael Laney
text: Awesome service, kids loved it.  Thanks again

name: Lilly Anna Pavlou
text:
Got a smoothie, and while it was good, I found it to be not as good as others I've had (specifically Green Brothers was much better.) The atmosphere was nice, but just like other juice places, the price was very high, even for a meal substitute.

Like another reviewer said, the ingredients were somewhat pre-made in that they had them either blended or processed and stored by the counter. I didn't see a juice made while I was there (other customers also got smoothies), so I can't say if juices were done fresh.

name: Ms. Lo Bland
text: Pretty decent juice bar in Charlotte. I typically visit the other location but this one is just as nice. Can be pricey but that's to be expected with fresh juice.

name: Shantel Hawkins
text: It was good and refreshing. The server kept calling me "love". That was weird, but what ever.

name: Mallory Rowland
text: Recently visited and had the Acai bowl.  It was alright, but I was disappointed.  It was very small for $10 and it was just alright in comparison to some others I have had.  Rico's Acai is much better, a little cheaper, you get more for your money, and you have different bowl options.  This place only has one bowl and I think for the most part, their products are way over-priced.

name: Jonah Hendrix
text: Needs some work.  Ordered a green juice on Saturday morning with a shot of wheatgrass.  The girl pulled out a pitcher of juice from a refrigerator and poured my cup.  Then she pulled my wheatgrass out of a bag.  At almost 10 bucks for a large juice I would expect everything to be fresh!

name: Robert Beurkens
text: The best UPS store in Charlotte as far as I'm concerned. Always in and out in about 45 secs. Light-years better than Cotswold.

name: Shae Jackson
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. My mother had 2 packages that needed to be sent out of town to my grandmother. The clerk put in the wrong address and put my mother as the sender and the person receiving the package so when the packages got returned back to my mother's house we took them back to this same UPS store and told them what happened well the same clerk was there and he told us its not his fault and that my mom should have checked it before she left the store.  They would not refund my mother back her $50 she paid to have it shipped and basically didn't care, so my mom took the packages to the post office had to pay AGAIN! to have them shipped to the correct address luckily they did it right. The clerk at UPS could have at least given my mother her money back or even just owned up to his mistake apologized fixed the issue and ship the package smh. Never again!!

resp.text: It is unfortunate that this happened to your mom. Our shipping process is robust and provides 100% accuracy when followed properly. This package was delivered from the provided sender address to the provided recipient address. Please consider that the sender has the final say by verifying the addresses and signing the shipping document. Once you do so, you agree that you have verified and signed off on the shipment. Our records show that the sender has approved and signed the shipping document. We are committed to providing world class customer service. We would love to see you again in our store and be able to make up this unpleasant experience.

name: Megan Free
text: I've used this location as it's close to home and opens early enough for to head to work after, for dropping off my USPS packages. Wonderful team, friendly, timely and super helpful. I just started selling stuff through an online store and being new, the Team and staff overall have been patient and kind in the several trips over there, I've made. No mistakes  at all, on shipping nor receiving and they go above and beyond. Cheers and thank you, so much!

resp.text: Thank you Megan for your encouraging feedback. Looking forward to seeing you again in our store.

name: Debi Kay
text:
Wonderful, Helpful, Professional & Fun!!!! I love coming to this location... I won't go to any other store- ever!
I had two very heavy, very fragile, very big packages to ship.  I called several places for shipping quotes.  One place quoted me 200.00. I loaded up and drove 30 minutes out of my way to ship.  I was told the cost upon arrival was 490.00.  I was not happy!!!

I was lucky enough to stop in this store that day.  With the help of Clayton & LaShana, we figured out a way to ship the items for 200.00. They not only kept the cost down, the items arrived ahead of schedule & PERFECT!!!!!!

I have been in around 20-30 times since with the same or better service.  My shipments always arrived in great condition and better than on time.

I trust this store, this entire TEAM and would recommend you give them a try.  You won't be disappointed!!!!

Debi Kay

name: Candy Phillips
text:
If I could give no stars I'd given 0. I went in, the manager happens to be the cashier.....
Rings me up ask multiple questions. Asked if I wanted it tracked, yes I reply, due to notorizing papers being part of my items being sent out. A week later I'm trying to see why my papers haven't made delivery  yet. And find out the manager, the one who asked all the questions, still didn't make sure thAt was on my order. My 1st and last ups service from this branch. I'll go back to my regular place of business. It Was closer, that's what I get for trying to access closer businesses. Thumbs down and no recommendations

name: Jonathan Osman
text:
Avoid this UPS Store location.  I sold a 27" Apple iMac on eBay and took it to this store for packaging and shipping last November.  I paid them to do it since I figured they were the experts and that the computer would arrive safe to it's destination.  It didn't.  What did happen is that the packaging was stamped "fragile" and the computer was heavily damaged upon arrival.  Their packaging was woeful and the buyer demanded a refund.  The UPS store issued a refund for the cost of the packaging and shipping - nothing more.

The buyer of the computer was then instructed by eBay to return the computer to me and they refunded him for the entire purchase.  So for 11 months, I have been waiting for my computer to return to no avail.  It turns out that somehow, the computer was sent back to the UPS store - who rejected the package so it went back the Buyer then...well no one knows where it went because it never made it to "Lost and Found".

I have asked repeatedly for a refund and the latest is that no further refund is coming.  Instead, they attempted to mislead me by saying that UPS collects all damage claim items (a quick call to UPS verified that wasn't at all true).  In the end, I'm the big loser here. The Buyer received his money back courtesy of eBay and this UPS Store has no interest in making things right.  Don't be a big loser - don't ship here.  I certainly will not ever again.

resp.text:
Mr. Osman,

We apologize for the inconvenience that occurred with your shipment. The package containing the Mac you sold on eBay was declared / insured at the time of shipment for the standard $100. You did not wish to add additional declared value due to the fact that the overall cost of shipping would increase. We did pack your package as a fragile shipment per UPS’ packaging guidelines. When the package was accidentally split during commute, the cushioning materials used escaped out of the box. What remained within the box at the time of delivery was only a small fraction of what was originally used.

UPS Corporate Claims is responsible for honoring claims made, which you were reimbursed for the full amount declared / insured of $100 as well as the packaging and shipment costs. The reimbursement applied only to the declared / insured value ($100) and not to the item's actual value (estimated at $1000). The reimbursement applies to either loss or damages, but not both. Since the package was already reimbursed for its full declared value due to damages, it was not eligible for another reimbursement due to loss.

The package was never returned to our The UPS Store. It was mistakenly shipped back to the recipient by UPS Corporate. The recipient refused the package, where it was then taken to lost and found as no claimant came forward. After 3 months in the lost and found, packages are disposed by UPS Corporate. The shipment occurred in December 2013 and you contacted us inquiring about the package in July 2014, well after the 3 months period. UPS Corporate has no paperwork regarding the package since it had passed the 3 months period.

Again, we understand this has caused an inconvenience for you but we have done everything within our power to provide a solution for you.

name: Bernie Markley
text: Awesome staff!  Very professional and service is great!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Markley. We hope you have a nice weekend.

name: Jan Svoboda
text: Utterly useless UPS location. Will not accept your UPS shipping account to ship, want you to pay retail for shipping. Do not have basic UPS shipping supplies, not even blank waybills.

resp.text:
Dear Mr. Svoboda,
we are sorry that you feel this way. UPS does not allow any franchisee store to use other shippers account number. We do not carry any waybills since our process has been fully  computerized. Hope to see again in our store.

name: Laura Claxton
text: Friendly and good prices.

resp.text: Thank you Laura. We look forward to seeing you again in our store.

name: Rasa Virbicke
text: They also do document notarizing which I would say is pretty handy service at ups store

resp.text: Thank you for the review Rasa! We have a Notary available during all operating hours. We can scan, copy, or ship your important documents as well.

text: Awesome service!

resp.text: Thank you for an awesome review.
Thank you for your kind words. We are really glad to offer the best service to our customers. looking forward to seeing again in our store.

Mr. cortman,
It is unfortunate that you gave us this rating. In order to help us improve our service, next time you are in our store, I would appreciate if you can give me more information. Your feedback matters to us.
Than you. Camille

name: Mimi Hsu
text:
The first time I tried Maple Street Biscuit was in Charleston and fell in love with the food.
I was so happy to hear they brought one to Charlotte. It was exactly how I remembered it!! The fried green tomatoes were still just as good...tender on the inside and super crispy on the outside. Not oily at all!
Loved the freshness of the biscuit and the chicken. Enjoyed the Squawking Goat and the Three Layer Cake.
The owner brought around these dessert chocolate chip biscuits drizzled with glaze and peppermint bits. Those were AMAZING!!
I cannot wait to go back and enjoy more of their food.

name: Lillian White
text:
The restaurant is too tight at the front door. No, in and out door.  The food sometimes can be seasoned too much. And fried too hard, tables are not cleaned as often as they should be.

The food is good.

resp.text:
Lillian,

Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We will definitely take a look at the quality of the food coming out of the kitchen.  As well, we will ensure that we do a better job of doing our due diligence of keeping those tables clean between guest.  Next time you stop in, ask for Alex or Scott, we would love to treat ya!

name: TamptheChamp2
text: I have ordered breakfast here twice via DoorDash, both times during Mon-Fri.  This is about the best breakfast food I’ve had anywhere.  The flavor of the food here easily beats out that of the Original Pancake House, for example.  The Squawking Goat biscuit has goat cheese and house made pepper jelly that is out of this world!  However, even with such great food, the prices are high for some of the portion sizes customers receive; particularly at a breakfast restaurant.  I have read several negative reviews of this restaurant emphasizing long wait times and poor service from the staff.  Since I ordered from here via DoorDash, I cannot comment on such reviews beyond stating that the delivery time didn’t seem any longer to me than that of other restaurants closer to where I live.  The food was warm, and nothing in either of my orders was forgotten.  I will probably try ordering on a weekend, at some point, to see if there’s any noticeable difference.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your experience!  We’ve really been working hard improving our kitchen to correct some of our past short comings.  Thank you also for the insight around pricing.  We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Cherie Long-Hardin
text: Good food. Nice and comfy atmosphere. Love the unique ordering strategy of giving your answer to the question of the day.

name: J B
text: Worst coffee ever. Not sure if the young lady didn't know what she was doing or if it was actually supposed to taste like that but I wasn't pleased.

resp.text:
Hey there JB!  I am so sorry that your coffee was not to your liking.  We have a pretty good cup of coffee that Maple Street roasts in house.  I typically start my morning with a cup so, I am sorry that it was unpleasant.  I hope you will give us another shot.  If you stop in, ask for Scott or Alex, and we will definitely make the experience right for you!

Scott LeBlanc - Community Leader Charlotte

text: I got the sticky maple and the hashbrown cake. My mom got the sweet grace with chicken. I also got the iced maple vanilla latte. EVERYTHING was so good, the taste of their syrup is so wholesome. The assistant manager Kristina is the best.

text: Eh. It's so-so.  The menu looks impressive, and definitely the flavors are well thought.  Execution is weak, biscuits are pretty dry, chicken is too.  They tried really hard to make this feel like a "down home" joint, but it's honestly a miss.  Holler n Dash had a way better vibe and menu.  Bummer...

text: Everything was good but the biscuits could be softer and warm I mean it’s the main attraction and it isn’t what I’d go back for. But great grits, and eggs and the best waffles I’ve ever had...

text:
Very good food and a big quantity for the price. Two large pieces of chicken and a waffle for $12 is a great deal and can even make two meals of it.

Friendly staff and management too.

name: misan wiles
text: Maple street biscuit company Is Excellent - in Concord. This location is terrible. I ordered my food 45 mins in advance. I get there at pick-up time, tell them my name, then they started making it. I had to remind the lady making my food to add my ranch for the FIREBIRD. I Get home, and no cheese on my biscuit. Making the food correctly should be the least you could do. The entire place is in disarray. It's the complete opposite of the Concord location. It's really ruining the Maple Street Biscuit Company name. I'm going to have to go to the concord location from now on, even though I live in the Ballantyne area, the drive will be well worth the drive. It's getting a Star because the food was good, even though it was incomplete and there wasn't enough buffalo sauce on my chicken breast.

resp.text:
Hello Misan, I am truly saddened at your unacceptable experience. Maple Street strives to serve our comfort food consistently across all locations, that is one of our most important guiding principles! So I apologize that you did not experience the standard of service that you are entitled to. I can only imagine the frustration of feeling that you are forced to go further than necessary for the experience that you deserve. If you will allow us to have one more chance to serve you correctly I would love to offer to make it right! Please allow us to show you that we are the standard of what you’re expecting, and that you can trust us to provide an encounter worth coming back. Hope to hear from you soon!

Kristina Watson
Assistant Community Leader, Charlotte Location
Kristina.watson@maplestreetbiscuits.com

name: K Sobiesiak
text: This place has the absolute best coffee and service! I can’t say enough good things about the customer service Keda and Emily gave me. I stopped by this week because I wanted an iced coffee with their signature maple brew but I couldn’t order it through the app and I didn’t have my wallet so it was my only way to pay. They were so patient and figured out a way to get my order right while using their website to order. I love that I can walk here and order ahead from my phone. Give this place a try and say hi to “Keda” and “Emily” next time you’re here.

The collard greens were a full side on the poor little biscuit sandwich so I couldn't eat it. I decided to toss the wet biscuit. Not the kind of review I usually give especially when trying to support local businesses during the pandemic.

name: Keith Vertrees
text: Didn't honor curbside even though it was on their ordering page. We tried the maple biscuit, biscuit and gravy, and hash brown pie. They were all mediocre.

resp.text:
Hi Keith Vertrees,
I'm Caroline Milburn, with Maple Street Biscuit Company Charlotte.
In response to your review, I would like to personally apologize for being ill equipped to handle your order at the time. If you give me the chance I would love to make it right in any way I can.
We do have curbside, and I explained to my team that even though we are busy during a rush that we should always do curbside. I also asked the team to use better practices while handling curbside requests from guests and gave them some ideas on how to implement the process better.
If you would like to return, I would love to serve you and some guests on the house. Please ask for Caroline.
Email: carolinedavismilburn@gmail.com

name: Bryan Watts
text:
I was excited to see this place open and I've attempted to give this place the benefit of the doubt. It's a tough location for a restaurant and there's not a big crowd of us around for lunch. That said, the prices are out of this world expensive for the quality of the food, especially at lunch. And the kitchen has been slow each of the five times I've visited, despite there being very few guests.

The management/ownership also seems to operate with little care for their guests or the surrounding businesses. Even on slow days, there are 3-5 managers/owners there that regularly take up most/all of the temporary visitor spaces located near the restaurant, inhibiting both their guests from being able to easily park and eat, as well as guests of surrounding businesses from being able to easily park and attend meetings, etc. When the guest spots are full, they often park in the fire lane/drive, blocking in cars, etc. To top it off, at least one of the management misuses a handicap placard to park a Hummer in the handicapped space directly in front of the restaurant. I was nearly run over by her today as she parked and climbed out of the car staring at her phone.

I'm not usually one to write bad reviews, but there's a reason the place is empty for lunch on days when La Rev across the parking lot is busy. La Rev, 8.2.0 or VBGB are much better options in the area.

name: LaMonica Riley
text: Just had the chicken wings but I will be going back to try other things off of the menu. Great location!!!! And I can't wait to see the entire area next trip. Sorry I neglected to take pictures.

text: Waitresses were not trained to wait a large group of people. The location is nice but they could use more people when groups are large. Food was ok!  They served food in glass plates and in paper plates witch was kinda weird. If your gonna use glass use glass. It looks more professional. But overall it was ok

text: We only went there for drinks and to find out more about the whole music complex. Mission accomplished. Can't answer about the food because we didn't order any.

name: Beckey Gulley
text: I never write reviews but I had to because of my experience last night at this restaurant. Some friends and I met up to go to a concert and thought we would go to a nice place to eat before so our friends decided on the factory Cafe, our friends were already there sitting on the patio we have to go inside after waiting a few min to get the waiter (who with 2 other server's were standing at the bar talking) to come out and take our order. if he had only used a pen to write down our drink order maybe he might have gotten it right and carried it on the tray instead of four trips we would have gotten past that part without using another co-worker to help one drink at a time. We ordered the muscles and Wing appetizers the wings came out fully uncut and cold it looked pretty on the plate but was not the traditional wings most are use to plus we had to ask for the blue cheese and napkins that we had ordered with them to begin with, who serves wings without napkins? they were out of mussels so I decided on a Cobb salad the Cobb salad came out with just lettuce, tomato, chicken, bacon, three slices of avocado and a boiled egg cut in half there was No roquefort cheese chunks No vinaigrette which I had asked for on the side when the food came out, instead of a vinaigrette they brought me white vinegar & oil in separate souffle cups. The other couple's food looked fantastic one had the shrimp and grits and one had the rib plate which smelled really good but the meat had no flavor she was not impressed . When it was all said and done we got our bill and it was well over $100 in my personal opinion I do not think that it was worth even $50 and I don't believe that you should waste your time and money on this establishment ...

name: Rico Palmer
text: 1st time i went, the place was pretty good. Decent drinks and the fish was banging! This 2nd time was the worse. I was greeted nicely. Went to the bar to get a drink but there was no bartender. Some guy kept walking back and forth as if he was the boss but he never would even acknowledge me. So I sat and sat some more, so finally in disgust i got up and left. I asked the greeter was there even a bartender and she acted all surprised that no one helped me...girl u saw me sitting there all that time; stop playing! Im betting they wont be in business long if they keep this up.

name: Daniel Boyce
text:
Amazing Greek coffee options, phenomenal staff, and food looks amazing. I went to this place based on a referral I received from the owner of Ilios Crafted Greek and I'm so glad I did! If you want an amazing Greek coffee (rather difficult to accomplish in my book), this place is a must. I had the Freddo Cappuccino which is a double iced espresso with frothed milk and it was absolutely amazing. The quality of coffee, richness of flavor and authentic Greek coffee taste makes it one of my new favorites. I plan to try the frappe next and then migrate to a few of the hot coffee options.

I went back for a second time to check out their food and was very pleasantly surprised. The turkey avocado panini is everything I would have expected with the perfect blend of seasoning and ingredients so every item of the sandwich could be tasted without one thing overwhelming the others. My colleague ordered the Greek Toast and said it too was perfect and exactly what he was hoping for.

We also ordered the sundae crepe which of I were on vacation, I would literally eat every day of the vacation. The cookie interior was perfect without being too much frosting or cookie. The crepe was perfectly fine and the gelato on top literally made it the perfect dessert for all ages. I will absolutely be back for more!

If you are looking for a place with amazing Greek coffee and delicious desserts while also serving great quality and healthy food (to justify The desserts and coffee😉), I would highly recommend checking this place out! The desserts are definitely what is drawing most people along with the amazing Greek coffee, but with food that's delicious as well, it's worth adding to the list of spots to check out.

The tzatziki spread was delicious.  My wife had the Apple Pecan salad and loved it.  Looking forward to tasting some of the desserts and authentic coffee. Give this place a try you won't be disappointed!!

text:
Plaza Midwood
.......ummmm.....price was as expected.  Could do it yourself for 3/4 of the price.  Front doors need cleaning.  Time to lean, time to clean.  The Cashier needs to get up to speed on their products.  And why wear the gloves if you are going to touch money, the cash register,  etc?

resp.text: Hi Richard - Thanks for your honest feedback.  We will take your comments as teaching opportunities and improve our business.  And BTW that's our founder's favorite saying - "If you have time to lean you have time to clean".  We'll work on that with our crew members.  Hope we see you again.

name: J
text:
QTs are the best gas stations and this location is no exception.  Love their selection of teas and drinks. Got a big cup of unsweet green tea and an ice cream cone for less that $2.
Gas prices always competitive.
Guy at the front was super nice and gave me change for the car wash next door.

name: Joe Alpha
text:
The best thing about QTs are the processes in place at each location. Although this location has its challenges, it is held to the standard we expect from QT.

A big part of the reason is because of the courteous staff such as Ryan and the team.

Great job Ryan!

name: Joe Dostie
text: Its ok... what's to describe...its a gas station

name: Marti Hopkins
text: My mom went in and bought a 2 pack of Goodie powers and $20 in gas. The guy at the regegaster told her he would turn on the pump when she pulled over to it. We moved to the pump and it never came on even after ppl went in and asked them to turn.it on. I went in and they told me that they could not find it on their computer. My mom had to go back in.and she still had to tell them that she wanted her money back, the pump turned on, or she was calling the cops. They turned on the pump and said that the other guy must have done it and he had already left for the day. Now all this happened within 5 minutes so he must have run the hell out of there.

name: Florence Howard
text: The QT at 3025 Wilkinson Blvd has not kept up with the cleanliness of their stores.  When QT started  in Charlotte, NC it was the rival all other store. As the other locations continue to achieve and accomplish that task at hand. The Management continue to have under staff working  while bathrooms not being clean. Soap is not ready available If you are walking in the restrooms at this QT for women it is not uncommon to find thing out of place when  they should be better at this by now.  At first QT was what this neighborhood need, but now I am only waiting for the next store to come in that same location,  or across the street.  It may not shut them down but it will give them a run for there money.

Staff was super helpful and kind. Gas was $2.12/gallon! The limited time mint dessert drink was $1.99 for any size. Restrooms were clean. Easy in and out.

Update 3/16/18:
This is well lit, but this would probably be considered an unsavory neighborhood with the Paper Doll strip club a block or two away. I visited at night and maintained aware of my surroundings. One man was loitering on the property asking customers for money. Best price for gas in the area.

name: Belinda B Bennett
text:
This is my 2nd time in 2 weeks visiting this location to purchase gas and the pump has no receipt paper. It's usually between 7 - 7:30 am. The benefit to pay at the pump is the convenience of not going into the store. Having to request a receipt defeats the purpose.
I asked to speak with a manager and I was directed to speak to Zee H. He showed no concern. His response, " It must be jammed." So rather the paper is jammed or no longer in the machine, these things need to serviced and maintenance.  It's the little things that are attended to that can make a good or bad impact on a customer's visit.
I also noticed that behind the front cashier's counter there was a lot if paper all over the floor. Presentation also goes a long way especially at 7:15 in the morning while knowing this is a 24 hour opened location like most QT's.

name: James Wood
text: Big clean and friendly store. Great addition to the area. Great selection of products. Exceptional customer service. Clean restrooms a big plus. Highly recommend.

text:
Hey the gas prices at this location are often outstanding and it can get very congested.  Today I was unable to get a pump at around 10-11 AM because they were all taken.  So instead of waiting I paid $2.57 across the street. QT was $2.49.

I have one complaint at QT: no Little Debbie snack cakes! Apparently the company philosophy is to ONLY offer the more costly brands to increase their profits on each sale.

I appreciate the free air for my tires. QT pizza rocks!

name: C Mercer
text: I drive around Charlotte approximately 300 miles a day. My favorite places for a quick break, a bite to eat, a cold drink, gas and to use the facilities are the QuikTrip service stations. Most of these stations are clean, orderly and have clean facilities. This location however is the exception. I have yet to use the facilities here when they were actually clean without tissue and trash all over the floor or excrement from overflowing toilets. There's always garbage in the floor around the coffee donut area and the employees are probably the least friendly of any of the stores I've entered. I doubt that corporate would be impressed with this facility. I realize that this location is not in the best area of Charlotte but do you really think that's an excuse? I don't

name: Prophetess Kolani
text:
When this QT place opened less than three years ago it was my daily stop for coffee. The summer it teally began to show a lack of care. The coffee cream dispenser was often empty and there was never any whip cream. Two of the ice dispensers were empty or broken. The place also isnt as clean. This store seems poorly stocked too. At 6:30 AM no coffee creamer or fresh pastries? Construction workers, teachers, and police officers tend to notice this. I'm
So dissapponted in management at this location. This is near the airport and an Ideal location for QT to be successful if the care is there. Unfortunately, it seems like this site has become the sad stepchild of the chain.

name: Frank George
text: I've had very good meals here. It's festive and great for a group of people or a celebration. Margaritas and other drinks are always good. I really like the bar. My only problem with Maverick is it closes too early.

name: Mathew Pellegrino
text: Where do I start, they sell soft drinks that I personally make and it was watered down which was a major disappointment. The service was extremely slow and it wasn't a busy day, it took several minutes to even be greeted at the door. It took almost 15 minutes before our order was taken. Our appetizer came out a minute before our main course and it was just a cup of queso. Never got complementary chips and salsa to start munching on, yet all the other tables did. The tacos I ordered were a bit bland in the taste department. The beans were undercooked and hard and the street corn was rotten at the end. Overall my wife and I were completely disappointed. There are a lot better taco places in the Charlotte area to go to.

name: Sandra Huggins
text: Caprese Wrap, French Dip, Fries, Cruiser Wrap...... addicted to this pace! We take a break every once in a while but this pace has become a pretty constant staple to our week! I have ordered this early to take home before..husband and kids love it too. Now let me tell you, they went above and beyond with that take home order!! Made sure that it was all packaged so that it would not get soggy. Love the people that work there!!

resp.text: Thank you Sandra.  We love feedback for good and ways we can improve which we are always striving for.  Please take this in for a buy one get one meal for your family from our take and bake menu!  Must order ahead.  Thank you again for your kind review!

name: Andrew Stephens
text: Good food, good service, made to order. I went here 63 times last year according to my Google time line! Both breakfast and lunch is phenomenal. Recommend call ahead ordering as perfection (and fresh food) takes time!

name: Gabe Barker
text: Had the Vegan burger. It's black bean based so it falls apart easily. It was tasty! Fries were good too. I'd come back the next time I'm in the area.

text: Super close to work and the food is very good. Not aways as clean as it could be, but the staff will treat you like family. So there is aways a friendly atmosphere.

text: The variety of items on the menu and how well each of them tastes is incredible for such a small restaurant. Tucked away on Minuet Lane in the Vanguard Center business park across from Costco on Tyvola, this is a great lunch time eatery. Run by a mother/daughter team,  the prices are reasonable and the staff always pleasant and helpful.

name: Rose Doherty
text: WOW!!!  You guys just substituted a 0.99 cent a PACK hot dog for a Nathan's hot dog.   Shady, shady, shady.

resp.text: Rose, I'm sorry to hear this and will investigate as I am out of town and am adamant about using Nathan's or sabretts all beef hot dogs and there may have been an emergency substitute used.  Thank you for your feedback and I'd like to extend a credit to you for your next meal on us up to $7.oo.  Just show us this message the next time you come in.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Kindly, Mary - owner/operator.

name: alan cohen
text: Food wasn't bad.  Just a little grill type place.   Had a buffalo chicken wrap and fries.  Could have been better but still edible.

resp.text: Alan, thank you for your review.  We are always looking for ways to make improvements.  Please email me at eatatmenus@gmail.com and advise how our staff can improve.  Enjoy lunch on me your next visit as I appreciate your feedback.  Kindly, Mary - owner

text: I've ordered from this restaurant a few times and the food was good but my last experience was pisspoor at best! My chef salad arrived in a dirty, quite possibly previously used, container and my salad had several hairs laying on top of it. When I called to complain I was transferred once and then I spoke to someone who seemed truly unbothered and barely gave an audible apology.  Needless to say, I won't be ordering from this place again. The 2 star rating encompasses all of my experiences with this location...

name: Walter Johnson
text: This place has a delicious variety of delicious style sandwiches, wraps, and salads. The food is served on real plates with real utensils. And you get the feeling that the staff knows their customers well. Definitely a good idea to have lunch if you are in the area.

name: Tiana M
text: Food was great, portions were plentiful. Will recommend eating here.

name: Sharon Wiggins
text: Great little place, tucked away in a business park off Old Pineville Rd. Burgers, wraps, salads, and its all delish!!

resp.text: Thank you Sharon!  We appreciate your comments and taking the time to write a review.  Enjoy a complimentary piece of pie or cookie on your next visit!  Show cashier this message for redemption.

name: Gabriela Antunes
text: Nice little place in a business area with great food. Got a full breakfast for $6. Also the staff is very friendly.

name: Tara Armer
text: It is a very welcoming diner with delicious food.

name: Daniel Biber
text: Basic, reasonable food. Nothing special.

name: Dae McDowell
text: ordered today for the first time through foodsby and i must say mannnn it was amazing!!!

name: Francesca Hager
text: 3.50 for a fruit bowl with 2 slices of banana which are very very brown...never again

name: Ankur Goyal
text: Loved this place. Great food

name: Bobby Brinson
text: 36 minutes for a chef salad the ingredients were the cheapest ham and turkey I've ever seen also when does olives and banana peppers come on a chef salad on top of that had to stand there and listen to the chef scream very loudly, yelling about someone from GrubHub was just going to have to wait until they were good and damn ready this place had good reviews we gave it a shot will never be back to yourself a favor save your money

name: mike steigerwald
text: Nice little place, food is good. Only thing is, it seems to be very slow at times and you can wait a little while for your food.

text: Great Place and Great People and Great Food!!!!!

name: Ignis
text: The lady that took my order was nice and reasonable while doing multiple things at once. I couldn't really complain much unless I nitpicked so that was good. If any employee/manager reads this, hope you have a good day and God bless you.

name: Pamela Dunn
text: The quality of the food just ain't the same. And the customer service is horrible at various locations

name: Mcclure's Clean
text: fries nasty not even done

name: Carolyn Washington
text:
This is by far not only the worse McDonald’s but the worst fast food experience and restaurant experience ever. The staff attitudes were atrocious and they had nothing in stock and machines not working. The rating speaks for itself on here. I’m surprised
They even have a 1.8 star. Walmart and McDonald’s should
Both be ashamed after this location.

name: The Backwards Ending
text: Got a McRib and was completely disappointed. Had to put bbq, onions and pickles on it at home because the staff can’t be bothered.

name: Maya Cannon
text: Food was fresh.

name: Nolan Kopp
text: Worst mcdonalds I’ve been too. The old woman at the cashier could barley speak English and didn’t get my order right. I asked for a sundae and she said “so no large fry?” I didn’t wanna argue so I left. Plus This McDonald’s was sketchy af with weird people asking me for money while I waited for my food. Just close this place down. A McDonald’s in a Walmart doesn’t make sense.

name: Franck M
text: Well, it's McDonald's alright. Got a happy meal for my son; 1 option unavailable for the drink, 1 option unavailable for the dessert, fries upside down in the bag and no happy meal box. Plenty of room to improve.

name: La-Trenda Herring
text: It literally took 20 minutes for 2 filet of fish.  This has to be the slowest fast food restaurant in Charlotte.  Manager on shift is not customer friendly whatsoever

name: Will Burgess
text: I've had some crappy experiences at McDonald's but this was by far the absolute worst. Out of multiple items and had to wait for five mins in line while the cashier's talked about the local gossip with their friends. Then proceeded to act like I had interrupted their gossip session by placing an order... still standing in line ten mins later to receive my food.

name: Karen Flores
text:
$.50 cents for a small cup of ice???
I dont want to drink any soda o sweet tea... So why charge 50 cents when you can buy 8 lbs of ice for $1.00 at burger king

name: Arya Offer
text: If it have done a high volume of shopping at Walmart north tryon and really tired, then McDonalds in this center will provide a perfect relief with good burger and drinks. So shop big and have some nice burger, drink and fries at McDonalds :)

name: alex smith
text: It is a very good Place

name: Joshua Sherfinski
text: Understaffed doesn’t cover it. It took twenty minutes to get our food. At 4 on Tuesday.

name: Tracy King
text: Takes forever to get food .When l got it food was cold.Avoid this place.No one wants cold food.

name: Justin Lor
text: Horrible customer service. Corporate, you need to do something about the staff. If you hate your job that much, quit. Old lady taking my order gave the biggest attitude, I just gave her a piece of my mind and took off.

name: Floyd Richardson
text: Ice cream

name: Yee Lee
text: Maybe I got the wrong plate but portions were just not satisfying imo. Overall I'm still loving the bbq so 4 stars for good food. Service was welcoming and attentive.

name: Cody Eagle
text: The food was great I like that you can eat outside and the staff were great and the presentation was good along with the location

name: Larry Kime
text: First time at Shane's. Went based on a recommendation.  Was in the mood for ribs. My expectations were exceeded. Had a half a rack of baby backs. They were meaty, moist and flavorful. The spicy sauce was perfect for the ribs. I will be back.

name: Titus Jeffries
text: The ribs and brisket are amazing. I love how the staff shows you your take out orders before you leave to ensure you’ve got your order right. The staff was very friendly.

name: Nicole Kassan
text: One of the best BBQ places in Charlotte. Great menu selection. Make sure you sign up for their rewards program so you can receive coupons and specials!

name: Matt Tucker
text: Incredible portions and good food. Ordered through doordash and it came faster than expected with a lot more food than I had planned. Only reason it wasn’t 5 starts is they forgot my desert, but the food was so good I forgot about it as well.

name: K Kelly
text: Good & fresh food. Passing through on vacation.Would definitely revisit if in area again. Customer service is outstanding.

name: Sara Echevarria
text: Best food in town! Big portions, great price! Service today was awesome! Very pleased.

name: Chris LePage
text: Really liked the Shaniac burger and the pulled pork. Ribs aren't too bad either. The spicy sauce is my favorite but they have a good variety to try.

name: Anna Rajnovich
text: Love these ribs. The cobbler is tasty, love the location. Clean bathrooms, nice/attentive staff

name: Antonio Battle
text: Smoked chicken is great! Ribs have been dry both times I've tried them though. Sides are just ok.

resp.text:
Hi Antonio!
We are glad to hear you enjoy our smoked chicken! Thank you for your feed back on our ribs and sides, we will take your comments into consideration!

name: Ashley Little
text: Visit here atleast once every two weeks. It my take the kitchen a few times to get the order right but the smoked honey bbq wings are definitely well worth the wait!! My husband like ours extra black and crispy with fried okra and sweet potato fries.

name: Kyle Brown
text: I always get good food and good service here. The normal prices are fair and the rotating deals are even better

name: Bridget's Yoak
text: Love this place. No matter when we go we are never disappointed. The wings are amazing. Very nice staff.

name: Dylan Whitlock
text:
Wouldn’t recommend for takeout. Called to order and was put on hold for around ten minutes until I hung up and ordered somewhere else.

But both times I’ve dined in its been really good. Good in person service and the foods good and affordable. Location is in a shopping center area kinda hidden though.

resp.text:
Hi Dylan,
We sincerely apologize for the wait time, as we were experiencing a high volume of phone orders.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to serving you delicious BBQ again soon!

name: Daymean Lewis
text: Absolutely love this place and the fact that you can dine in or out adds to the experience. The food was great as always. Thank You.

name: Tim Harris
text: Best Shaniac Burger I've had out of all the Shane's I've visited. The girl at the counter was very nice any courteous!

name: Stacie Hall
text: If you're looking for a great BBQ meal, stop by SHANE'S RIB SHACK! SMACKING GOOD RIBS AND CHICKEN! HOWEVER, THE PEACH COBBLER IS OFF THA HOOK!! IN CHARLOTTE OFF OF NORTH TRYON IN UNIVERSITY

name: Andrew McDuffie
text: Tried the sampler today, and the Barbecue was disgusting, definitely wouldn’t order the Barbecue again. Probably the worst I have ever tasted.

name: Travis Miner
text:
BBQ is ok...nothing to write home about.
The weird part was that I thought the salad looked more appetizing than the BBQ plate I got.  Good food though.

name: Lu Nixon
text: Love the ribs. Small peach cobbler the best!

name: Carlos Hope
text: Customer service was a little bit better this time. Food was hot.

name: Pam Pearson
text: Great Food and reasonable pricef

name: Joe Mosier
text: I love shanes ribs. However, my last visit the ribs appeared to be yesterday's left overs. I was going to tell some one but everyone seemed too preoccupied to assist me. A manager came out and went to several tables asking if all was well, but didn't stop by mine. So i sat there and went online to their corporate website and posted my thoughts. To date they have not responded.

name: Jess Wilson
text: Pretty dang good for fast food barbecue.

resp.text:
Hi Jess,
Thank you for complimenting our Charlotte Shack! We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Blake Mills
text: Food is very good, especially at the price point. Cool place overall

name: Hvnshallburn 666
text: We went because the radio station promoted it. Staff was nice, but the wings were small and WAY overcooked.  Not many flavors either.  Wont be going back because there are way too many other bbq places out there that offer more.

resp.text:
Hi Hvnshallburn 666,
Thank you for praising our friendly Shack Crew members! We are, however, sorry to hear you did not enjoy your chicken wings. During your visit, did you also notify a Shack Crew member of your dissatisfaction, so they could have your wings remade? Customer satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us at Shane’s; we pride ourselves in providing exemplary customer service paired with delicious BBQ. Can you please provide us with your contact information, so the Manager may reach out to you directly? We appreciate you sharing your feedback with us.

name: Stephen Jones
text: Definitely the best chain barbecue restaurant I've been to

name: roger frazier
text: The BBQ ribs could've been sold by Goodyear they were so tough and rubbery! The portions were small. I was so disappointed when I got back to my room and dug in. The next time we're in town, we definitely won't eat here again!

name: Constance Haske
text: We've always had a good experience here. The food is tasty - but one amazing thing - kids eat free on Sundays! It even includes their drink (one kid meal per adult meal purchased).

name: SilviaAdrian R
text: OMG best BBQ I ever had in my life. I wish they would open one here in Connecticut we need it badly

name: Sean Stewart
text: Good barbecue can't beat their prices

name: R Aguila
text: One of the best places in Town to get "The Itis".

name: Scott Simmons

resp.text:
Hi Joey,
Thank you for complimenting our Charlotte Shack! We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Bunny
text: Waited an hour for our food!!...fries were half cold...food average. Seriously if I had not complained we would have waited longer. A huge party of people came before us and a few other customers. The people in front of us got their orders faster but we were stuck waiting MUCH longer and our order was only 2 items! The girl waitressing offered us to go somewhere else (c'mon you tell us this AFTER we have waited 40mins+) which infuriated us. By the way, the customer in front of us (in line) did not pay for his food. All the people in line had their orders taken without paying and its assumed at the end you'd pay but nope! The guy in front of us did not pay. He walked off. Don't blame him since he waited a long *** time for his food and poor customer service. Thank God for the young man at the register because he offered us courtesy items for waiting so long. You're the reason this place deserves 1 star and not 0.

text:
Good BBQ no brisket
Pulled pork sandwich was very good

name: sean johnson
text: The food was good and we didn't have to wait all day for it!

name: Marisha Williams

name: Corey Bishop
text: There's far better BBQ in CLT but if it's convenient for you to stop by Shane's, you will get a perfectly reasonable meal.

name: ANGELA CAMP
text: Lemon Pepper tenders are my favorite!!  ....Was disappointed when I noticed that they left out my Texas toast though

name: Sebastian
text: Try the sampler plate...regardless of how you put it together, you’ll win every time. Flavorful food without being overpowered, and reasonable prices to boot.

name: Grey Bar0n
text: Good BBQ. It's not outstanding in flavor compared to some other local  places (Bobbee O's) but it's still highly recamended. Would bang!

name: JJ CBOSS84
text: Service was quick and efficient but me and my girlfriend ordered the pulled pork with mac n cheese and green beans and okra which was steaming hot except the pulled pork was cool not and even warm! So they 3 ⭐ for me but i will back to try there peach cobbler!

name: Tom Dills

text: Food is great, a little pricey. This shopping center is a little strange, but the restaurant and restrooms were clean. Staff was very friendly.

text: I'm a fan of ALL BBQ. And I like here and City BBQ about equally. Price wise? Shane's comes in a little lower, which can swag my decision.

name: Nicole Bristol

name: Molly Koraly
text: We Were in the drive thru line when we were holding up the line line. One of the Employees said go to the window to get our orders! When we got there one of the employees dropped the money that the cashier gave him to give to our Group Home Manger! We will not come to this chick-Fil-a Again!

name: Christina Stevenson
text:
Incompetent workers. Normally my chic fil a visits are superb. At this location, I was skipped over while in line...I was only noticed when the line started backing up because I didn't move forward to drive up to pay because my order still hadn't been taken.
I get to the window speak to the manager and she offers a free cookie for a $16 order to make amends.
I receive my order and a drink is missing. An associate tells me that other drink hadn't been added to my order and she asks did I want to pay.
Are you serious?  This is the 2nd screw up you all have made today and you are going to nickle and dime me for a drink ...that should have been on the order in the first place.

This is the sorriest chick fil a I've been to. I wont be back!

name: billy mclaurin
text: Always Good Food

name: Pretti Precious
text: The Queen Damion or whatever sis’ name is is very rude and she needs to be glad I didn’t have time today!

name: Dennis
text: This Chick-fil-A location is OK. I go here often for lunch. Most times I have to wait for the spicy chicken sandwich to finish cooking before I’m able to grab my order and head to the cash register. The french fries are often also not available at the time in which I go. I have started going later than the standard 12 PM lunch time to avoid these rush situations however I still have to wait most times other than that the food is fresh and almost cooked order.

name: Traci Gee
text: Great chicken nuggets with Polynesian sauce 😋.

name: sebastien berube
text: Very nice location.  Food is what you would expect, service is perfect and the place is very clean.  They have a play area for the kids, so it's a good place to hang with young ones on a rainy day!

name: Michelle B.
text: Service is always great at Chick-fil-A.  The drive through line typically wraps around the restaurant but then the food is always hot and it doesn't take a long time to get through.  When necessary, they'll have someone come out to take orders so that the line moves faster.

name: Yoleima Aguilar
text: Excellent and fast food made at the time all fresh. I love them I recommend

name: Darryl Frost
text: Gonna miss them. I'm now vegan. But their food was always consistent and fresh!

name: Gina Garafola
text: I had heard alot if Great things about your Restaurant. I have never had Chick-fil- a  before so I decided to give it a try  I drivedrove around in circles for almost 10 minutes. My GPS kept telling me to make a left at Wells Fargo then a right, then to turn around  I got so frustrated I want back home.

name: Joanne Heilman
text: I love thw food and my daughter is 12 turning 13 can you reach me back for this job she can do

text: Really like this location. They do a lot of special and event with free breakfast. Heir drive thru is kind of in a wired spot though.

text:
(Translated by Google) For the attention also how rich is your pure quality food

(Original)
Por la atención además lo rica que esta su comida pura calidad

name: caroline cleland
text: I went in today with two young children.  We ordered smoothies.  While we were waiting we used the restroom. There were three stalls.  Two were so disgusting we all used one which was gross but not as bad.  The sink had no soap and was gross.  The worst part was the poop on the floor by the sink.  I have never been so disgusted by the state of a bathroom.  Two women came in and walked out.  During these times especially cleanliness is key.  The whole place was disgusting I got our drinks and dumped them outside after telling the girls about the bathroom, who didn’t care at all.  Never will I go back in this place.

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know about your visit. We are sorry to hear your  visit wasn’t great. We will be following up with this location to address what happened. If you would like to send us an email at customerrelations@cariboucoffee.com with the location you visited and the details of your experience we would love to help!

name: Sh C
text: I LOVE that they have partnered with Girls on the run!!!!

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know! We appreciate you being a Caribou customer! Have a great day!

name: Mary Floyd
text: I go every  couple of months to same place only because  they closed university  store.  Just NO customer service  here. I buy four bags of coffee 40.00 a shot I even sometimes  go to Greensboro  to get coffee and shop service is a little better there. Working with public  need to smile let them know u r happy to see them.

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out to us and we are sorry to hear about your experience, Mary. We will be following up with this location. If you would like to send us an email at customerrelations@cariboucoffee.com with the location you visited and the details of your experience we would love to help!

name: JA
text: Truly a good, reliable (consistent) flavor coffee each time you visit. It's not watery like many other cafes. Will keep going back again and again.  Wish every coffee place was like this. Great coffee, good friendly staff and a satisfying beverage.

resp.text: We're always happy to help you! Thank you, and we'll see you next time!

name: Samantha Rosenfeld
text: Caribou Coffee resides in the same shop as Bruegger Bagels for those who aren't aware. There's a divide between the two counters when ordering coffee versus breakfast items, although both sides do offer a small sampling of what the other is providing. The staff at Caribou Coffee were very nice and got my ordered filled quickly even on a hectic morning. The coffee itself (the flavored coffee option in caramel) was disappointing but I am used to very sugary lattes and this I'm sure was much healthier for me! The bathrooms, however, were pretty disgusting.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Samantha. We will share your comments with our leadership team. We appreciate you being our customer! Thanks again!

name: Rich Lange
text: Not many of these left but this little stand is a great one.  Knowledgeable staff that knows how to make all the drinks.  Friendly and handcrafted feel, and lots of space to get some work done on your laptop.

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know, Rich! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Amy O'Connor
text: Very nice workers. Had a hot  turtle mocha. Yuuuum!

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know, Amy! We appreciate you being a Caribou customer! Have a great day and we'll see you next time!

name: Austin Greene
text: Friendly staff & awesome coffee & bagels. Just what they advertised & they are damn good at it.

resp.text: Thank you for being our customer, Austin! We're always happy to help you!

name: Jay Casey
text: always good coffee

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, Jay! See you next time!

name: Ronald Spake
text: Great coffee and customer service!

resp.text: Thank you for stopping by, Ronald! We appreciate you being our customer!

name: Donald Dees
text: Don't get the iced coffee. I just paid $4.50 for ice and brown water. Total rip off.

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know about your visit, Donald. We are sorry to hear your drink wasn’t great. We will be following up with this location to address what happened. If you would like to send us an email at customerrelations@cariboucoffee.com with the location you visited and the details of your experience we would love to help!

name: Mimi Hsu
text: I think this is the last caribou coffee around in the city. I love all of their drinks and enjoy the vibe inside.

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know! We appreciate you being a Caribou customer! Have a great day!

name: Lauren Elizabeth
text: Its the best coffee around! Just so pricey!

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback, Lauren! If you would like to share more, please send us an email at customerrelations@cariboucoffee.com with the location you visited and the details of your experience.

name: Shanon Denzine
text: The service was prompt but my cappuccino was not flavored to my liking. This is not to say there is anything wrong with their coffee, it just was different than the flavors I'm used to. It was still nice to relax and enjoy a coffee slowly in their seating area. The store is in a nice strip mall with other interesting stores.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear your drink wasn’t great, Shanon. We will be following up with this location to address what happened. If you would like to send us an email at customerrelations@cariboucoffee.com with the location you visited and the details of your experience we would love to help! Thank you for being our customer!

text:
"New york style bagels" just a little smaller.
Staff are very friendly and eager to help. A bit overpriced but very nice place to enjoy a cup of joe.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Israel. We will share your comments with our leadership team. We appreciate you being our customer! Thanks again!

name: Julia Quackenbush
text: My favorite place! I will be back once in town

resp.text: We love to hear this, Julia! Thank you, and we'll see you next time!

name: Latoya Brown
text: Love my campfire mocha and my MN Viking Girl cup 💜💛 #tasteofMN

resp.text: We love to hear this, Latoya! Thank you for being our customer, and have a great day!

name: Sally Griffin
text: Great place for coffee and conversation or just spending some quiet time reading or writing.  Variety of coffee mixtures and small choice of pastries. Friendly staff, knowledgeable.  Helpful in making coffee or tea choices.  A favorite. Shares space with Brueggers Bagels, which offers visitors breakfast and lunch choices.

resp.text: Thank you, Sally! Have a great day, and we look forward to your next visit!

name: F W
text: Chocolate options include dark chocolate. I got a cute chocolate expresso bean on my drink. But it is 6 dollars for a coffee essentially.  I felt a little shortchanged on beverage.

resp.text: We appreciate you being our customer! Thanks for stopping by!

name: Marjorie Pierce
text: This is a wonderful place to eat a lot to choose from different bagels & meat cream cheese, oh my goodness please try the drinks call cool up or cool down it's delicious the drink has fresh fruit at the bottom of the drink amazingly good 😘

resp.text: We're always happy to help you, Marjorie! Thank you, and we'll see you next time!

name: Scott Davis
text:
The Caribou Coffee shares the retail space with Brugger's Bagel which made me almost miss it.
Caribou is on the right side of the space and walked right up to order.
They were quick to take the order as well as get it prepared. I got a campfire cooler and it was delicious on the hot summer afternoon!
The service was with a smile.
Don't forget to try a shot at the daily trivia question for a small discount.
Great visit.

They close at 6:30 but it’s 5:30 and they’re putting the chairs up on tables. Mopping and vacuuming... not exactly a nice atmosphere with an hour til closing. :/
It’s good they are finally cleaning up as pretty much every table was dirty with virtually no customers in sight...
edit. It’s 5:35 and a woman just approached the front door and then turned around without entering. Perhaps it was the chairs on the tables. Maybe it was the guy vacuuming in the front window. Maybe it was the other guy sweeping in the other front window? Lol
What a way to welcome people!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know, Virginia. We will share your comments with the store team to ensure your visits to this location are as comfortable as possible.

name: Christopher W.
text:
Very nice staff, good selection of hard goods (mugs, coffee accessories etc) and ample places to sit. Caribou coffee is rainforest certified which places it in a wonderful category to fight the devastating impact some coffee growers have on deforestation. (Just my pitch as to why they are a great choice above others!)

This shop shares a space with the adjacent bagel place which provides some nice lunch and breakfast options. If it's crowded up front, make sure to check the back for more seating and a quieter environment.

There is free wifi if you want to stay for a while and even at peak times, the staff is very efficient to get ya moving!

name: Mimi Hsu
text:
Went to the restaurant during their first open week. Loved the vibe and esthetic of the place. The wall art and decor fit perfectly. The staff and owners were extremely friendly. Had the lemonade and it was delicious. The udon dish tasted delightful and exactly what I was expecting. The dessert was unique and very flavorful. It was a donut ice cream sandwich that changes flavors monthly. I loved that the ice cream was coated in cocoa krispie cereal.
Would definitely come back.

name: David Le
text: Wow! Really nice and sleek place! I had the dumplings and bbq udon. Man, those dumplings were so good. They had this smoked taste that I had never tasted before on a dumpling. BBQ udon was different but good! Overall, I love the vibes and food.

name: Jonathan Harris
text: The origami shaped Gyoza was a nice touch and the sauce on top really complemented the dish overall. The spicy miso broth did not need any soy and after having the ichiraku, I feel like I can be next hokage.

name: Fergus Horner
text: The broth alone is worth visiting this place! The flavor is top notch and I'm excited that this place is now open!

name: Claire Hall
text:
Went tonight with my boyfriend and everything was delicious.

We had a pork dumpling app with 5 pieces and very light sauce/oil. 5/5

We split the Shoyu ramen (chicken base) and got a side of their hot chili oil. 4/5 the chicken was cooked perfectly, their soft boiled egg was charred and slightly sweet which I’d never had before and was probably my favorite part of the ramen. I wish the hot oil was spicier or more of a paste/sauce than oil. I also wish the corn was warm.

For dessert, we got the Akatskream. Basically an ice cream sandwich with a donut as the “bun.” 5/5 the ice cream flavors rotate and tonight we had the Black Sesame. Amazing. Will get this dish every time.

Overall, delicious. I can’t wait to come back for the Ichiraku (pork) ramen. Granted, we split a ramen, but with an app, meal and dessert it was only like $30 pre-tip. I also love paying electronically and not having to deal with printed receipts and going back and forth.

name: Carol Rego
text:
New ramen spot in East Charlotte. The vibe is awesome with modern decor, anime on the screens, and good music bumping. Food came out fast and service was friendly. I had the shoyu ramen which had a chicken broth. The broth was oilier than I would like but the toppings (corn, greens, egg) were great. The donut dessert was tasty and creative as well. Not the best ramen in town, but definitely worth checking out.

Note: They're currently only open for dinner Thursday to Sunday.

name: Europa Jupiter
text: Good in general. But the ramen is too sweet.

name: Kyle Taylor
text: Incredible food, chill atmosphere and great staff. This is the new spot!

name: Chris Cordoba
text: Ichiraku ramen was amazing!

name: Jeremy Thompson
text: Needs many improvements if they are going to make it.

name: Anastasia M
text:
This Butchery and Wine Bar was absolutely amazing. I'm so happy I stumbled into this little place.

The fresh meat cooked in front of you to a variety of wine selections you can purchase by the bottle or by the cup was amazing. The food was filled with flavor and with responsible pricing.

The staff was extremely friendly and very helpful. If you're near the area don't forget to stop by for a nice dinner alone or with a significant.

name: Brandon Gage
text: The best quality and selection of meats in Charlotte, hands down! Staff is extremely friendly and knowledgeable. Can’t wait to go back!

resp.text: Thank you for the great review, Brandon. We hope to see you again soon!

name: Derrick Meulman
text: The food is fantastic! Great place to hang out and have a glass of wine or beer.

resp.text: Derrick, thank you for the fantastic review. We are happy you enjoyed your meal!

name: Rick Benfield
text: Great cozy place!  Wonderful wine and craft beer selection,  the meat offerings are top notch,  they will even cook to order.   On top of that,  first class service from the owners and staff!

resp.text: Thank you Rick! It was a pleasure serving you!

name: Nancy Gonzales Eastman
text: This place is fantastic and the food was delicious. They have seating in back and a bar so you can order and eat there.  The bar staff is outstanding and made some great recommendations. The butcher shop is up front so the meat was incredibly delicious. Usually, I hate networking meatballs because they’re usually dry and can bounce like a ball. The meatballs were moist and very flavorful. It’s also a great place to drop in and just sit at the bar and have a great glass of wine.

resp.text: Nancy, thank you for the wonderful review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your food!

name: Billy Myers
text:
New York Butcher Shoppe has everything a decerning meatonista needs for the grill and beyond!
YOU need to check it out soon!
Have a great time... ⌚👍🍻

name: Chad Mcgee
text: Too good to be true.  Fine meats and wine and plenty of easy to prepare meals for home.

resp.text:
Thank you Chad! We appreciate you visiting with us!
-AT

name: Thomas Taylor
text: Great food

resp.text: Thank you Thomas! Come.back and see us soon!

name: Tina Blundell
text: I grew up in Greenville, SC going to a NY Butcher Shoppe, but this one blows that place out of the water.  The dining options alone to be able to take home sides and full family meals is amazing.  I love this place.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Tina! We look forward to seeing you again soon! We really do appreciate you!

name: Joshua Burrell
text: Fantastic little shop with some quality cuts of all variety.  During this pandemic they have been a staple and a great source of resources.  Shop is always kept incredibly clean and organized and the staff is very accommodating.  Thanks for all the hard work!

resp.text: Thank you Joshua! We certainly appreciate the feedback and look forward to continuing to serve you.  See you soon!

name: Justin Ferencz
text: Nice selection of prime meats, tasty pre-made items for tailgating, knowledgeable and helpful staff

resp.text: Thank you Justin! We're delighted to serve you. Please let us know if there is anything at all that we can assist you with.

name: Cody Zirkle
text: Had everything I wanted and then some. They are being mindful of COVID social distancing while providing Grade A products with awesome service.  Their meats are wonderful.  They have numerous side dishes as well as some pastas and dips.  They also have a nice selection of wine and what looks like a wine bar.... wasn't able to try this out due to the COVID.  Definitely worth checking out whether you're in the area or not.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Cody! We certainly appreciate your support during these times and later once we return to normal. See you soon!

name: Dustin Dubay
text:
We have been regular customers of the New York Butcher Shoppe for a few months now, and we can't look back. The cuts of meat are delicious. We get the chicken often and love picking up some salmon and scallops from them. The scallops are unreal. They have great side and vegetable options, and the wine selection is excellent. We members of the wine club and are always really happy with the wine they pick out. Normally they do an event each month as well for members, but due to covid have instead given out a treat with the wine. Last month it was three delicious sausages. Also, they carry deserts (try the brownies, you won't regret it).

Also, to give you an idea of the customer service, this past weekend was our anniversary. We each ordered a filet with sides, a bottle of wine, truffle fries, and some scallops. Everything was cooked perfectly and we were super excited. When we arrived home we noticed the scallops were missing. We gave them a call, and they actually drove us the scallops to our home (TALK ABOUT CUSTOMER SERVICE). We love this place, and are now planning our weekly meals around it!

resp.text: Thank you Dustin! We loved making your anniversary dinner! We appreciate both of you ❤️🙏

name: brentley metcalf
text: The quality of the food here is exceptional!

text: Ok this place is hands down one of the top 10 places to go in Charlotte! Their food, service and overall atmosphere are just beyond amazing. I could go on and on... The Wednesday Wine Club is the best and I will be back with more friends in tow!

text: The service, atmosphere, & food is very good here. Prices are also great for the amount of food. Ordered a steak flight with 3 different cuts of meats & good toppings for $16 & the limoncello cake was Devine! They also had ready made sides & a premium meat selection.

text: Good food, good service and decent atmosphere. This is the old Sage restaurant and bar but they have cleaned it up and it is much nicer now. Besides there's a tattoo salon upstairs.

name: Tyrone Wesley
text: I had an awesome time here, vibe was great. The was cool, the food and drinks are so worth it

name: Anastasia M
text:
I'm not quite sure what to say regarding Tattooz and Booz. There was a laundry list of reasoning why I would never return to this location.

The staff was extremely impolite, slow on service and not informative at all about the status of food and drinks. My party and I waited 2 hours and had to ask for a manager to figure out what was going on. Our food was never prepared and at this point we only managed to have one or so drinks. Even the process of getting a check for these drinks took longer than we wanted to and ended up leaving cash in the table and leaving.
From start to finish the service was horrible. I was able to taste someone else's food. I can admit if you're not in a rush to eat and don't mind enjoying the music blasting or a sports game happening; the food was amazing! I personally just don't like my time wasted without an explanation in the beginning.

Short on staffing does not equal poor customer service service.

name: COREY SHIPP
text: Had a good time, plus the women in there were so fine, I wanted to buy them all a drink, but I'm not about that life.

name: Kisha Degree
text:
First time there it was and okay experience
..the wait staff my friends and I had to chase down for our check..the building is beautiful..no dance floor to be honest. Was looking to come turn up. Went to another club to dance

name: Chronicles Watkins
text: Had a great time for little sister Bday.. Thursday nights are comedy night.. $10.00 entry a d parking is $6.00.. You can park elsewhere if you don't mind walking. Staff was nice and friendly.

name: Jaycee Cowan
text: Went in to support the business. It was my son's birthday and wanted to show him a good time try something new and eat a good meal but we could not get any service. Couldn't get menus the waitress came back to our table twice and still had no menus. We went to the bar and the bartender with no smile no nice greeting just told us it's gonna be a wait. The place was not crowded but it was obvious the bartender was overwhelmed. Won't be going beck

name: Kris Mcgowan
text: I sat at a table for almost an hr waiting for a server. I was constantly told someone was coming and no one did. When my guest arrived 30 mins later they were not allowed in because of capacity but other guest were ushered in with no problem. Excuse was they were VIPs. Sad cause it's a very nice space and atmosphere but it could be run so much better. First of all hire more staff. I'm a server hell and I was mad how they was missing the money they could be making if more efficient. Second get the policy straight.

name: Reginald Landrum
text: Thursday night comedy shows! Good food and drinks!

name: Chews Luv
text: Horrible! Don't go if you are hungry or  going to be hungry within a 3 hr period. Me and my Crew had reservations for 2:30. We didn't get our food till 5 and I am not even kidding. Food got there and it was old and Drenched in grease. had to call for a manager twice before one came. Nice place, I get the concept butttt the food service is a no baby!

name: SB
text: I noticed that the bartender by the kitchen tipped herself and shorted me my change. I can only imagine if im sober how ppl that are drunk dont even notice. I dont like that. On a brighter note the food is good. Rumor of car break ins on the weekends. I suggest uber or walk

text: Nice atmosphere. Weekend are live lol so be prepared to mingle

text: We had great time at the show! The drinks was like juicy juice so I would not recommend coming here for adult drinks but the food was great!
