Came with my family on a Saturday night around 6 thinking it would be busy, it was busy, but no wait. Service was good. I had the Keywest Shrimp and Chicken.  Loved it!!  Everyone enjoyed their food.

name: Crystal Richardson
text: Customer Service was great. I did a pick up order, everything was packaged will and food was tasty.

name: Traies Butler
text: The worst fast food experience ever..how do you bring hot appetizers and cold entree's..I asked for two to go boxes and tipped the waiter and quickly exited

name: E. S.
text: Monte Cisco and broccoli casserole are awesome

name: Geoffrey “Ironmonger” Perrin
text: I used to give it 5 stars until the prices went up. Food is still great, but some of my favorite dishes were removed and I used to try and sell people on how good the food was for how cheep it was compared to other sit down places, but since the price increase on everything to expected amounts I can't say that anymore. Used to be my favorite place to eat. Too pricy and lost some of my favorite stuff

resp.text:
Hi Geoffrey - I'm sorry to hear our menu changes have left you disappointed. I'd love to follow up with you in regards to the concerns you've shared with me. When you have a moment, please feel free to email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com with your name/Google Handle, phone number, and any details pertaining to our menu changes.

I look forward to hearing from you!

-Gabi

name: Devrone Johnson
text: Slow but very good.

name: Gems4 Turner
text: Great food. Worth the drive.

name: Mike Rufty
text: Why the 3 stars? Well the food quality was on par with the price. And the server was friendly. The soup did not come out with the salads. They came out after the meal, 1 bowl was full and the other was only half full as they stated they ran out. It was not warm enough to even melt the cheese on top. Drinks were taken to be refilled, but never returned.

name: Arethia Shaw-Green
text:
Food was Awesome hot and delicious
On the other hand I would have given them 5 Stars but the manager was rude unprofessional and need customer service training.. My co-workers and I went for dinner on December 8th for our Christmas gathering. Our waiter was nice fun and great.. This was a group of 10 ppl. We where bounced  around the tables until we where move to a table that blocked an exit. Not of our doing but the waiters. When the manager approaches us. She uttered loudly we are blocking the exit that's a safety violation. And we need to move to the other side of the restaurant. Long story short we took matters in our own hands and moved our table away from the exit keeping our party together.. It was a little busy and unorganized. Overall we enjoyed our night..

name: Stacey Coles
text: Very fast service, the first plate of food came out cold but they quickly replaced it with a fresh hot plate. The Painkiller will have you lit! Its their best drink. The prices are reasonable, very family orientated. The server looks like like the bearded weirdo guy from The Hangover movies and smells the way he looks. I felt bad for his server trainee who had to shadow him all night. The food was fresh, delicious and very filling. There's no way you're leaving without a to go bag. We will be back!!!!!

name: Rodney Berger
text: You have got to try the bourbon glazed salmon.  I asked for suggestions because it was our first time there.  I was told the bourbon glazed salmon was fantastic and it absolutely was fantastic.  I was completely impressed with the food.

resp.text:
You can never go wrong with the bourbon glazed salmon, Rodney! Glad to hear your first visit was a memorable one. Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Paula White
text: Was delicious especially the grilled chicken Alfredo yummy if u havent tried it. I recommend you try it

name: Rosetta Cloud
text: Great food..

name: Jacob Hughes
text: All 5 people at our table had empty drinks at the same time, our ribs were the toughest I've ever been served

name: Coach Tasha Moore
text: My food was cold... The server was great. But I should have to say my food is cold. Disappointed

resp.text:
This is concerning to hear and certainly not the type of visit we'd want for you, Tasha. When you have a moment, please feel free to email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com with your name/Google Handle, phone number, and receipt so we can better understand your recent experience.

I look forward to hearing from you!

-Gabi

name: Erica “ItsAyriecahKane” J.
text: I got the chicken pot pie which was good and my margarita was huge and delicious. The waiter took a long time to bring out our food but the croissants were excellent.

name: CORY JOHNSON
text: Bourbon bacon wrapped shrimp and steak with loaded baked potato. This was so delicious however the shrimp was a little salty. Prices are great as well!!!

resp.text:
Awesome to hear, Cody! Thanks for stopping in - hope to see you again very soon!

-Gabi

name: BK
text: Prices were great. Food was great I had tilapia  and shrimp with mango salsa. My sides were mac n cheese & broccoli. The food was excellent not to mention the honey crossiants.

name: Heather
text: I really like Cheddars. They have a large menu and everything I've had there has been good. Super easy to eat vegetarian with lots of great options. The croissants are delicious. Go ahead and order them when you get there. Service is usually pretty good. It was somewhat slow last time I went but I enjoy the food so it's not a huge deal to me.

name: D Parker
text: I must say I hadn't been to Cheddar's since all the bad rating and grades but as soon as we walked in the door we were greeted with excellent customer service. Our waitress was amazing and attentive and the food was great. I had the grilled fish and shrimp with broccoli and corn!

name: Terrell Guinn
text:
They do not have outdoor seating. Probably will not be back
.

name: Sharon Greer
text: Pretty decent place,  not as expensive as we expected.  There are a lot of food choices and our food was very good and exactly as we ordered. Loved the fish tank! We will be going back to this establishment.

name: Commecha Jordan
text: Food and service was GREAT!!...honey butter croissants are Ah-mazing.   I had grilled salmon and it was perfectly cooked.  New Orleans pasta was banging too. Reasonably priced

name: Gary Norris
text: Good food, staff has to speak up a little to talk over the music back ground, clean

name: Davarius Aiken
text: Serivce was great but the kitchen staff was not up to standard. Long story short after a meal came out wrong the replacement came out with raw salmon and I was told that it was because of the thickness of the fish by a member of management. However being a chef I know that was not the case but the only answer given my advice is to check the food you cook and order

resp.text:
Hi Davarius - I'd love to follow up with you in regards to your recent visit. When you have a moment, please feel free to email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com with your name/Google Handle, phone number, and receipt (if you still have it).

I look forward to hearing from you!

-Gabi

name: Princess Brown
text: They were pretty good!

name: Todd Heilig
text:
I know it was the first Sat after Christmas and expected it to be slower, but our experience was over 2 hours from being sat, to getting 1 round of drinks (non-alcoholic) with the croissants (honestly just bring drinks out and then croissants), to order placed, no refills during wait, we asked waitress and she said she wasn't sure if we wanted refill now or when she brought out the food?? (dumbfounded, first I've ever heard of this in the keep my sweet tea full in the South sweetheart), to getting served food by someone other than waitress, and our 1x refill after food was brought out by someone other than our server who never checked on us. This pic shows where my food did not arrive with rest of table's service. Someone other than waitress brought our food out and my food was just chicken tenders w buffalo sauce. We were in a booth and the waitress eventually brought my food separate handed my plate across the table and I burned my hand receiving my meal from where my portion of the plate had been under the heat lamp. When I nearly dropped my plate, the waitress never said sorry but that her end of the plate was not hot.
No emotion. No sense of urgency. No sense of care for our dining experience. It was literally take our order, bring it out and then the check and each step of the meal took 15-20 min intervals. Order, drinks w bread, salads no refills, then 4 out of 5 meals still no refills, my food, then refills, then check, then wait on her return for signing for our check... we were sat in rear of restaurant and there was a larger birthday party being served by a different waiter.
I am not one to complain and I was with family so I didnt want to show out. It was uncomfortable because we all felt like something should be said but we wanted to give the server the benefit of the doubt that it may have been the waitress' inexperience or poor training. But we couldnt even talk to the manager because she was already talking to another table in our section being served by the same waitress, who were sat after us. We were using gift cards and could have gone to Olive Garden or Long Horn like 5 other places instead. Lesson learned. We only had a party of 5. We ordered 2 waters and 2 sweet teas and an Arnold Palmer.
Either train staff better or at least find folks who treat people the way they would want to be treated.

name: andrea
text: The Watermelon margarita was delicious.

name: FNU LNU
text: I dropped by on a Friday night and stood at the empty entrance for 5 minutes and not a single person acknowledged me. No host, no manager, no no one. Then I decided to wait anither 5 just to see what would happen. Employees walked right by me, looked at me, and kept going. 10 minutes and not a single person did anything to acknowledge my presence. Not only will I never go back, I recommend somewhere a little more attentive...like the taco bell across the st.

resp.text:
This is frustrating to hear, and certainly not the type of experience we'd want for any of our guests. When you have a moment, please feel free to email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com with your name/Google Handle and phone number so we can better address the experience you had.

I look forward to hearing from you!

-Gabi

name: chanel ChanelB
text: Great food and our waiter was awesome!!! This was my first time @ Cheddar's and I was there celebrating my besties twin 15 bday....I most definitely will be back!

resp.text:
We're glad to hear your first visit was an enjoyable one, Chanel! Hope to see you in again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Monique Moore
text: I've given up. No matter which location: Gastonia, and off W.T. Harris, McCullough Commons...service BAD. This place can be empty and you will still wait 20 minutes for drinks. And for food? An hour. So don't go hungry. And I'm not referring to peak times!.3 chances, all epic fails. Twice I complained to management,  was given discounts on ticket. But the last time, food was bad, drinks bad, service bad, I just paid and left. Because I should have known better then to try again.  NOPE  .I'M DONE..

name: Lynn Sanityy
text: The prices are great! But the presentation of the food-not so great. This was my first time coming to this restaurant so I played it safe with my order and got the Chicken Alfredo with a Raspberry tea. The sauce in the food was great, but the pieces of chicken were huge, they put whole pieces of baby carrots in it that I literally had to take out of my bowl to slice up and put back, my cup was sticky from the Raspberry 'syrup' they must've used for tea... etc. I wanted to bring my fiance here for his birthday but I'm happy I tried it first! I don't think I'll be back.

name: Valencia Wade
text: Some of the best home style food ever! Their meatloaf is plentiful and AMAZING!

name: Brent Lyons
text: One of my favorite restaurants. The Buffalo chicken wrapper is the best

resp.text:
Delicious choice, Brent! Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: R LW
text: For a party of 12, our server did pretty well, although drinks came out slow and sometimes things were missing. Appetizers and food was good, but there was a little disconnect between drink orders and getting things on time.

resp.text:
While I'm happy to hear you and your party enjoyed your meals, I'd love to connect with you to better understand some of the service concerns you all had. When you have a moment, please feel free to email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com with your name/Google Handle, phone number, receipt, and any details that will help me understand what happened.

I look forward to hearing from you!

-Gabi

name: Lakeisha Gilchrest
text: The food was good but the service was slow. They forgot they sat is in a closed section.

resp.text:
Hi Lakeisha - We're disappointed to hear your recent visit was not the best it could be. When you have a moment, please feel free to email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com with your name/Google Handle, phone number, and receipt (if you still have it).

We're working hard to keep our standards high and serve our guests during this difficult time. Just so you know, we're still open and have a wonderful To Go/curbside system in place for the foreseeable future. We hope to see you soon so we can work on regaining your trust.

name: Boris Rogers
text: They always get the buffalon chicken wraps right. When you habe the extra coin get the chip with Queso and beef dip.  Its good!  The accommodate kids taste as well so bring your littles.

resp.text:
Delicious choices, Brois! Hope to see you and your family back in again very soon!

name: marco A
text: Very nice place. Food is great. Service is excellent

name: Terry B
text: This is a decent place to have lunch and price not try not to go there on the weekend

name: Antonio Williams
text: We had a gift card that was over a year old and they would not honor it.  They said they changed ownership since then. I informed them that we had now been back because of their low 80 sanitation score.  One of the servers even said they would not eat during that time.  We even should them the amount that their app said was on the card.  As a manager would have at least offered some discount for the meal as a one time courtesy.  We will not ever return due to this bad experience.

name: Kemer Russell
text: So on my first time visiting this establishment.  We waited over 25 minutes not seeing our waitress at all. A nice waitress saw us setting and took our orders.  I'm not happy with the way customer service is. Sitting there I see nothing but waitresses but not ours. Very poor rating for me. The food was fine but when we talk about how you treated me when I entered that matters a lot. So go at your own risk. Learn Customer service please. ....

name: Tamara Thomas
text: Our waitress was friendly and friendly.  Food was very good. Atmosphere was welcoming, too.

resp.text:
That's what we love to hear, Tamara! Hope to see you in again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Nancy Allen
text: Service was not good. Our glasses were empty and was never refilled. Food was so-so. I have no plans to return there.

name: Maurice Chambers
text: First off I was skeptical about going based on the low Health Inspection from a few months back. We were being hospitable to our out of town guests that were visiting for the All Star Game. They really wanted to go. So we powered through. The wait time seemed long for so many empty seats. We placed our orders and only 1 out of 4 orders were correct. I'm not a picky eater at all but I had to say something. They corrected the order but something seemed off. I hope they get They're stuff together.

name: Kim Ashley
text: Food and service was great. It's very loud though.

name: Becky C
text: Onion rings, chicken tenders with 2 sides, chocolate cake with vanilla ice cream. Very good. Had honey hot dipp sauce/right amount of heat for lunchtime.

name: Nikki
text: Not particularly impressed.  Food was just ok. Server seemed irritated. And food took way too long to come out, considering the place was not very full.

name: Ricky Allison
text: My wife's favorite place to eat the salmon and rice is one of her favorites I love the the drinks and the burgers

resp.text:
We're glad to have you and your wife as fans, Ricky! Hope to see you both in again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Gunnardab
text:
The food came out pretty fast .First was app spinach dip it was spicy and disgusting. So we still were in good spirits because then the    food came again disgusting. Finally I just ordered soup and called it a day.All in all I should have just left but the tea was really good.
Nice waiter and his trainee

name: Lynnette Krigger
text: Its okay. I just wish they served wings🤷🏾‍♀

name: Chris Rice
text: Delicious food.   Service is sometimes iffy.   But overall good.  That broccoli casserole....

name: Travis H
text: When you dine out you expect good service.  This was far from how it was at Cheddars.  The food is, as always, consistantly good but the service was horrible.  The waitress was more interested in me paying my bill than on her job.  I was just getting my family situated when she was asking me if I was ready for the check.  I had not taken one bite of my dinner.  There was no offer of dessert or any drinks.  She made me feel as if I was an annoyance and not a customer.  I understand that people can have a bad day but this young woman was terrible.  I would think twice before dining at this establishment.  2 stars was because the food was good.

name: Felecia Harden
text: Well it started good then went back to gr8 our Bria did her nice pleasant atmosphere and this was 1st visit and I'll be back

resp.text:
I'm happy to hear your first visit was a memorable one, Felecia! I'll be sure to let the Charlotte team know, and we look forward to seeing you again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Phyllis Davis
text: Love the food here. It's always served at the appropriate temperature. Light alcoholic beverages served upon request, indoor and outdoor seating options available. Friendly staff, long wait times because the food is so good! Plentiful parking available, economical pricings. Not sure about a kid's menu, however you do have an option of lunch size or dinner sized servings. There is take out service, you may call ahead, place your order and it will be ready upon your arrival. Clean restrooms, benches available for comfortable seating while you wait for a table or you may sit at the bar and place your order there. Good place for a date, food arrives at your table in a timely manner. Good place to people watch while eating alone also.

name: Shirley Wharton
text: My broccoli casserole was cold and waiting for the food took to long and it wasn't that busy🙁🙁

name: Trisa Pickett
text: Slow service  but good place to eat and friendly people

name: DeeMarie Rice
text: Food was good, but the biscuits aren't unlimited anymore.

resp.text:
Hi DeeMarie! Our Honey Butter Croissants have recently been made complimentary and have not been unlimited since prior to our acquisition in 2017, when Cheddar's was owned by different franchises. I'd love to connect with you further in regards to this, if you can please email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com when you have a free moment.

I look forward to hearing from you!

-Gabi

name: Martinique Hart
text: Had our oldest son's graduation gathering here and it was a bust. First, we called two weeks in advance and tried to reserve a area for 20 people and was told they don't do that; cool. Second, we get there and were all seated at different booths, which made it hard to enjoy ourselves because we had to go from booth to booth trying to converse with everyone. When we got there I asked if they could put some tables together because we was one party and was told "no" because it would be to much for the waitresses. They were worried more about the waitresses then accommodating paying customers. One of our waitresses, Melanie was the only thing good about the whole experience. She tried to accommodate us the best she could. The other waitress need to work on her customer service skills. Food came to table cold, so we just got containers and brought it home. This was my first and last time at Cheddars and I will not be recommending this place to everyone. We should have stuck with O' Charlies or Applebees. Next time we will....

name: F. Knowles
text: The honey butter croissants are A-MAZE-ING! Overall, the food is great, however, the portion sizes for sides are tiny. Don't slip out without having a Painkiller. 🍹😉

name: valerie ferrell
text: This was my first time here and it was worth the wait. The wait was long but the service was awesome and the food was so good and it was amazing. I am definitely recommending this place to my friends family and strangers. Please don't change anything and thank you

name: Dre Horton
text: Very good. Reasonably priced.

resp.text:
Getting a lot, for not a lot - that's the motto we live by! We appreciate you dining with us, Dre, and we look forward to serving you again soon! Don't forget to check out our new and convenient Curbside Pick Up for any future To Go orders!

-Gabi

name: Kevin Burke
text: Great service and food. Prompt and attentive service throughout our visit.

name: Indi Blaze
text: Sooo we went here yesterday after my son's graduation and had a party of about 35 people. They said they couldn't accommodate seating for that large of a number yet they had just opened their doors and we were the only people there. They said they longer seat large parties as of policy changes last week. The most they could do was seat 4 to a table spread throughout the restaurant. The manager on duty had the most unfriendly face and attitude. Well needless to say they missed out on nearly $1k. We proudly took our business across the street to TGI Friday's where they warmly welcomed us all and actually sat us ALL together! The staff there was amazing!! From the greeter to the server to the bartender, everyone was pleasant and the service was great. Cheddars could learn a thing or five from their neighbors. I don't think they will be getting my business anymore. I would've given it 0 stars but 1 was the minimum.

name: Cheryl Rodriguez
text:
The food was as great as always. The service was terrible. The bar took 35 minutes to make our drinks. It took an hour from when we placed our order to when the food arrived. One side was missing and then told to pick something else. Finale was when he messed up splitting the check. The manager ending up comping all the food.
This is normally a great place.

name: Bev Withers
text:
I used to be a Cheddar's regular. Back in the day, I could get a cheeseburger and fries for $4.99 - but I understand inflation.
What keeps me coming back in the door even after all the bad press is the Painkiller. I ordered that along with steak and chicken tenders with a loaded baked potato and broccoli for the sides. The Painkiller was tasty, but significantly weaker as far as alcohol than it used to be. I feel like it used to taste a lot better in the past. With a 2 drink limit, I expect to feel a buzz after one. I felt nothing. The food was ok. I did not like the tenders, the steak was nicely seasoned but overcooked - I asked for medium and it was almost well done. My daughter ordered the kids penne with marinara sauce and received a bowl of dry noodles with a dollop of sauce in the middle.
We waited quite a while to place our order. It took at least 45 minutes if not longer to receive the food. Our waitress did come and apologize to us for the wait after we had been waiting for about 30 minutes. She said the kitchen was backed up.
I could clearly tell when I recieved my food that it was sitting under a hot lamp for a good while because the cheese was very melted on my potato - like the way it looks on top of baked mac n cheese. This was different from the regular melt that happens when you put cheese on top of a hot potato.  The waitstaff forgot my broccoli, brought an empty container of A1 and took at least 10 minutes to bring a full one. Get this, Cheddar's charges tonout bacon on a LOADED BAKED POTATO. Bacon is part of the very definition of "loaded". Needless to say tho my experience wasn't extremely horrible, I will not come back to Cheddar's again. I feel like the entire bill was a waste of money. Thankfully, the manager discounted our bill for all of our troubles.

name: Erin Robinson (Erin)
text: You can get drunk off their huge drinks pretty easily. The food is really good too.

name: Chad Treadaway
text: Service and food are 100% than the Cheddars restaurant in Winston Salem. Waitress was very friendly and the manager made a point to stop by our table and ask how everything was. Will definitely come back if we're in the Charlotte area again. Winston Salem needs to take some pointers from this Cheddars location.

name: Alania Ball
text: Went late one weekend night. The wait for a table was quick about a 15 min wait. Our waiter was new 2nd day on the job but was very quick and very attentive. Great food ( I ordered pasta) love the croissants and b honey butter.

name: Emanuel Townsend
text: The chicken nachos and drinks are amazing.   The bartender was professional and polite.   The staff was getting the orders out in a timely manner to have been so busy

name: Rix C
text:
Food died in the window. My Mid Rare steak  was well done. My fries had gone cold and soggy. There were no fried onions with the steak as decribed on the menu. I ordered Backed potatoe soup but I never received it.

The staff was friendly, the restaurant itself was clean.

resp.text:
Hi Rick - this is disappointing to hear, and certainly not the type of visit we'd want for you. When you have a moment, please feel free to email me at GuestRelations@Cheddars.com with your name/Google Handle, phone number, and receipt.

I look forward to hearing from you!

-Gabi

name: Evelyn Robertson
text: The food was flavored well, didn't need to add a thing & the staff were great !

name: Kendra Johnson
text: Chicken wrap was pretty good! The Tiki drink we tried was good as well.

resp.text:
You can never go wrong with the buffalo chicken wrap and island tiki! Thanks for stopping in, Kendra - hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Claudia Sanders
text: Awesome wait staff. Definitely going back!

name: linda bennett
text: I loved it!! First time going there and the experience was great

resp.text:
That's what we love to hear, Linda! Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Maggie Respass
text: Complete turn around from my last experience. Bar staff was absolutely amazing and the manager made me a delicious Cosmo to my liking. My salmon was cooked perfectly and I will return.

resp.text:
That's what we love to hear, Maggie! We hope to see you in again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Greta Howard Green
text: The bar server was GREAT & my margarita has me counting down to my return

resp.text:
We can't wait to see you in again for another delicious margarita, Greta! Hope to see you soon!

-Gabi

name: Cynthia F
text: Very tasty

name: Ebony Stephens
text: So many good menu options at a great price. I've enjoyed every meal from the salmon and salads, to the spinach dip appetizer.

resp.text:
All delicious recommendations, Ebony! Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Cody Eagle
text: The staff were great and friendly. The place was a little difficult to find but the ribs I had were good the meat fel straight off of the bone. Those crusants they had were amazing overall great place

name: Darrell D
text: I called-in an order for pickup and when I arrived the worker with the pickup orders told me she didn't have mine.   I then spoke with a manager by the name of Emily who got to the root of the problem and proceeded to fill my order with a nice discount for the mix-up.  Even though there was an error I was pleased with the way it was handled swift and professionally!

name: Trisha Gregory
text: They've really made improvements in the quality of the food and service.

resp.text:
That's wonderful to hear, Trisha! We appreciate your kind words, and hope to be able to welcome you back in again soon - whether dining in or taking it To Go using our Curbside Pick Up!

-Gabi

name: Ebony Rao
text: The service was great and the food was serious comfort food.

name: Jackie Blanchard
text:
The food was GREAT! I had the country fried steak... light crispy crust. Hubby had grilled shrimp with mango salsa... said he loved it! Son had meatloaf... said it was the best he'd ever had.

Comfortable vibe. Hostess was slipping, but the waitstaff was on point. Friendly and attentive.

40 mins from home, but that won't stop me from coming back over and over to eat my way through the menu! LOLOL

name: Nate
text: Food is great. The wait after being seated wasn't to bad. Customer service was okay but could use improvement. It's worth the trip if you are not going during a peak time like Friday or Saturday night. I would visit this establishment again.

name: Ramam Venigalla
text:
Waited for long time to get here but it was a disappointment.
First off the table they made us sit was damp underneath. After 15 mins we couldnt take it anymore so we moved ourselves to next table. Keyword "ourselves", our waiter just said you can move to next table and walked away.
Now for the food.
- i ordered cajun pasta and the dish came dry and bathed in salt. Seemed like a canned good just microwaved.
- my wife ordered ceaser salad with chicken. Obviously the chicken was raw and some wilted salad and tomatoes. We told the waiter that the chicken was uncooked and removed all of it from the plate. All she has to say was im sorry.
To top it over when we got the check, and this is new one for me, there were options for 18%, 20% and 22% gratuity options. Since when 15% is not an option.
Overall bad food, dirty seating option and not so desirable service.
This may not be same for others but my experience was bad not worse. Good way to end an year with worst place.

name: Jeanne
text: Food was very good.. Restaurant could still be a little cleaner in dining room. Nobody wants to be seated across a table full of dirty dishes. All in all I'm glad to see they are getting back on track..

name: Barry
text: Great food and service. Price point is great if you are on a budget

resp.text:
That's what we love to hear, Barry! Thanks for stopping in - hope to see you again soon!

-Gabi

name: Annie Burchill
text: great food and staff considering the sanitation rating is so terrifyingly low.

name: Vilma Parker
text: Food was good, service was very slow
Great food for the price. Very well trained staff and cleanliness on point.

resp.text:
Awesome to hear! Thank you for visiting us - we hope to continue welcoming you in!

-Gabi

name: Matthew Woodle
text: It gets a 3 because the food was not bad but the service lacked big time.  The server was young and tried to do a good job but it was chaotic in there and it didnt feel relaxed at all.   It took forever to get service and the bill was wrong. We just paid it to get out of the restaurant.

name: Antonio Harrison
text:
The University City location basically sucks. Went there with my family on a Sunday afternoon, so we were prepared for a wait. Were surprised when they said it was only a 15 minute wait... Thirty minutes later we are finally seated and noticed there are 5 empty booths in our section, and a completely empty section on the other side of us. Oh well, let's eat.... 10 minutes later we stop a server who was waiting on the guests 2 tables in front of us and ask where our server was, as we still hadn't been greeted or offered drinks. She stumbles around in the back looking for whoever. A few minutes later, we ask the hostess to get the manager. The server we stopped comes back to take our drink orders, I told her we were ready to order food and drinks but she said she couldn't take our food order!?!?! I'd had it at that point. I told her don't worry about it, bring me the manager and a Diet Coke to go. I waited 5 more minutes, no manager (Emily was on duty) ever showed up. So we left, not without sharing our experience with some waiting guests on the way out, including a party of 5 that was waiting alongside us when we were in the lobby. In the car on the way to Boston Market, we got the manager on the phone who apologized and promised to send a gift certificate via email. It's been 7 days and we've yet to see that promise... not that we were ever likely to use it anyway.
I work in the area and used to frequent Cheddars for lunch. This place has really gone downhill though, and it seems to be a management and staff issue.

name: Furman Williams
text: Good food, service is a little slow, sometimes, even when the crowds are low. They have slowly gain a reputation for some of the best dinner rolls in town and heaping portons. Since it's inception in the University Area, they continue to make big strides, but their prices could be better.

name: Jeff Freeman
text: Great food, staff, atmosphere, only thing better put one in Randleman, NC.

name: kierra lassiter
text: Amazing food, great service !

name: James Young
text: Great food

name: JAMISON TALBERT
text: Great food. Long waits on the weekend to be seated

resp.text:
Thank you for being a fan of ours, Jamison! Don't forget to check out our new and convenient Curbside Pick Up! Why wait when you can enjoy your favorites from the comfort of your own home?!

Hope to see you in soon!

-Gabi

name: Darlene Jackson-Millin
text: Atmosphere was good and wait staff were helpful and accommodating.  My issue was that I ordered my steak medium well, and it was completely well done. The broccoli was also overcooked and mushy. Otherwise,  a pleasant experience.

name: Natalie Kinney
text: The hostess was great. The food wasn't as fresh. We asked for blackened salmon and got regular salmon and my fried shrimp was soft.

name: Cheryl Samuel Jones
text: Really good food at a great price. The wait time for seating is always reasonable. Wide variety of common and classic dishes. Great salmon. Fantastic spinach dip. Nice atmosphere and seating areas.  Outdoor seating is available seasonally.

name: Corey gibbs
text: Excellent service, great food.....and those croissants are the bezzz kneezzz.

name: Paula Worthy
text: Staff were less than pleasurable and wait time after being seated was ridiculous. A couple seated 20 minutes after us received their meal, ate, and ordered dessert...we were still waiting for our meal. Left 87 minutes after arriving without having received our food. Manager not available.

name: Christopher Davis
text: AWESOME FOOD AND GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE

name: Hermetic Adept
text: Good food but service could be better, worth a visit.

name: Angela Hough
text: Food was amazing. Service was great, but the wait was rediculas. They need more servers bad. They had lots of empty tables with people having to wait over an hour to be seated, and I'd assume due to lack of help.

name: Angela Passmore
text: Good food, friendly staff . Good come out extremely fast.

resp.text:
That's what we love to hear, Angela! Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Anthony Warfield
text: Service  was  slow  didn't  sit the table properly  had to ask for things  that should  had  already  been  there

name: Lee Hall Jr.
text: It was ok... I take it that my expectations were higher than normal, due to what I heard! I was expecting a more of a scratch taste. It was close, but who am I?!?!

name: Demon Dobie
text: Very reasonably priced, homestyle cooking. We liked it better than Cracker Barrel

resp.text:
You're making us blush, Michael! Thanks for stopping in - hope to see you again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Maria Holbein
text: First time at the Charlotte location and we were not disappointed! Everything was tasty, staff was friendly and helpful, nice decor and yummy desserts to end the meal. We will be back.

name: Les Hall
text: Super great service! Food was flavorful and fresh! Prices were right on point for quality! Definitely coming back!

name: Nichole Grice (Ageless Beauty)
text: Love this place where eating is affordable and meal, my favorite being the lemon pepper white fish, is plentiful!

resp.text:
The lemon pepper whitefish is always a delicious dish, Nichole! Thanks for stopping in - hope to see you again soon!

-Gabi

name: seeking answers
text: Love Cheddars! Never had bad food! Service was a little slack this time, and i was having lunch with someone who waits tables for a living...so she was really hard on her.

name: Natalie Madison
text: I loved the food and the decor and the mannerism of the food and people here.

resp.text:
Sounds like you're a fan of ours, Natalie! Thank you for your kind words - we hope to see you in again very soon!

-Gabi

name: catt “Cat” mcclendon
text: My first time at Cheddar's, and I'd like to go back. Very calm and inviting decor, my server Essence was perfect, food was great!

resp.text:
That's wonderful to hear, Catt! I'll be sure to share your kind words with Essence, and we hope to see you in again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Kandy Summers
text: Our experience here was super great!! We celebrated my husband 54th BIRTHDAY!! Maya, our server, was AMAZING! GREAT PERSONALATY,  AND A GREAT COMMUNICATER!

resp.text:
What a great way to celebrate, Kandy! Thank you for celebrating with us. I'll be sure to let Maya and her leadership team know how great your visit was. Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Michael Hollmond
text: Very busy location. Be prepared for a shirt wait, but food is nicely priced and service is good.

name: ganoking1
text: Food was good.  The painkiller drink was awesome.  The staff was very friendly

name: James Hemingway
text: Good food good service

name: Kim Evans
text: Went with a friend based on a referral & they were out of anything I was interested in ordering but mostly sides. They were outta mash potatoes Mac n cheese & a few other sides. Just poor management & need to do better. We ended up leaving & didn't order anything since there was so little to choose from. I don't know why they were open if they didn't have a full menu. The waiter was very kind & said sometimes that happen on the weekends. No worries I'm not going back no time soon there's other places in the same area to choose from & management should take note. Running outta food will cause them to end up costing their doors. Not good

name: C J
text: The food was great and the honey butter croissants were mouthwatering!!

resp.text:
Mouthwatering is right, Cameron! Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Sonya Luckey
text: Everything.about this place was just not good. The manager had a stank attitude...she was ghetto as hell. We asked her a question and she turned and walked away after she didn't want to here what we were saying to her(about my friends drink). My drink did not have all the ingredients it was susposed to have(cinnamon). My spinach dip looked old, the fried. chips were absolutely disgusting....they were stale. I would never come here again. This was my second time coming here everything was great...so i decided to go eat and drink there again. HUGE MISTAKE😢😢😢

name: William Davis Jr
text: Service wasn't good. Waiter couldn't get our order right and we had to wait forever to get our food and to make matters worse when the food did come it had hair in it.

name: Charita Coleman
text: Food was not fresh and the  was waitress was tired.

name: Carol Ann
text: Stopped Saturday Oct.28th for our usual Grilled Chicken Pasta Salad on our way to Raleigh. What we got was cold chicken lunch meat instead of warm chicken breast! Pasta was hard to find and the taste was not what we use to get. Waitress said her Manager comped the meal but did not come yo talk to us. We left a tip for the waitress and left. Won't go there again!!

name: Norem Dana
text: Excellent food!  Helpful staff!  Wonderful staff!

name: Veda Cook
text: The biscuits are such a temptation and a delightful delicious indulgence!

resp.text:
You can never go wrong with our tasty honey butter croissants! Thanks for stopping in, Veda. Hope to see you again soon!

-Gabi

name: Chris Johnson
text: Just walked out before being served. This used to be one of our favorite go-to places when we couldn't decide on a place. It has been going increasingly downhill. Noticed their last health inspection was an 84.5 a couple weeks ago.... employees not washing hands, etc. Had plenty of time to read the detailed report since our server hadn't yet brought us water after sitting for ten minutes. This one's now off our list.

name: David Biggers
text: Great time!

name: Cam S
text: Great place to eat always. Broccoli cheddar casserole is a sure bet!  Ribs and chicken are great. Pot pie is good and or course some mixed drinks to wash it all down.

name: J Bost
text:
When we first arrived, the hostess was busy doing her homework, no I am not kidding.  She actually took a moment to skim her book again before trying find a table, which should not have been too difficult because the restaurant was nearly empty.

We got to the table and waited about 15 minutes for the server.  Drink order placed, waters arrived 10 minutes later (!), the actual  adult beverage I ordered came 20 minutes after that.  Food order took about 30 minutes to arrive, but was not taken until 20 minutes after being seated.  And did I mention that the place was nearly empty?  There were only two other small groups besides us: a couple and 4 adults.

To their credit, the food was good.  The server seemed tired and embarrassed to be working there.  She actually seemed surprised when I left her a tip.  I believe that there is dysfunctional management at the University location.  There's no way a restaurant in that location should be almost empty at the time we went.  I don't think that I will be back.  Too many sad vibes.

name: Lorna Laboy
text: Use to go here all the time, however the last time I went with family, a few weeks ago, we left before sitting. The sanitation score was a 71. How does that happen. Once we saw the score, it was a done deal. The food may still be tasty, but will I get sick. What causes a score to drop so low. The manager should be ashamed. Corporate should be aware and make changes post haste.

name: Temekia Furlow
text: Food was actually good.

name: Eli Goodpaster
text: Service is always very slow, but the food is usually pretty good.

name: AJ Jordan
text: Very busy restaurant wait time 30min not so bad. Go to the bar order a glass of wine , which I ordered the wrong kind. Bartender fixed my mistake (for the cost of a glass of wine) I took one sip sat it down on bar and smashed everywhere this isn't happening to me.  Bartender gave me her entire spue on how she have been working all day, extremely tired and I just really made her bad day being one of her worst days.  I was already nervous from the start going on a date which supposed to be Dutch which I had to pay for it all. Regardless we finally sat down to eat and the waitress speaks well to my guest but totally looks right threw me.  Food was ok for sit down fast food. Drinks was kinda costly specialty for not even drinking two of them.  Maybe will be better next time without the eye candy.

name: Camilla 7
text: Great

name: Nicole Jackson
text: Excellent. Great food. Great service!

name: MiCaela De'Teri (Terri)
text: The food wasn't right and our server was slow and kept forgeting condiments. Even the manager was rude but she was the kitchen manager, which is where she might work better. Then the general manager came after we ate and it was like a breath of fresh air. 3/5

name: A E
text: Love this place now. Great tasting food and prices! Everything I tried here taste good. I dont care what you order it's probably going to be good. Also, you can't beat the prices!

name: T S
text: Good value for the money.  I had a salmon salad that was very good and fresh.  At the prices that they charge I'm sure it was probably frozen salmon, but it was still good.

name: James Donald Jr
text: Great food and good service and good people

name: Arno Springer
text: Great food, loved the grilled chicken pecan salad with pomogranet vinegret dressing.

resp.text:
Delicious recommendation, Arno! Thanks for stopping in - hope to see you again very soon!

-Gabi

name: Fabian
text: I want to start off by saying that this place usually has great food and great service. This time, in particular, everything went wrong. The service was bad, our food was not up to par and it took a very long time to get. Only reason I'm typing this review is because of the manager (I think her name was Kim). She did a great job of making our bad experience into a positive one. She took great care of my friends and I. She earned back our business with her great people skills and willingness to make sure we left there happy. I wish every business had some like her to make sure the customer is taken care of.

name: GFrancine SuTh
text: The best onion rings I have ever tasted.

resp.text:
You can never go wrong with our homemade onion rings!

-Gabi

name: Katie kinter
text: Horrible horrible service. the food was disgusting. the only thing we did enjoy was the mixed drink and the appetizer. we waited over an hour for our meals and they were either over cooked or not even what we ordered. waitress didn't come to check on us for an hour no drink refills..brought us dirty plates for our app we had to eat off our napkins. complained and we got excuses. they wernt even that busy if we see kitchen staff in the bar area eating and watching tv. this was the worst experience cheddar will not see a dime of our hard earned money. much more happened but way to much to type.

name: Shawn Carson
text: The food was great that's all I could say.

resp.text:
That's what we love to hear, Shawn!

-Gabi

name: Amber Coleman
text:
Slow service and lazy staff. I placed a pick up order at 3:45pm and I’m here currently trying to pick it up and it’s still not ready (it’s 4:38pm). So it’s taking them close to an hour to get my order process and ready. I asked the gentleman at the bar “would one of those boxes behind you belong to me?” He looked at them, that’s it. Just glanced over them and said “no ma’am, they’re not.” I asked him to double check and he did, just by glancing over them again, not opening them to see what’s inside (common sense right?)Soooooo, after an hour of waiting for my order a woman comes from the back to help out at the bar and asks me “have you been helped?” I told her “”yes, I’m waiting on my order and it’s been close to an hour since I’ve placed it online.” She looks at the orders behind her and asks me what did I order, I inform her of my choice and she said “here it is right here” to the male bar tender. All I could do was scowl at him and how lazy he was. He didn’t bother to look inside any of the boxes the first time he checked and my order had gotten cold from it sitting out for so long. Needless to say, I left. I will never stop here again, especially not for a pick up order. It took so long I just canceled it. It doesn’t make any sense to have to wait for over an hour for a pick up order that’s supposed to be ready before I get here, especially when there’s no heavy foot
Traffic in your establishment.

name: Mrs. Oluyede
text: Always a good time and a little wait.

That's what we love to hear, Mrs. King! Don't forget to check out our new and convenient Curbside Pick Up for any future To Go orders!

Hope to see you soon!

-Gabi

name: Jonathan Blue
text: Wasn't impressed with this place. I'm not a meat eater and even the salads had meat in it. They had one meal for vegetarians but be careful of which veggies you choose and the green beans were clearly cooked in pork. The meal my fiancee had was decent. Our waitress was quite attentive so that was a plus.

name: Matt Stevens
text: I have been here three times. A year ago was my first time I went and everything was great. The food was good, the service was good, and I had a good experience. I went a second time for drinks and got an appetizer. The waiter didn't know the beer list or what was on tap. The waiter may have been new which is fine but the Nacho Appetizer was not very warm. I had a decent enough time until I went a third time to get a gift card for a friend. During that time I felt really frustrated. The first waitress led me to the bar where she told me to wait. As I waited on the second waitress who was tending to the bar area (probably about a third full) I met a man who was waiting to pick up an order and had been there about ten minutes already. After I had been there ten minutes, he began to say how he was feeling impatient and I agreed that we should have probably been acknowledged. We stood there for another five minutes and the waitress finally chatted with the man near me but she had to go back and check on the (previously called in) order the first man was waiting on. After she came back, she finally asked if she could help me and I told her that I only wanted to buy a gift card. She then told me that she would be right with me. After another seven or eight minutes, I told the man who was still waiting (now impatiently), "Have fun waiting" and left. I got a $50 dollar gift card for at Taco Mac instead. I will let you know if I gather the courage for a fourth visit.

name: Cj Johnson
text: Great food when it's not to pack i think cook staff was under trained last time.

We (party of 8) arrived New Year's Day just after 3pm and agreed to an hour wait. During our wait, various servers approached the podium to argue with the hostess about getting tables, and were refusing to serve customers.

We were seated after close to 2 hours, to have our wait time rudely disputed by the hostess. Our server Paola, however, is personable. They are out of croissants, Sprite, 12 oz ribeyes, french fries, and baked potatoes. My steak was overcooked. We will most likely not return.

text: Oh how i hated i had this bad experience. I came in wasnt greeted at the door went to the bar sat down one bartender and 2 customers the bartender didnt speak nor did she say ill be right with u i sat while she waited on the 2 ladies at the bar then she took 3 to go orders that walked in so i grabbed a waiter that was walking and asked if i could place my order since no one at the bar wants to help . after i placed my order after being in there for 20 minutes just to have my order wrong ugh .

I think I will be giving  this a pass from now on and you may want to also.

text: Well. This was my first time here. Will be my last. The wait staff was good which is why I'm giving them a 3 instead of a 2. This is no reflection on them. First of all...why are all of the floors so slippery?  Not a sign of cleanliness. The sanitation score was a shaky 92. I was skeptical but we tried it. The food was decent. Nothing to shout about.  Asked for napkins and got bar napkins. What's with that?

text: We had a really great date night . We feasted , and the service from BAM was outstanding. Thanks

name: Kelly Moriarty
text: Not the same menu as the cheddars we used to frequent before we moved here. Little to no vegetarian selections aside from salads. Price is good for food you get.

name: Blondie Monroe
text: I went here with my family of 5 on a Saturday night. The wait was only 15-20 mins to be sat at a table which is not too bad. We were sat at 6pm, the waitress was not really attentive and didn't take our drink order until about 20 mins of waiting so we decided to order our food and drinks together to avoid another long wait. We received our drinks a few minutes later. An hour after being sat we finally got our food. Wasn't too pleased with how long it took to receive our food considering the fact that they weren't that packed and had a whole section packed. The table behind us also had some issues with the same waitress not being attentive and asked for a manager. I learned from the manager that the waitress was new and so I guess that explains the long wait for everything and her not being attentive to her tables. It also took forever to receive to go boxes and the check. She was nice and the food was good but hopefully the service will be better next time.

text:
We were told we had an hour wait which we chose wait. We waited almost two hours at which time the hostess attempted to seat our party of eight in two booths. When I objected and reminded her of how long we waited she was very rude, lied and said we only waited just over an hour and assured she was right because she wrote the time down...she wanted to argue however, the other two women there who may have been supervisors corrected her immediately and accommodated us.
Our waitress Paola was pleasant and apologetic about everything to include the fact that they were out of sprite, fries, 12oz steak, potatoes and croissants. Basically items on the menu we wanted. We will not done here again.

Who comes out and says this out loud in front of customers.  While waiting we went t ok the bar.  There was nobody except 1 bartender and 1 person picking up a to go order. The ENTIRE bar was covered in glasses, trash and dishes.  This use to be a very nice location.  I have no clue what has happened.

text: Need quicker service slow even when they're not busy WAITED 1HR & 30 MINS TO GET A TABLE. WAITRESS WAS VERY NICE BUT THE MANAGER ON DUTY 8/20/2018 AROUND 8:30 WAS HORRIBLE SHE NEEDS MORE TRAINING ON HOW TO SATISFY CUSTOMERS. THEN SHE LEFT AND DIDN'T CHECK TO SEE IF WE GOT OUR FOOD.

name: Brent Trick
text: I have been wanting to try this place for awhile. I wish I got here a lot sooner. The Monte Cristo sandwich and the croissants we're delicious. Along with the homemade black beans. Very tasty. I will be back.

name: Terry Little
text: Service was a bit slow, food was good.

name: Jeremy Post
text: The portions here are enormous. The food is good and the service I received was spectacular. The prices are in line with other middle of the road sit down dining establishments.

name: Nakeila Johnson
text: Although the food looked delicious, I was thrown back by the dirty dishes I kept getting. I am not sure if the cleaning dispenser needs some maintenance work done it, but it is not doing a good job at all. I personally would not easy here again because of that.

name: Timothy Marois
text:
Two visits so far. The first was good, I ordered the texas cheese fries and boneless buffalo wings. You can almost never go wrong with cheese fries unless its cold.

The first visit was the best, and led me to my second. However, the day we went was overly crowded and must of been because of graduation parties. I can imagine how overwhelmed the staff was, so for the service I can't really comment on that. (it was very slow)

Tried the Salmon and what a mistake. I recommend you stick with bar food. The salmon was bland, had no flavor and did not feel or taste fresh. At least if you serve a salmon that was frozen, please make a comeback by adding additional flavor, but this would be expected since it was a $10 meal. They should have served a sauce around the plate for us to smear into with each bite.

Price here is affordable.

For a cheap lunch/dinner I recommend. Just don't expect to be blown away.

name: Phillip Thornton
text: The restaurant is very noisy even for a Cheddar's. The food was fine but not great. It waiter was more interested in surfing the net than making sure that we didn't need anything.

name: Donna S.
text: Excellent food.  The Blackened Salmon is the BEST.

name: Slim Solo
text: The food wasn't as good as I expected.. But, good customer service overall

name: G Napier Barnes
text: The service was a tad slow, but the food was both excellent and reasonable priced. We will return.

name: Kalem Bourque
text:
Wish I could give 0 stars.

Waited an hour for a table for 10 at 9pm. Understandable....it was a large party.

Well, when sat, they had us at two different tables. We saw an open table large enough to fit the entire party. We politely asked if we could move to that neighboring table where our entire party could sit together. The serve gets with another server and deliberated for almost 10 minutes...meanwhile we were all ignored.l, not even served water.

After server came back, they told us we were unable to all sit together....even though it had been over an hour and a half of us being at the establishment already.

Finally, I asked for a manager to discuss what should have been an EASY resolution. Needless to say the "manager," Pamela, was almost more unprofessional than hee employees.

We were simply looking to have a great evening... I'm so disappointed in this experience and have honestly never felt so disrespected and disregarded. I hope the GM has serious conversations around employee and management attitudes. What ever happen to simple customer service?! Needless to say, we left and took our service elsewhere.

Never coming back here. Also recommend everyone else save their money.

name: Jamie Cook
text: Good food better prices

resp.text:
That's what we aim for, Jamie! Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Guy Schliewenz
text: Great restaurant. Wonderful food.

name: Rasheda Hicks
text: We’ve been coming to cheddars for about 3 years now. Our last 2 experiences have not been so great so we will not be returning. We waited 30 minutes for our food and then it was COLD (probably have been sitting waiting to be brought out). We ordered rice as a side and was told once our food arrived that they don’t have anymore. That would’ve been great to know right after ordering. We substituted for another side that also came out cold. The server was lousy. The only reason i didn’t leave 1 star is because the food is good when it’s hot and fresh.

name: DarylnMelissa Brock
text: Food was decent. Service was mediocre. Bathrooms were filthy.

name: Amia m
text: 04/04/18 The waiters are slackers the food was nasty and dry the bar area was nasty I seen a waiter drop food on the counter and plate it back on the plate didn’t see not once bar tender washed hands took forever for my food.... Never will go to this Cheedars the score was not good below 90.....

name: Nakeila Johnson
text: Although the food looked delicious, I was thrown back by the dirty dishes I kept getting. I am not sure if the cleaning dispenser needs some maintenance work done it, but it is not doing a good job at all. I personally would not easy here again because of that.

name: Mary Melton
text: Great restaurant to gather with family and friends due to reasonable prices for quality food for every type of diet

name: Catherine Davis
text: Hostess was rude and unwelcoming, but our waitress was great. Food was good as always. Cheddar's is my favorite restaurant. If you have never tried the Honey Butter Croissants, please do so at least once in your life. You WILL thank me later. (Pictured: Loaded Potato Soup and Chicken Pie)

name: Douglas Boyer
text: Great atmosphere and dining experience. The food is unbelievably good. You'll want to visit this place time and time again.

name: endunnon Dunnon
text: The food was not up to standards, and the service was piss poor.  The philly cheese stake was not made good the cheese was just placed on top the mushrooms were whole. I needed napkins and had to hunt some down. Then needed some salt and looks like some creatures are in the salt.

name: Chris Nowak
text: AWFUL SERVICE. It took literally an HOUR for a cold sandwich. Not to mention the fries were cold. It wasn't even busy. Disgraceful.

name: Flo Vetro
text: Excellent food and dining experience!

name: Sanchi Seward
text: Very crowded. Food was good.  The croutons were very salty in my salad. Waitress was ok. Her enthusiasm could have been higher.

name: Brent Trick
text: I have been wanting to try this place for awhile. I wish I got here a lot sooner. The Monte Cristo sandwich and the croissants we're delicious. Along with the homemade black beans. Very tasty. I will be back.

name: Jonathan Vite
text: They have bad quality and they kill there workers

name: Lesa Allen
text: Long wait,  food was only ok.  Steak ordered medium,  served well done.  Loaded baked potato only had cheese and sour cream.  Service not so great,  not impressed.

name: Albery Florentino
text: The food was Great, and the atmosphere was very nice and chill, and idk about everyone else but my food was served really fast and good! Definitely coming back.

Thanks for being a fan, Todd!

-Gabi

text: Visited several times always great excellent service

name: Alonzo Smith
text: Good

name: Cathey Franks
text:
We got skipped over on the wait list.
But our server Dre made up for it.
He gave excellent service!!!! And was super nice.
Kudos to Dre!!!!

name: Jill Brice
text:
I'd been here before and had great service; however, I was a little disappointed today. My Aunt turned 75 and wanted to go their for lunch. Well, First off the Server was wonderful! My food not so much. I ordered a non-alcoholic daqacri and got a strawberry smoothie instead, We waited almost 45 mins for ribs only to have my well done steak bloody. My food was mediocre but everyone else enjoyed their large portioned plates. Somaybe it was me but my food here has been better. My baked potatoe was good.
Honestly, its a good place for families and friends.

name: Orlando Arteaga
text: This place is nice looking but nees a lot of service, the bathrooms are not clean and there are a lot of napkins on the floor all over the restaurant, the staff is not friendly, I wouldn’t came here again. The first time we came here we had to wait for 15 minuets to be seated 😡 until I went to the bar to ask for the host and she still took 5 more minutes to get to us.

name: Dominick DePaola
text: Awesome, food is fantastic. Service is fine. No complaints.

name: Kesha Thomas
text: Y'all used to be a decent place to go too but my behind felt dirty after leaving because the floor was wet and dirty! Booth was horrible and asking to get the booth to be cleaned seemed like it was so much to do. It was SUPER dirty

name: kesha hammond
text: Grilled chicken was dry, cocktail was great, waiter was great, took a long time to get food, all food did not come out together,  but they comped it out. I will still visit to try another dish

name: Patricia Brown
text: Visited several times always great excellent service

name: Justin Sommers
text: Pretty average. Good service

name: MiChelle Kirk
text: Ebony was not very attentive. There were 3 in my party and we did not receive refills, napkins...attention. She didn't have many customers so her job should not have been too difficult. Then there was some hair in my salad! How gross! The manager took care of my meal (as she should have) Overall, my experience wasn't a good one. Now I see why the rating is a 92.5.🤢

name: Erica Langley
text: The salmon is amazing with bourbon glaze on the side to dip. Ask for Anita, she made our experience amazing. Thank you.

name: Donna S.
text: Excellent food.  The Blackened Salmon is the BEST.

name: Jill Brice
text:
I'd been here before and had great service; however, I was a little disappointed today. My Aunt turned 75 and wanted to go their for lunch. Well, First off the Server was wonderful! My food not so much. I ordered a non-alcoholic daqacri and got a strawberry smoothie instead, We waited almost 45 mins for ribs only to have my well done steak bloody. My food was mediocre but everyone else enjoyed their large portioned plates. Somaybe it was me but my food here has been better. My baked potatoe was good.
Honestly, its a good place for families and friends.

name: Andayie Scott
text: I Love everything about Cheddars.. Staff is wonderful and on top of it. Service is fast and the foos is delicious..

name: Stephanie Harris
text: First of all their sanitation score was unbelievable scary, 84.5.  I would have left if I wasn't with a group of ppl.  The service was good & the food was a little different than I remember but I survived the scary score!

name: Tara Pharr
text:
The food was good but the service was terrible. Unorganized had to ask for the  appetizer. We received our desert before we received our main course.
I would not recommend this restaurant on a Friday or Saturday night.

name: Timothy Pelser
text: Very good food friendly service

resp.text:
Thank you, Timothy! Hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

name: Reiko Ausby
text: Every-time I go its always crowd and workers not working. host rude. food is awful.

name: H Thompson
text: One star off for very rude host. She literally told our big party to "get out of the way". And we weren't even really in the way. And this was her first time asking us to move. Other than that Cheddars is a really cool place with great food!

name: D C
text: Very nice place for my very 1sy time there very great food and awesome service.

name: Just Mel Speaks
text: Major improvement.  Shrimp and Salmon so good. Go now while.their score is almost 95.

name: Veronica Hall-Lake
text:
This took place on Friday October 20, 2017 at approximately 10:30pm.

One of the worst experiences I've ever had at a restaurant.  It started out good. We were a group of 8 ( celebrating my nephew senior night at Vance football game) and was happy the wait wasn't long(3-5 min tops) .
They sat us near the in/out pick up entrance for the servers to go in and out to get the food.  All night there was a loud call every time a server went in or out. ( VERY ANNOYING)
So we proceed to order our drinks and food. The others (7) with me order first. I couldn't decide so I told him to put their orders in and please come back to me; which he did. When I did order about 10 min later ( French onion soup) my order comes back first and COLD.  The server takes it back. Then everyone else's food start to come out 1 or 2 every 15- 20min APART! (Basically we didn't eat together) My soup comes back COLD AGAIN! Not everyone had utensils to eat with either. ( It was a mess)  Now when the server brings my soup back the 3RD TIME,  it is hot, but upon eating it I find 2 FRENCH FRIES COOKED IN THE BOTTOM OF MY FRENCH ONION SOUP! TOTAL DISGUST!!!!
NEVER WILL WE GO THERE AGAIN. SERVICE AND MANAGEMENT IS TERRIBLE!

name: Erica Langley
text: The salmon is amazing with bourbon glaze on the side to dip. Ask for Anita, she made our experience amazing. Thank you.

name: LaToya Conner
text: Just left. Hostess took us to a table with drinks on it, took the drinks, didn't offer to wipe it down. Gnats all along the wall by our table. I could smell the mildew from the kitchen. I immediately took my party to Chili's next door.

name: MiChelle Kirk
text: Ebony was not very attentive. There were 3 in my party and we did not receive refills, napkins...attention. She didn't have many customers so her job should not have been too difficult. Then there was some hair in my salad! How gross! The manager took care of my meal (as she should have) Overall, my experience wasn't a good one. Now I see why the rating is a 92.5.🤢

name: Gilbert Encio
text: The best food great prices.fell in love.to bad they dondt have one here in miami where i live.

name: Jodie Farmer
text: Dirty floors and awful bathrooms.  Service was ok. Waited an hour for a steak and a burger.

name: Benny Pigford
text: Great food good service

name: Richie G
text: The waitress was great the food was okay ..so we thought...but when we got home we were all fighting over the bathrooms

name: Cathey Franks
text:
We got skipped over on the wait list.
But our server Dre made up for it.
He gave excellent service!!!! And was super nice.
Kudos to Dre!!!!

name: Angelo Guercio
text: The food was very good, the restaurant is very nice but the waiter was a little under-trained and called me "Boss Man " at least 5-6 times.

name: Sonyq Moore
text: Great food, great service.  Victor I believe his name did an excellent job.

name: Lovina Kelly
text: A regular patron of Cheddars bouncing between Colorado Springs, Colorado and the one located in Jacksonville, NC... I am sorry to say that I was highly disappointed with the location by University Place in Charlotte NC.  Just got in off the road and took family there to get a meal before settling into our room for the night... We asked if we could sit in a booth in the bar area. It was empty aside from folks picking up takeout orders and one lady sitting at the bar.  The parking lot was fairly empty with perhaps 15 cars total. Nasjah (sp) the Hostess was friendly and sat us to our booth and said someone would be with us shortly. EIGHT MINUTES later NO ONE has stopped by our table. There are servers talking (huddled by fours) in the corner and two that keep grabbing drinks periodically from the Bartender to take to the Dining side.... yet NO ONE approached our table or even attempted to smile or make eye contact. We only requested a booth there in the bar because it was quieter than the dining side. Our son has sensory issues and the quieter side would keep him calmer so to not disturb others, it would make a more pleasant experience for my husband as well.  We learned all about Moscato issues being available or in/out stock, learned someone works two jobs shouldn't need to get ish free, and heard some other personal stuff.  All I wanted was my usual of chicken and carrots. I do not know what the "issue" was and why whomever chose not to wait on us, but you lost out on a decent tip.  I now  understand why they were not busy at all.  Not going to tell anyone not to visit this location but I doubt I will give them a second chance.  Hope the food quality here is better than their service.  NEVER had any poor experiences at any other Cheddars I've visited.

name: Ms. Lo Bland
text: Great place to eat at with decent prices. Sometimes it's hit or miss but my last visit was great. I had the Buffalo chicken wrapper and it was amazing.

name: VAN JOHNSON
text:
Lousy food
Slow service

name: Dara Kinkopf
text: Love this place! Not gonna lie it smells kind of weird but I am a huge fan of the spasagna.

name: Shana Adams
text: So many options and so affordable!

resp.text:
That's what we love to hear, Shana! Thanks for stopping in - hope to see you in again soon!

-Gabi

text: Good food, not fast service

name: MRS PINKY
text: Amazing food friendly staff

name: Oscar Perdomo
text: Very bad service 🤦🏻‍♂️🤦🏻‍♂️

text: Food was average and service was lacking.  Had to wait for everything and restaurant wasn't that full

text: The food was very good, the restaurant is very nice but the waiter was a little under-trained and called me "Boss Man " at least 5-6 times.

name: C.j. Montgomery
text: Took way to long to get our drinks...way too long get a house salad, then when it came out it was only cheese and lettuce none of the usual toppings. Mac and cheese "ran out" after I waited 20 minutes to get it. Food was good service piss poor.

name: Andayie Scott
text: I Love everything about Cheddars.. Staff is wonderful and on top of it. Service is fast and the foos is delicious..

name: Kahlia Good
text: The food has went down horribly over the past few years, I do recommend the amazing croissants, Apple pie, and new Orleans pasta. Anything other that usually taste bad or spoiled and this was not always the case. Go at your own risk.

name: Kira Cooper
text: Food and drinks are very good, even though the restaurant scoring is a little low. Gone a number of times and never disappointed.

name: baby yourbabys
text: great place great food

resp.text:
All great things!

-Gabi

name: Summer Virgo
text: Food very reasonable and delicious

name: Madison Epps
text: I ordered a steak, medium, and it came out cold and blood red. I then waited 20 minutes before my server even came to my table and he only then came to my table because I had sat the cut up steak on the very edge of my table. I then waited another 5 minutes before he did anything about it. I have never received such horrible service from Cheddars nor have I ever had so much bad things to say about it until now.

name: kemuel murray
text: Overall food is on par with pricing. Staff is usually slow and not courteous. The restaurant looks nice with a nice fish aquarium. Would give a five if the wait staff matched the look and food of the restaurant.

name: Olivia Smith
text: Came in to order a Togo order and was told that it would be a 20min wait... My food took over an hour. If I was given a realistic time I would have not ordered my Togo order... Very disappointed especially since the waiter didn't even care to keep me up to date with what was going on. Very dissatisfied

text: A really nice place and the food is good!

name: Raimie Wheeler
text: Typical of the chain, good atmosphere and friendly staff.

name: Natalie Korda
text: Horrible treatment. We entered the restaurant and the hostess didn't greet us. We approached the hostess stand, and the hostess turned and started talking to the waiters. Again, we were ignored. She turned around again, to talk to the waiters. We thought she was checking on tables, but again she said nothing to us. We sat on a bench, near the host stand, expecting some recognition, but were ignored again. Another person came in, was greeted right away, and sat. After that, we had had enough and left the restaurant.

text: For starters me and my husband waiting 45 min for food to arrive and when it came it came cold. When telling our waiter MIRANDA she just brushed it off and pretending like I said nothing worst experience ever wont ne coming back this was my second time here. No apology no nothing hopefully this helps people with knowing not to come here pls save your money.

text: Service not so good and steaks not right

name: Nicola Moore
text: Omg is all I can say the food was delicious

name: jeff nadolny
text: food was ok, not great.  Service was lacking.  Server did provide free desert due to poor service (took forever to get one dish.  they must have forgotten about it).  Under new management.  That may be why it is not the same as it used to be.  But an OK place to eat.

name: Tanya Rorie
text: Great selection of home cooked southern food 😋

name: Barbara Harrell
text:
AVOID!  There was a Very long wait but Tons if empty tables once we got inside. Food was meh. We were not given our favorite crossants with meals/salad because we were told you had to pay for them seperately and then the bakery was 40 minutes behind. Then later we brought it up as they were Included in our meal when we saw others being served them. She offered them Finally after several requests to go.
Food had to be sent back due to temperature and quality. We had to beg for tea refills and bottomless chip refills.
It took us forever to get food and eat. 2 plus hours....
Servers left finished tables dirty w/dishes.
I've seen cleaner bathrooms in gas stations.  Toilet paper rolls (huge ones) were on the floor or backs of toilets. Going past the bar to get to restrooms, It Smelled. Old sour beer, spilled combo junk. Yuk. We were really disappointed after driving 45 minutes to one of our favorite restaurants.
Topping off the experience was to find out that This Cheddars kitchen was voted the worst in health inspections in Charlotte Two months in a row for serious food handling/safety/gross/temperature issues. $80 plus tip of yuk. Avoid! We're those stomach troubles a virus after all?

name: Benjamin Schadrac
text: Great food and awesome atmosphere!

name: Julez C
text: The food was great!!! Portions are huge and has a great atmosphere. Pleasant waiters.

name: Judy Garland
text: We had lunch at this establish ment and it was the worst food I have eaten in a long time. Salmon was fishy the blackened shrimp Alfredo was horrible. The only good thing was the lemonade.

name: LaCresia Broaden
text: Very nice and cozy spot

name: Torri Penn
text: Second time here every time I have been I have had to send food back or remind the waiter what I ordered.  Each time the staff has been extra nice and the manager always comes by and is very apologetic and accommodating.

name: Bernard Wright
text: Service was slow, food was great tho. If not for the service I would give 4 stars.

text: Food was really good. The service was ok but they were short staffed so can't blame them for the quality.  I would return back to this place for sure.

name: Bobby Hill
text: Great food good price!

name: Awesome Awute
text: The food is always great but the custumer service could be better.

name: Khalif Croom
text: Good food but utensils were dirty

name: Cami Castillo
text: I will say the steak was so yummy. But before that they messed up on my order and gave me medium well instead of the one I asked for which was medium rare. Manager made sure to get it fixed and offered free desert. While that wS goid abd all we were told that the option I asked for was not available so I can get a different dessert. I waited and I was given original option because as I was told "We found a piece" needless to say it tasted old.

My wife ordered the bourbon glazed pork chop and side of brocc casserole. It came out plain chop with brocc cass. We sent it back. By now i have asked twice for drink refills. The same burger and frues are now brought back out with All condiments on side no cheese soooo i put burger which is now cold as well together and choke half of it down bc still no drink refills. Wives plate come out same chop now on a bed of mash taters with onion rings on top no bourbon sauce so we ask waitress says its cooked into chop but then brings out a side of the sauce after she done eating chop. Iasked 5 times for drinks to no avail. The manager cut bill in half. I dont think we should hav to hav paid for anything wat u think. Ohhh maager told waitress to get up a togo cup of drink and she brought me unsweet tea and my wife diet drink. We had sweet tea and reg dr pepper.

text: Poorest service. Not greeted by any of the three hostesses. Waiter was slow and inattentive. No drink refills. Appetizer came out after we received our meal. Table next to us got their food before us even though they came in after us. Got home to spend the majority of the evening in the bathroom with what I suspect was food poisoning. text: Never ever have I had a job that stresses you out this much. Management sucks, pick and choose when they want to be "professional" and follow the rules. Management can't even control their workers. Managers instigating fights, throwing trash on a worker but TODAY she was professional and sent me home arriving 36 minutes late after I called and let the job know I'd be late because of car trouble. But just yesterday they were calling and begging a worker who was a hour late to come to work "no call no show". After I was sent home I called the professional manager and let her hear I was stuck in Cheddars parking lot because I really was having trouble. I wouldn't have worked this job this long if I wasn't a college student trying to make it, but today I put in my two weeks and I wouldn't recommend anyone working at this ghetto establishment. Read the reviews and you can clearly see management sucks and aren't so professional. 😀 worst job of my life
