name: Jacqueline Telljohann
text:
We went here for a team lunch today and everyone really enjoyed it.

We had a large group and we're seated right away. There were a lot of good looking things on the menu. Due to diet restrictions, I got the Packhouse Burger with no bun. My only issue was that I got the burger cooked medium rare and it came out medium well. I'm was still delicious though so I can only imagine how much better it would have been if it were cooked right. The toppings were really good. The pimento cheese was sweet which was a little weird. I got green beans as my side which were pretty good.

I was able to sample someone else's chicken tenders which were really good and I heard the casserole of the day was very good as well.

The service wasn't great. I couldn't get a refill of water and it took a long time for us to get our checks and pay.

The decor is very rustic and southern inspired with a lot of wood. They have a lot of beautiful and unique elements.

The food was really good and I would definitely come back again! I'd be interested in trying their brunch.

name: Stuart Smith
text:
I’ve been to the Packhouse three times. I went for brunch with my family and we did not have a great experience. Here are my complaints:

1. I ordered a breakfast skillet. It was basically just potatoes eggs and cheese. It cost $14 which was way too expensive for what it was. It was also way too salty.

2. I got a coffee which tasted terrible. It was extremely weak. It was so bad that I asked our waitress about it. She said they didn’t have any other coffee and she didn’t charge me for it which was nice. I have never complained about coffee.

3. My mom asks for extra cheese in her skillet. There did not seem to be extra cheese in her dish when compared to mine. When the bill came there was a $1.50 charge for the extra cheese. We should have been warned about the charge or not charged.

4. My brother ordered a hamburger cooked medium. It was brown throughout. When you are paying $16 for a hamburger it should be cooked right.

On the plus side, everything looks really nice.

name: Jen Taylor Scheetz
text: Very nice surprise.  We went in midmorning on a Sunday, not too busy.  The place had a very realized feel with great food.  Excellent service, parking garage close by.  The goat cheese app was my favorite.  Coffee hit the spot.  A place I would go again.

name: Monica King
text: Really enjoyed it. Nice decor, great service, and the food was delicious.

name: K McBryde
text: Excellent atmosphere and the shrimp and grits are AWESOME...Princess was my server and she was also EXCELLENT!!!!

name: Mania Rosen
text: What a great venue!!? This place is cozy and homely with a unique vibe and a deep south feel.  The rustic theme is represented cleverly throughout the restaurant in a variety of ways.  The food is great, and the desert is no exception!  Everything they claim is evident in the service and selection...  I had the "casserole of the day" which was a thoughtful spin on chicken and rice with a hint of ranch flavor.

name: Nicky Edwards
text: We came into Charlotte from MN looking to buy a home here.  We stopped some locals to see where a good place would be for lunch on a Saturday.  They referred us to the new Packhouse.  We were amazed when we walked in the door. The atmosphere looked a barn was very interesting and country feeling.  The food was amazing. We ordered chicken and Mac and cheese and also the shrimp and grits.  It was amazing.  We were also told to try the nabs and the cream pie also absolutely amazing.  We loved it so much we had to come back before traveling back home to MN.  The staff is absolutely amazing.  We will be back next visit maybe multiple times again.  We ordered ribs and the pot pie second time around. Again amazing!!!  If you haven't tried this place it's a must! 👍😎

name: Mere Vette
text: Food is different but good

name: Michael S
text: What an amazing place! Great service and atmosphere! Great location just outside of Uptown. A must have is the Chicken and Waffle Slidders! The taste is out of this world with an explosion of flavors! The burger was delicious as well. Well worth it!

name: Christopher Estes
text: Came here for lunch and was very impressed!  The decor is very rustic even though this place just opened.  The turkey sandwich with jam was great along with the oatmeal pie for dessert.  Will definitely be back to try some of the house made cocktails.

name: Wesley Nickel
text: Great food, great drink selection, and amazing service! We had a group of 5, everyone's expectations were exceeded by far!

name: Roger Williamson
text: Wait staff and management are incredible. Food is delicious and for the most part reasonable. Unique cocktails and a great outdoor area with rocking chairs and heaters.  They even bring you throws to put over if you are chilly.

name: Adam Rosenberger
text: Pimento cheese in the picnic basket was delicious, as were  the housemade pickles. Fried chicken was fantastic!  Finished with the best oatmeal cream pie.  Service was great as well.  Can't wait to go back.

name: James Pennell
text: I had dinner here with a friend and we both enjoyed it. The drinks were great and made with a heavy hand 👌. I had the shrimp and grits with a smoked jalapeno flavor that was delicious. I love spicy food and I could taste the jalapenos which was amazing. Friend of mine had the fried chicken and macaroni  that was delish. And the wait staff 😍...best looking in town.

name: Chris
text: Cool decor, great service, good food, expected prices. With the focus on local ingredients and a unique view of uptown from outdoor seating, The Packhouse stands out as a unique spot to grab a bite or drink without having to deal with the parking challenges of venturing into uptown.

name: Malory Belcher
text: Bartender Steven was awesome. We had the Dixie Picnic and it was very good. Decor is awesome. This bar is a great representation of what is special about true NC food.  We will absolutely be back.

name: Andrew Covian
text: I was very excited to try this place because the summit room was amazing. This place was just ok. Cocktail list was pretty cool. I had friend chicken and I was underwhelmed. There is a lot of good fried chicken in the area and this place wasn't up to the competition.

name: Matt Travison
text: Wonderful service in classy restaurant that wont break the bank.  Food was great including the beef which just melts in your mouth.

name: Scott Mallonee
text:
Some of the best chicken tenders I've ever had!

Just wish they still served them with the 4 dipping sauces that they had when they opened. The spicy aioli was my favorite and they no longer have it available 🙁.

name: Patricke Ward
text: Corn fritters are amazing. And the Old Fashioned is made very well.

name: Clay Leonard
text: Great place for Sunday brunch and craft cocktails

name: Chris Guella
text: What a cool new place. Nice menu great atmosphere. Had lunch. Enjoyed it.

name: Angelica Srivoraphan
text: Great service, solid food, nice patio with rocking chairs, good selection of cocktails! Overall nice place to grab a bite to eat in dilworth.

name: Troy Dugo
text: Cool place. Kinda slow service. Was there on a Tuesday night. Pretty cool place. Would go back

name: Nicole Lotharp
text: Great place. I love the atmosphere and the food...👍

name: pynkz proceed
text: Love the food..  Clean environment very friendly and helpful

name: Denada Jackson
text: Good ole' southern food. Decor fits the food to a T.

name: Alea Sally
text: Enjoyed the food and the decor.. Can't wait to try dinner menu

name: Halfredo
text: Chef’s special: Chicken casserole. I will order this again the next time I’m there!  Service was top notch.

name: Eric Anderson
text: The design of this place is amazing! But the food and the service is a complete mess. A group of us went for lunch. It took them over an hour to get us our food and then the food was a disappointment.

name: Rocco Emelio
text: Great staff. Great brunch menu. the decore and ambience were intriguing

name: Siobhan Koch
text: Excellent service and incredible food.  We loved the grits and corn casserole sides!

name: Ellen Sheppard
text:
This new addition to the burgeoning number of restaurants in Charlotte is a welcome newcomer to Morehead street, which hasn't had enough nice restaurants since the departure of both Frankie's and The Lamplighter years ago.
It's visibility is not high, but it's location in an office building with a free parking deck is ideal. The decor is undistinguished but pleasant enough.
I had an old fashioned from the cocktail menu.  It had the perfect quantity of fruit and bitters,  but was way too sweet for me... too much simple syrup. I ordered a separate straight bourbon to add to it to diffuse the sweetness, but when my waitress learned why, I was doing that she insisted on bringing me a corrected one. "No," she said, "it's your drink. You deserve it to be how you want it." How lovely! The replacement was perfect.
Overall that waitress was fabulous. She was knowledgeable, conversant (appropriately), and very helpful. She was also training a new employee and it was fun to see how she included the newbie as she presented out options. A real pro.
Rather than an entree, I had just an app. Their selection of appetizers or small plates is disappointing, though admittedly that's not their stock in trade. I settled on the "pick 3". You pick any three cheeses or meats - from a fairly impressive charcuterie selection - and you also get nuts, spread, & bruschetta. They shorted me the honey mustard spread described on the menu, but the cherry jam was better anyway. It was beautifully presented on a butcher board.
My companion and I lingered over several rounds of drinks and we did not feel at all rushed.
I'll go back, and I suspect this restaurant will make it, despite the intense competition of the restaurant/bar scene in Charlotte.

name: Felicia McVay
text: Food was original, flavorful and light. Matt is a superb server!!!! 10 across the board😀

name: Lane Ostrow
text: Very good and impressed to see woke caught salmon very reasonably priced in the menu!

name: Ryan Edge
text: A bit pricey, but the food is delicious and the venue is quaint.

name: Mark Drinkard
text: Great spot for brunch, good craft cocktails

name: Thomas Bock
text: Great ambience and food. Strong service too.

name: Victoria Ramos
text: Great food love the service. It reminds me of a eatry in Astoria NY.

name: Michael Wetherell
text: Came here with a small group for brunch and the food was really good. Only complaint is that the bar was a little slow.

name: Nicholas Paolini
text: Food was great and the service was top notch.

name: Renee Chapman
text: Very good food very friendly staff.

name: Kevin Conway
text: So bad. Would never go back again. Nothing on the menu is worth it.

name: Carlin Taylor
text: Everything was extremely flavorful and fresh, excellent service as well.

name: Brandi Collier
text: The brunch is AMAZING. The shrimp and grits are great

name: Lavette Shirley Elee
text: Good food.  Reasonably priced.

name: Robert Bailey
text: Give it a try you won't be dissatisfied!

name: Nigel Vaughan
text: It's a very cool but trendy place

name: Stuart Hair
text: Good southern food and drink. Uneven service.

name: Trey Klingensmith
text: Beautiful place to come and relax and enjoy the southern hospitality and decor!!!

name: Sonya Jordan
text: Love this place, the atmosphere and the people!!

name: Mark Clark
text: Rocking chairs overlooking a busy street. Lacks intimacy.

name: Overtop Media
text: good stuff

name: Harris Waqar
text: Great brunch!

name: Lance McKnight
text: Fried chicken was great!

name: Alecia Bracy
text: Food was good, cocktail and wine list.

name: Don Hettiaratchy
text: Best brunch place in town

name: 80slvr87
text: Great food and service but a bit overpriced. 28$ for country fried steak with potatoes and green beans is a bit much.

name: ca swift
text: Fabulous!

name: Tony Johnson
text: 1st mean tasteless but the 2nd was GREAT.

name: Adam Raskoskie
text: Impatient employee was rude with me because my Uber Eats driver tried to pay with an Uber card. Terribly unprofessional.

name: Kush Shah
text: Ordered two chicken salad sandwiches on the phone. They ended up giving me one and I saw them give another one to someone that ordered as he walked in the store and after me. Then they said they were out of chicken salad and I waited an additional 15 minutes for a different sandwich. A place who truly values their customers would never impose a loss on a customer. I wasted my time and still was not satisfied. Thumbs down here. RiRa sandwich club is hands down the best place for sandwiches in this vicinity.

name: Rite Lite Signs
text: We had the pleasure of working with Reid's fabricating their beautiful store-front blade sign for their newest Uptown location! Excellent B2B transaction!

name: Camille Walters
text: This is a wonderful local deli and bar. So many sandwich and salad selections to chose from. They also have a store for specialty food items. Some items can get very pricey so watch for that. I love their iced tea (I mix it half and half). Very quick service.

name: Hannah Bowman - Accounts
text: Initially a bit disappointed in this place because of the price range ( My personal budget can't afford $8.50 sandwiches with chips and drink priced on top) BUT I've had a change of heart!  After a little exploring I found the ready made cold foods are very reasonably priced given the quantity especially in Uptown. Fresh fruit cup with assorted berries $2.10 + tax !!?? I think I'll have two. They have very upbeat and friendly service and the food quality is worth the price. ( No soggy berries yet!) A place  worth a stop for a quick bite! Thanks Reid's!

name: Jennifer Powell
text: Good food made to order quicky

name: Ashley Jones
text:
Small yet intimate. Inside of a very lavish building in uptown Charlotte. Tables and chairs are set near a curved window where customers can chat with friends and sit for a convenient meal after purchasing from the grocery store near by.
No processed foods in sight! Everything appears fresh or is freshly made at the deli/bakery in store.
Haven't purchased anything yet this time around, but do plan on treating myself very soon when I have my coins saved up.
Be advised, many of the items on the shelves, in the freezer, and in the refrigerator areas do NOT have prices... May have to bring extra "pocket change" (think of how the term was used in the movie "Coming to America" with Eddie Murphy and Arsenio Hall lol)...
But most definitely looking forward to returning soon!

name: Omileti
text: Great good and they can handle allergies.  A bit pricey though, but yummy.

name: Claire Hall
text:
Review on breakfast only:

I ordered ahead and scheduled pick up for 9:45a as I work right next door. I got a breakfast bowl with grits, sausage, eggs and avocado. I picked it up right at 9:45 and it was completely cold. It’s like they had made it as soon as I ordered (~8:30) and left it out. The avocado was old and bruised and the grits were super runny.

I chose Reid’s because I wanted fresh ingredients and something not too heavy. I couldn’t even finish it - no flavor, cold and gross. The eggs were almost like those powdered ones you got in school.

I know this is their only location that serves breakfast but they need to seriously step it up. They could do a lot of business if they put the same effort into breakfast as they do lunch.

name: Joel Ferris
text: I used to say that Reid's (Myers Park on Selwyn) has the best burger in Charlotte, but today I had the worst burger in Charlotte at Reid's Uptown. the service was unfriendly, and the burger was cold, dry, and honestly hard to eat. I'm sure they have adequate lunch and breakfast but I am very disappointed in how they compare to the other Reid's.

name: Camille Edwards
text: Dependable consistent food

name: Tifarah Irving
text: Ashley is AMAZING! I love working with her!

name: Shelby Adams
text: Great breakfast sandwiches!

name: Malely Cardona
text: Excellent customer service as usual

name: Anastasia M
text:
I was surprisingly shocked about Oh My Soul. South African vegan food? That's quite a concept and this resturant executed it well.
Although, this establishment looks sort of an stand alone home on NOLA it has so much more to offer. There is a full bar, tent with live music, picnic table outside and so much more. The food is quite interesting. Not in a bad way but different. Exceptionally tasty and super filling.
The staff were extremely polite, welcoming and sweet. It was definitely a great experience and everyone (even meat eaters) should give Oh My Soul a try.

name: Allen Todd
text: Excellent vegan dishes.  Lots of choices of main dishes and really nice outdoor seating with full bar.  Live music on Fridays and Saturdays

name: Sandy Li
text: Everything from the food, atmosphere, decorations, tented outdoor space is so well thought out. The food is creative and bursting with flavor, leaving vegans & non-vegans excited for more! The jalapeno peppers appetizer is out of this world!! They usually have live music on the weekends. Dogs allowed. Pricey, but worth every penny.

name: Jameela Nurullah
text: Omgoodness! The best! Seriously! I love the atmosphere, the service, and especially the FOOD! They are always very friendly and helpful. I’m always looking for a good vegan burger and this place hands down will have the best you’ll ever run across in Charlotte.

name: Michelle Glenn
text: WOW. This place is fantastic. Great food. So much flavor. Very friendly staff. Great deserts. Love the patio seating outside; so fun and inviting!!

name: Chiquetta Caldwell
text: They have nowhere gor the customer's to park i hot a boot on my car from being in the store for 3 min and I left someone in the car they needs to do better

name: Talib Ghafoor
text: I was slightly disappointed today when visiting Oh My Soul. It began with the parking. There is on the street parking at your own risk of tow. Their menu's were uniquely written on the walls. I ordered a sweet potato dish that left my pallid wanting to scream in displeasure. I received my French fries late and cold. My Queen ordered  a fish and hushpuppy meal. The hushpuppies advertised to have cheese and jalapeños failed to meet their mark. I generally try to give a good review on places. Sometimes you just can't work around impossible situations. They do have an outdoor bar and area to eat at. If you are not really into good tasting vegan food.

name: Alisha Askew
text:
We took an adventure to Noda and finally got a chance to try Oh My Soul!
I have been eye balling and drooling all over their IG for months!
And my soul says YES!!!
Vegan BBQ Ribs with Potato Salad and Seasoned Fries
Vegan Buddha Bowl
Vegan Cheddar Jalapeño Hush Puppies

name: Jowette Bobray
text: Food and service were great! The "vicken" wrap and oniom rings I ordered were made so well! I thoroughly enjoyed my meal! Our juice was made fresh and delicious! We also ordered the pimento cheese sandwich and fries and that was equally delicious.  The pimento had a nice nice kick to it The day we visited was a beautiful spring day so we sat outside and were able to maintain social distancing while we enjoyed our meal with our son. Overall,  great experience!

name: gem grant
text: really lovely love music, great seating, and delicious plant based food! i would highly recommend giving them a try

name: VP
text: I really like the vibe of the place. Vert rustic and earthly. The overall quality of the food was quite good. Didn't care for how sweet the wingz were as I was expecting a more savory profile. Would have been five stars but the portions for sides is quite small and I find their cocktails to be overpriced for a restaurant of this genre. I pay 15 for drinks that include a rooftop, 4 and 5 star dining, or some other memorable dining experience such as live instrumentation. This restaurant while cute isn't a fancy enough place in my opinion to warrant the price they charge for adult beverages. That part left a sour taste in my mouth which would mostly make me pass on dining again as libations are a part of my enjoyment when out socializing. Too many other options that offer more complete dining experiences at competitive pricing. Disappointing but it's quite a place if you're into chic and trendy.

name: Roselle Sherriff
text: AMAZING! The food is absolutely delicious and is authentically South African. A real taste of home 🇿🇦 this is vegan food done incredibly well. Come hungry, and leave room for dessert.

name: Mia Kirkland
text: 2nd visit and we haven't had a bad meal. We've tried several menu items, the burgers are delicious and filling. Vish and chips is so good. There are too many delicious items to name. I don't have any affiliation with the restaurant. I'm just a vegan foodie who appreciates well seasoned food!

name: Seth Headley
text: The food was DELICIOUS! They have this kinda vegan rib thing omg it taste WOWOWOWOWOW GOOD OK. everything from the decor to the back patio was extremely pleasing and fantastic! This was our first time there and it won’t be our last. Good social distance protocols here and making a beautiful “backyard” area. A Plus! Prices are about what to expect eating healthy and moderately clean.

name: Laura Skillington
text: I cannot believe that I haven't heard more about this place. There is something delicious for every mood: burgers, comfort food, salads, breakfast, smoothies, cocktails, coffee, shakes, sweets, snacks and probably more. Every single staff member is consistently friendly, polite and helpful. We really love the good vibes of this place and the South African flavors. I really can't say enough good things.

name: Jed Beck
text: Great food, great location, awesome vibe and people. Vegan restaurant that can compete with an extremely competitive food scene in Noda, and that says alot! I eat meat and can't wait to go back.

name: Graham Hayes
text: People are super cool and nice. The food was excellent. Live music on the patio was great!

name: C
text:
Very attentive! Explained dishes and food was brought to us quickly!
Delicious, additional seasoning wasn't needed! Had to get dessert too, which was amazing!

name: Fergus Horner
text: The staff is so friendly even when they were really busy and they had live entertainment and a really nice patio.

name: Brianne Cellemme-Short
text: Excellent food, friendly staff. The variety of food is great so everyone can find something. They also have gluten free and tree nut free options labeled.

name: Jamie Berger
text: Food was delicious (loved the pimento cheese and hush puppies especially!) and the outdoor patio was awesome. Great cocktails too.

name: Dean Liu
text: Great staff, great food, and great music. Overall good vibes. Seating in the back patio is well spaced out too. Will definitely come back. Go vegan!

name: T C
text: Very good. Very nice place out back to enjoy a nice dinner, live music and drinks. Very nice staff!!

name: KP
text: This place is absolutely amazing!! The food, service and drinks wow!!!!! Such an awesome gem in the noda area of Charlotte. I will definitely return again looking forward to trying something else on the menu.

name: Aaron DiDonato
text: Great atmosphere. They've done well with the pop up tent out back and live music even during COVID. Traditional South African vegan dish, "Big Bro", was extremely filling but energized me. Will be back and will order something different every time.

name: Tonga Newsome
text: It was our daughter's birthday and she wanted to have dinner here...great choice!! The food was so good. The ribs and kale salad are a must!  The whimsical backdrop set the ambiance for the evening. While social distancing we were able to enjoy some delicious food, doggie watch and have a little sense of normalcy. The wait staff was amazing and very accommodating.  Can't wait to go back..

name: C Cro
text: Birthday Lunch at Oh My Soul was beyond amazing!! Customer Service was excellent, Food was Yummy/Delicious. My new favorite Vegan spot! Love the sitting area in the back as well! Nice and comfy restaurant!

name: SalinaKai
text: Amazing atmosphere. The live band really set the mood. And the staff, they too were so welcoming & kind 😊  definitely a place of good energy !! Will definitely return.

name: Jerome Cooper
text: I am not vegan but visited this venue and was very pleased. The service was amazing and the food was delicious. The outdoor space had a great vibe and was very casual. They had great drinks available at the bar and everything I ordered was served in large portions and very tasty. Perfect place for casual meetup with friends or a date night in good weather. I’m sure the baked goods inside were great for breakfast also. I’d highly recommend checking them out.

name: Apurva Kala
text: Good Vegan Menu, with outdoor seating, Very welcoming staff. Little difficult to find parking near by.

name: Cameron Bradford
text: Amazing food, people, and atmosphere!  Def will be added to my favorite places to eat and hang out!!

name: Davidaniel
text: Beautiful outdoor space that is lit up with gas fire places around all of the tables in the evening. The drinks are really good, but $14 for some of the mixed drinks is a bit high for the amount of alcohol you get, in my opinion. I would highly recommend checking this place out!

name: April Clark
text: This place was amazing, the food was delicious. I absolutely love the atmosphere.

name: Donna Brown
text: What an amazing Restaurant! My daughter is vegan and we don't have many options for eating out where we live. We found this place on the web and thought we would try it for lunch. I was blown away! The menu is so extensive and the food was delicious. I am not vegan but the beyond burger and fries were outstanding. And the ambiance! How fun and funky. Setting in the courtyard on a sunny day listening to music and having a delicious draft beer. Everyone we encountered was so pleasant. If you haven't been here you are missing out. We will be regulars!!!!

name: Rex Cooper
text: I walked up to the bar was asked if I would like two shots of Jack, I said yes and had one of the best brunches of my life.

name: Jovana Lazovic
text: Amazing, flavorful vegan food! I recommend the Zingalings, the best vegan chicken wings ever!

name: Shay Edwards
text:
I absolutely love their food and the vibe.
I had the special. It was a Philly Cheese steak😍

name: Sean Shuping
text: I'm not vegan by any stretch, but the voerie roll (vegan boerewors roll ) is crazy good. Lekker bru!

name: Choc Da Bartender
text: Delicious and Filling.  I had the Senorita Bonita , Kale Salad , Pumpkin Fritters, and strawberry delight! It was very tasty.

name: Christopher Kennedy
text: Loved this place. Best vegan food we've had so far while visiting North Carolina. The best vibes when you walk in through the door. The staff os super friendly. They gave us great recommendations for food options. We lobed everything we had. We ate on the back patio under this huge oak tree. We will definitely be back before we head back to Florida.

name: Theresa McDonald
text: Great menu items!  Fantastic decor, wonderful patio.  Highly recommended!

name: Kimberly Mayes
text: I am not vegan. I just like good food and was recommeneded this spot by a strict vegan. So vish and chips and vibs and carrot cake. Vish was great. Crisp outside and juice vinegar forward banana blossom. Vibs on the other hand...loved the spice, the sweet, the flavor was excellent. As a meat eater though the texture was not great for me, but again can't measure it against meat. Especially after having the vish. Carrot cake was 🔥🔥🔥. Would come back.

name: poofygrimalkin
text:
Puppy dog friendly vegan restaurant that serves delicious and flavorful foods.
There are watering stations outside on the patio with plenty of shady spots for your pup!
Their Nice cream is cold, smooth and creamy and their pimento cheese toastie is filling and a delicacy of the South.
They even have ice cream for your fur-puppies 💕

Definitely planning to come over with friends one weekend to hear the live music.

name: jesse mcdaniel
text: One of the best vegan restaurants I've ever been too . Big menu with lots of variety and the environment was really cool I will definitely be back!

name: jordan smalls
text: I just came all the way from Greensboro to pick up an online order and they left out my side of hush puppies again!! I love the food and I love this place but I hate when I order online and they leave something out. Because I live in Greensboro, I’m too far to come back and I want what I pay for -_- . This same thing just happened AGAIN on 4/4/21! Make sure you check your To go order before you leave because they are constantly getting over on people by not giving you your sides and it’s annoying. How hard is it to check and make sure everything is in an order before you tell someone their order is ready to be picked up? I am beyond annoyed and I WANT WHAT I PAY FOR!! It’s very simple.

resp.text:
Hi Jordan,
We are so sorry that you had a bad experience at OMS. We have extremely high standards and value you and your patronage. Please email us at ohmysoulusa@gmail.com so that we may rectify the issue ASAP.
Regards - OMS management

name: Denise Lawton
text: Where do I start to describe this amazing gem. I have wanted to go here with my daughter for awhile. We went last night and had a great experience all around. Staff are professional and also make you feel at home. Every thing on the menu makes you want to try it. There's so much to choose from on the menu you can visit many times and still have many choices. My daughter is vegan and she had the vish fish. I am enjoying my new vegan journey and chose the vicken wrap. Our sides were jalapeno puppies and onion rings. Our appetizer was the jalapeno poppers. Everything was delicious!! Quality and quantity of portions was served. The nightime atmosphere was amazing with dining outside accompanied with live music and outside bar makes you feel like you are dining in a tropical vacation spot. We thoroughly enjoyed our whole experience and want to return for the brunch. It's definitely the first place we will consider when we get the urge to spoil ourselves. And I have to give a shout out to their 'desserts' so many were eye eyecatching that I have to return to try each one personally!!

name: Karen Vaughan
text:
This place will change your perspective on vegan food. It was delicious and a nice change from the usual burgers and wraps lunch offerings. I had the waffle with hummus and avocado but also tried my daughter's vurger and was impressed. Most of their dishes don't try to imitate meat, which I appreciate. I am an unapologetic omnivorous carnivore but do enjoy my veggies so this was a fun and tasty place to eat.
They have put great covid protocols in place. There is a large tent behind the store which is heated so you can eat in.

name: Kaleigh Stovall
text: I’m not a vegan or vegetarian but Oh My Soul was delicious and satisfying! I had the sweet potato fries (best I’ve ever had anywhere) and a berry smoothie and both were delicious. I’m definitely planning to go back and try other things on the menu.

name: Tonya Cruz
text: So excited to have another vegan restaurant in Charlotte! They've done a fantastic job decorating the inside with things that educate about why we are vegan! The owners are super nice and checked on us several times to make sure we were enjoying ourselves. They have a good size menu with lots of things to try! Can't wait to go back and try something else!

name: R2O %
text: Finally a place for full fledge vegan food and hang out. Drinks are expensive.

name: Ruchi J
text: Decent food, decent service! I ordered the Buddha Bowl and nothing on that bowl tasted great. The sweet potatoes were not cooked properly, the falafal was too dry and spinach was too bland. The kale salad I ordered on the side had not enough dressing. I did not feel this food was high quality.

name: Dayna Verhey
text: I cannot express how amazing this place is. Amazing atmosphere, great staff, delicious food. Everything they have is delicious and the mood they have created is so friendly and comfortable. It's so easy to be healthy here, and this restaurant is my favourite by far. If you're thinking of trying it, do it. You will not be disappointed!

name: Tracy Berthelson
text: One of the staff members was rude.  Food was ok, not worth the price though.   Two types of music were blaring outside.  Hard to find a parking spot.

name: Elizabeth Sutton
text: This is a great new place in NODA I'm not vegan but OMG it was delicious and full of flavor!the outdoor patio area is great!  Plenty of shade and the decide is whimsical.  The food is delicious even if you aren't vegan.  A must try for everyone!

name: Tiffani Norman
text: The ideal alternative to the "typical" restaurant. The food was delicious & the ambience was welcomed & relaxed. It is a great option for a Vegan Date Night. The Vish & Chips entree was tasty & more than satisfying.

name: Liz Vermoesen
text: Absolutely love this place. I'm not vegan...in fact I LOVE meat, but the food here is delicious anyways. So fresh and flavorful. They make vegan food taste absolutely amazing, which means it comes with a price tag. Its pretty expensive but you definitely get your moneys worth.

name: S. Raenae Thompson
text: The vegan ribs were PHENOMENAL!! The vegan chicken sandwich was PHENOMENAL!! I ordered via Door Dash and now we plan on coming to the restaurant soon to eat and enjoy the restaurant ambiance.

name: AMS
text: The CUTEST spot with the most genuine, attentive staff. We dropped in this afternoon for a cocktail and ended up staying for hours, ordering food and enjoying the live music outside. The staff stopped to check on us multiple times and even accommodated our puppy by bringing her water and a treat. Will totally be back! Thank you for a great afternoon!

name: Jessica Vasquez
text: 👌 Great everything drinks, food, vibes all awesome 👌

name: Frank Kapelar
text: I'm not a vegan. My daughter is. I took her and her dog (currently my favorite living canine) here for lunch. Had a lovely afternoon lunch. Food was incredibly good. Really tasty. Place is pet friendly. We ate outside. I'm going again even if my daughter isn't with me.  Place is very srrious about having a safe place for you to eat. Tables cleaned as soon as you are finished dining. Water dishes out for pets. This establishment deserves your business. Your taste buds will thank you.

name: David Worden
text: A wonderful restaurant with amazing flair. Super friendly staff and wonderful food! The outside venue is quaint and warm. They had a live entertainer when we stopped in tonight. She was wonderful although I didn't catch her name. I highly recommend!

name: Randy Loves
text: I am very pleased and happy to see a new vegan restaurant here in Charlotte! Today was my first visit and I did take out. The food was amazing and although we had a mistake with our order, the owner or management took care of it with no questions. I really appreciate the staff here and the quality of the food. Definitely will be back to try out more of their menu!

name: BellaB Jordan
text: Now this is one of my favorite places to eat! The food is delicious the employees are great and remembered us from two weeks ago! If you have not tried this place I highly recommend that you give it a try!🥰

name: J. Nykol
text: The service was immaculate, everyone was super nice. We tried 4 meals and 2 drinks (shakes). One shake was thrown away in the entirety bc it wasn't good. Out of the four meals I'd return but wouldn't order any of the same items to try something else, some was bland not much seasoning but over all I'd still return to give it another try of the different menu items. Thank for being so kind and for the meals. (Desert is way over priced)

name: Cheyann Ogden
text: Option, options and more options! I haven't experienced a vegan spot with as many delicious breakfast and lunch items as Oh My Soul! From bowls to Vurgers to smoothies and an assortment of dessert treats, there is something for everyone. I cannot wait to go back!

name: J. Noel Lance
text:
Best food I've had in a long long time.... And I'm not even vegan.

Get the Buddah Bowl and the Pumpkins Fritters.    Out of this world.

The owner and her staff are super nice and cheerful too!

name: Tania Smith
text: Amazing South African vibes and Vegan food! You have to try them! Even if you aren't vegan, the food is great!!!

name: Cliff & Katie Collins
text:
Went here for the first time today with my Besty after seeing it featured several times in the vegan Charlotte Facebook group. I ordered the South African special of the day which was OK, it came out kind of lukewarm but they were super busy so it is forgiven. I also ordered the loaded sweet potato and everything on that is super Yum except for that they piled it high with steamed greens which have almost no flavoring. They could do well to quarter the amount of greens and sauté them with some soy sauce or another spicy flavor. As is -I would pass. However, the barista made me a ginger vanilla iced latte that is hands-down one of the best drinks I’ve ever had in my life. I’ve had other African drinks that feature ginger and lemon and love the real and freshness of the ingredients. I would go there explicitly for this latte again.
The photo is from when the staff came out and did an impromptu South African line dance. Was such a happy atmosphere and every everyone was laughing and clapping. Sweet and lively, the outdoor area of this place is quintessential Noda and I will definitely be back.

name: Stephanie Johnson
text: I've had multiple dishes here that were all very good. The people who run this place were super nice and truly believe in their plant-based mission. Oh and the outdoor space has a very cool setup and is social distancing friendly.

name: Zoe Vickers
text:
Got above & beyond w fries, peanut butter butterscotch milkshake, sweet potato fries, spring rolls.

10/10 one of the best things I’ve eaten in years period.

name: Pradeep chowdary peddineni
text: Very excited to see one more vegan place, very rustic and beautiful interior. However food was nothing extraordinary.

name: Christina Garcia
text: This was an amazing vegan place with an amazing atmosphere.  The food was awesome.  100% Vegan friendly ♡♡ The workers was so very nice.   Was a pain to get to it but then again im from the country where you ever  establishment has their own parking..

name: Jacob Holmes
text: Love the environment of this bar/restaurant. AMAZING food. I am nowhere close to being a full time vegan but this place will absolutely open your eyes about vegan food. It is pretty pricey but the "backyard" area makes but for it. If your looking for a healthy place to eat, this is the place to go.

name: Raghu Challapilla
text: Eclectic fusion food and unique almost international vibe in the back patio with live music. On the list of my top two vegan spots in Charlotte. Great for hanging out with friends or taking out your date!

name: Jerry Little
text: Bought takeout dinner for the family. Everything was fresh and the order was correct. Super nice people. Will definitely recommend to family and friends.

name: Gus Catapano
text: Service was nice, but food was 🤢🤮

name: Michael Jessup
text:
Friendly and welcoming staff, great vibes, live music, and oh my soul, the food is amazing
-not a Vegan (yet)

name: Bianca Padilla
text: Delicious vegan food!

name: Beth Lambert
text: I absolutely love this place! The atmosphere is wonderful ! I so appreciate the live music that sometimes shows on weekends. So many delicious baked goods and a big menu with something for everyone . The cronut was the best treat I’ve ever tried .  So happy it opened near me!

name: Faris Hammami
text: I got the King Kong black bean burger. It was phenomenal!!! One of the best meals I’ve ever had. I highly recommend this restaurant! For what it’s worth, I am not vegan nor vegetarian.

name: Bianca Mulligan
text: First time trying vegan it was so good. I think I will be transitioning over. I will be back

name: M Andrew
text: Very cute place with nice outdoor patio area.  Food is a teeny bit pricey but welcome to vegan food where you have to pay to play.

name: Alex Serrano
text: The food was for sure good. Cute, bright, little place with good service.

name: Nallelis Mejia
text: Disappointed with the food. If you don't really like sauces and/or pickles, your only option is the Vish and chips, which is not appetizing. Really liked the atmosphere!

name: Michael Martelette
text: First timer, not Vegan... Will DEFINITELY be back. Fantastic food and a great atmosphere 💯🙌👍

name: Kevin Newman
text: Nice place, great food. Outside seating was nice with lots of shade. Love vegan dining.

name: Vegan Rebel
text: I cannot rave any more about this place.  The food, the customer service, the decor, the atmosphere is ALL amazing.  This is the place to be if you want a wonderfully tasty meal which is not only ethical but healthy too.  The owners are such darlings and 100% dedicated to making this planet a better place for ALL sentient beings - that alone gets 5 stars.  I cannot wait to come back and eat everything again.

name: Ernie R
text: Oh My Soul is the bomb.... please please visit and eat compassionate food... with the company of compassionate owners, staff and customers......food was exquisite....Michael our server was amazing.. Richard the owner was a great host and super friendly.....a great addition to the Charlotte Vegan community......WELCOME TO CHARLOTTE.. thank you

name: Lisa Hetzler
text: Very friendly, nice atmosphere!

name: Zhi Bell
text: Wow! This is such an euphoric emotional elixir😇😇

name: Rob marie
text: Banana blossom fish had tofu in the middle and it didn't state that on menu. They did however exchange it for a bowl.

name: Frank Kapelar
text: Delicious. The Hippie Chick sandwich is spicy hot. And very tasty.

name: Luz Perilla
text: We no enjoy is 🌧 day. The place is nice , but no have good space por people inside,  and send we under umbrellas with big storm in the way.

name: Lonnie Gee
text: I ordered a takeout they were very friendly and the food was great 👍 if you like healthy eating checkout Oh My Soul

name: Nick Cash
text: If I could give 10 stars I would! So friendly, helpful, and the food was the best I've had in  Charlotte

name: Chris Baucom
text: Great food, drinks and service

name: Prasad Kashyap
text: Loved it. Something for everyone.

name: Will Downing
text: Absolutely amazing!!! Not 100% vegan but, would convert easily!! Keep doing you! Super friendly staff and owners. I'll be back...

name: Ben Pugh
text: Absolutely delicious, friendly staff, and great atmosphere (for when the quarantine is all over). To clarify, I am not vegan but enjoy veggie options and this place provides some of the most flavorful in Charlotte. Welcome to town Oh My Soul!

name: Gypsy 360
text: Over priced and over rated.

name: Kent Deckerhoff
text: Incredible food and drinks paired with an amazing outdoor space has made this my new favorite in noda! Amazing service and all around good energy!

name: Robert Delaporte
text: Very good. Awesome experience.

name: Taylor
text: Zingalings are amazing

name: Jerrod Duggins
text: Definitely was really tasty. Would recommend and go back

name: kristian s
text: Hard to beat for the money...

name: Siddharth Pandey
text: Excellent vegan food..

name: Lura Dean
text: Such a disappointing experience.  We called earlier in the day to get a reservation and we were told that they were walk in only (even though the website says reservation only).  We show up and put out name on the list at 6pm and we were told it would be an hour.  We went and killed time and when  it said we were next we headed back.  Once there we waiting an additional 30 minutes.  They weren't following the order that people came in they were just seating people randomly.  Then after being seated we were told they were out of everything but one burger and two sides.  We don't get date night after and they ruined this one for us.  We got up and left and not sure we will come back.  The only reason I am giving two stars is because I know they were overwhelmed but the only was to keep calm under pressure is to have a plan and thy definately did not

name: Jason Baker
text: Stopped in today to pick-up an order to go. First let's talk about the food! I had the grilled vicken and bacon ranch wrap and coleslaw as a side. It was delicious! Great texture, a crunch to those vicken pieces and a tangy sauce I really enjoyed. A large serving and very filling. Coleslaw had a great flavor to it and was extremely fresh. They had many fresh pastries, made fresh daily, to look at, but I didn't have room this visit. I'll hit that up the next time. Both owners were working and they were super friendly and we had great conversation! I'll be back!

name: Abby Potts
text: Amazing vegan food! Even my non-vegan friends loved it. All their desserts are to die for. I had their carrot cake and I couldn’t believe it was vegan!

name: Todd Dalrymple
text: Amazing menu that tastes better than it looks. We are so lucky to have this amazing vegan option in Charlotte. Welcome and thank you for coming to Noda!

name: PowerForce Forever Urs
text: Great place and environment

name: Rebecca Nance
text: Wow! The food here is amazing. It makes me want to be vegan!

name: Cagri Onder
text: Super friendly guys, good food, good music. What else you need?

name: Jeff Weiss
text: Food and service was amazing and I am not a vegetarian!

name: Raelynn Costa
text: Just moved and oh my soul will be one of my go to spots for vegan food! Very delicious food and friendly staff as well!

name: Vincent Centanni
text: Good vegan food.

name: Lewis Merit
text:
This place is everything that is wrong with noda. Well meaning and idealistic vendors, paying extraordinary rents and thus charging exorbitant prices.

While I have not eaten here, the backyard bar is astonishingly, and inexplicably expensive. I paid $42, including tip, for 2 well cocktails, and a domestic beer, in essentially a backyard tiki bar. Just to be clear, these were ordered from their normal menu.

I have paid more for drinks, however, these were typically created using exotic or rare ingredients or in an unusual or opulent setting. This was none of these things, and while good, the value was absent.

Drinking self service drinks from a throaway plastic cup, while being bitten by mosquitoes, and surrounded by plywood does not feel premium in any way.

I feel we were exploited, and I will not be returning. The GET THE MONEY!!! attitude that has infested noda, not only by this establishment but landlords, is what is killing the scene.

name: El
text: Seriously ah-mazing! Part of me doesn't want to share this because it is so wonderful that I want to keep it all to myself, but believe me when I say it is magical!

name: Danilo De la Torre
text: Amazing good and Great atmosphere.... live music on fridays...

Cannot wait to go back with my family and try even more!!

resp.text: Thank you so much!!

name: Najwa Adoravél
text: Great fresh food. A much healthier choice over fast food. The customer service is really good, they definitely aim to please the customer. Nice place for a lunch date, eating with friends, family or alone. Prices are reasonable as well.

text: I'm pretty sure that this place it'sclose out off businesses

text: Love eating here. The food is fresh and good. Everything has a unique twist. They always remember me when I come by. I take new people there whenever I'm on that side of town.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: TJ V
text: Great little place right by UNC Charlotte. Very laid back, but attentive staff. Seems like a family owned franchise, and everyone was very nice. The food is fantastic, and makes for a great quick sit-down lunch. It's new in the neighborhood, but you should definitely give it a try.

resp.text: Thank you, and yes I we are family owned and operated.

name: Raven Thomas
text: Hidden gem in the Shoppes at University! Glad i found it today. I thoroughly enjoyed my strawberry cocunut smoothie! Literally wanting another one right now..

name: Anna Mather
text: My Camille’s catered my wedding and did an absolutely wonderful job! The food was amazing as was the chef & servers. Camille is personable, flexible- willing to make pretty much anything you wish, all in all a wonderful choice for catering. Thanks Camille!!!

name: Ivy Le
text:
I’ve never had any bad experiences here but the customer service is so so. Not that bad but not too good. The staff always seems like she’s tired.
I mean overall it’s a good location of UPS.

name: Raja Ram M
text:
the lady and Vipul(owner I believe) are really helpful but they lose a star for no hygiene.
He tries to sell products - I wanted to ship a document - he quoted $24, I got it done for $9 overnight at fedex to DC.
Notary job is easy and breeze.
They charge $2 for computer usage, which is kinda common.
They don't have hand sanitizer or sanitizing wipes. They offer restroom, but he hands over the paper napkin which kinda defeats the purpose.

resp.text:
we are thankful to you for your appreciation. Fedex and UPS both are separate entities and both have their plus points and shipping charges. we can quote the charges for UPS only. In the initial stage of Covid 19 we tried to have  hand sanitizer but could not get it from any store and out stock was exhausted so sorry for the same.
we will try to provide you best services and now hand sanitizer is available at the store. once again sorry for your feelings

name: Don Koster
text: Always helpful and attentive to my needs. The staff at this store is the best!

resp.text: thanks for your response and you are always welcome

name: Rajesh Kilanooru
text: He is very helpful while droppoff or notary, I really like this place.

resp.text: THANKS AND YOU ARE ALWAYS WELCOME

text:
Very nice people!!
Went there for notary!!
Got my job done in less than 5 mins..
Very humble staff..

resp.text: you are always welcome

name: Rahul Bhattacharjee
text: They charge way too much for notary, other places do it for 2 dollars and they charge 5 dollars per person which is exorbitant, have been there for notary a few times as closest to my home but thinking of going to some other place next time. They even charge for using computer for couple mins for taking print out, it's like they would charge even if you just step into that store if they could. Also the wait time is too long and very slow.

resp.text: Sorry for your feelings but this is the rate and minimum charges by all the Notaries in the State and we are authorized to charge as per State Rules and regulations. we don't charge more than the state limit. Further Bank do the Notary for free for their customers. For print and use of computers we have written policy and we always informed the customers before use of the same. Once again sorry for waiting for too long since we have only two registers to attend the customers and we serve first come first basis. Sorry for waiting for too long and it is not intentional at all. we apologies for your feelings and would definitely improve our services . Thanks for your response.

name: MJBB33
text: Great customer service, very friendly and helpful!

resp.text: thanks and welcome again

name: Sabil Huda
text: Charged $2.25 for printing amazon label when it clearly says on the amazon site that it's  $1. Beware... other ups stores charge  $1

resp.text:
apologies for your feelings. We don't charge anything if you have your pre printed label available with you. If you are using the store facility, there is fix charge for use of computer of 2.00 $ and one page print is .25 cents. This is also kept on the customer computer on poster for information. Sorry for your inconvenience. we will try to serve you best.
vipul

name: Anastasia Prapas
text: We were looking for some authentic Italian food and we were pleasantly surprised at the quality of food. The ambience is wonderful and the decor is beautiful. Great date night place!

name: Justine V
text:
Ordered from Volo for take out. For the price you pay, these portions are not worth it. Likely you should eat in the restaurant to get the full experience.

Quality of food is decent. However, when I got my order there were items missing.

resp.text: Hi Justine, Appreciate your feedback. Please reach out to us at info@voloclt.com to chat further about your missing items. Thank you!

name: Sophia
text: Octopus is delicious. Ambience is nice. Service is great.

name: Mike Hege
text: We experienced Italian food here as authentic as the food we had on our Honeymoon in Italy.  The pasta is made fresh and the chef personally came out to explain the buffalo milk and ricotta cheese and how they are paired together.  The salad was very tasty and the pasta even more so.  Lastly the limoncello shot was a nice touch and if you don't try anything else...you will die over their version of Tiramisu.   Cheers to Marco the owner and the creation of a wonderful ambiance and legit Italian cuisine in the heart of Myers Park. Also... our server Martin was phenomenally attentive, personable,  and knowledgeable!

resp.text: Hey Mike! Appreciate the great review! Hope to see you back soon!!

name: Judith Parker
text:
We had reservations for 6pm.  When I arrived I walked in and only a few people there eating.  The hostess was nice and walked me to a two person tiny table in the middle of this small restaurant.  Table was in a high traffic area with three other little tables by the bar.  It would be like eating with three other couples that you do not know.  You would definitely know them by the time your meal finished. Since there were empty booths .. I asked for a booth.  She had to ask permission from the manager who was quite rude.  He immediately said no .. being saved for others.
We did not stay and went elsewhere to enjoy a delicious meal in a friendly and very classy setting.  (Del Frisco)!!!

resp.text:
Hi Judith,
I am sorry for inconvenience. Please contact me by email at Domenico@voloclt.com. Thank you!

name: Google User
text: Great spot for a date night. We went during the week because we heard its really busy on the weekends. They do live music Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday's and it was a very pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thanks!!

text: Food is fantastic. Unique and very refreshing atmosphere great for a glass of wine or a nice meal. Staff and management are incredibly nice and welcoming.

text: For me Volo was just okay. The food was high quality, but the flavors were a little bland for my taste. Also, the waiter seemed nervous and was not well trained. Perhaps he was new. However, the bartender who came to the table (because we ordered some specialty drinks) also seemed awkward.  We ordered the octopus app, carpaccio, red snapper and branzino.

resp.text: Hi Stephen, sorry for your okay experience. Maybe we had an off day. Hope you will try us again soon!!

name: matthew trager
text: Phenomenal food in a buzzy dining room coupled with top service run by an engaged and passionate owner. Really a gem in Charlotte. We are looking forward to the next visit. It's unusual for a restaurant to meet the expectations of its opening an buzz, but this place did it.

text:
A picture is worth a thousand words. 😂 I actually am not too mad that they forgot to put cheese on half of the pizza because I didn’t want much anyway. And it’s still pretty good. But check your pizzas before you drive off, people! Lol

I’m dropping this review down to a 1-star because I was notified by Pizza Hut to email them so they could “make this right.” I emailed them and haven’t received a response. I’ll never return to this location. I’ll make sure to suggest any other pizza place in Charlotte when asked for a suggestion.

resp.text: Please send your name, email, and phone number to wecare@adtpizza.com. We'd like to make this right.

name: Houston Millsap
text:
I've never had a good experience here. I've ordered delivery maybe 5 to 8 times. Every single time the order is late by a huge amount, I'm talking like 30 minutes to an hour, one time it was even 2 hours late. Every time but one the order was wrong, and every single time it was not hot when it arrived.

The nail in the coffin though was that a few times when I've called about a wrong order or an order that was so late I thought it was missing, they hang up on me. The following happened every time I called: they pick up, I tell them what the problem was very politely, then they just hang up. Then ever time I redial, they pick up the phone and hang it up. I can even hear store sounds when they do it, they're actually picking up the phone and hanging it back up every time. It's unreal. I have no idea how this place is still in business. 2.6 average rating on google is generous.

resp.text: We're sorry about this incident. We'd like to hear more about this and make this right. Please send your name, email, and phone number to wecare@adtpizza.com.

name: Alex Mitchell
text: I would give this location zero stars if I could. Gave them multiple chances to do better, when you make an order for delivery they're late, you can't find out the status of your order. I'm writing this review while I'm on hold for someone and I've been on hold for 15+ minutes so far. I'm never ordering from here again.

name: Adira Kirkland
text: Decent pizza but the delivery driver doesn't wear a mask. He delivered a pizza to my house a couple weeks ago, wasn't wearing a mask. We pulled up today and he still isn't wearing one.

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out to us. We'd like to hear more about this. Please send your name, email, and phone number to wecare@adtpizzahut.com.

name: Bailey Ramirez
text: I recently moved near this location and haven't had much trouble with other locations in the past. I have ordered from this one twice and they messed up my orders both times. The first time, I ordered a pan pizza and received hand tossed. The second time, I ordered a buffalo chicken pizza and they gave me one with no sauce! I will not be ordering from Pizza Hut for as long as I live here.

name: adam pyle
text: They won't deliver uptown for some reason.

name: syreeta wilson
text: No delivery but was a option online and I'm waiting for my food. I call them and I'm told there is No driver so.. shut down online and call the people who ordeded it's just ridiculous! Common sense and I expect my refund! Thanks!

name: Aszure Evans
text: Really enjoy the pizza from here the mgr is so nice and pleasant the store is very clean and the food is always correct

name: Katie Chapman
text: I ordered my pizza online and then called the store to add cheesy bread. I had to call twice because on the first call at 6:23 PM EDT the store picked up the call but did not answer or even say "Hello Pizza Hut" they just put the phone to the side so I could hear everyone talking. After 2 mins of saying "hello, hello" they hung up on me. I called the second time at 6:26 PM EDT and this time I was able to talk to someone but they were EXTREMELY rude. They did not say their name and they hung up on me prematurely. I would recommend listening to both calls to help improve customer service. Once I got to the store to pick up my pizza the employee was on his personal cell phone on a call. He did not acknowledge that a customer had just walked into the store. He seemed a little annoyed that he had to actually work. When he turned around to see if my pizza was ready I could clearly see his underwear. My pizza was suppose to be ready at 6:40pm but it was not ready until 7pm.

name: Tracie Cruell
text: I ordered a pepperoni pizza at 11:05. Its 2:00 right now and I still dont have a delivery. I wonder how cold it will be.

name: Cristy Spencer
text: Ordered delivery.  $10 box came about an hour later (not bad it was a busy lunch hour) and was only about half covered with cheese!  And it was cold!  Terrible lunch!

name: Bryan Hill
text: Staff is just always blunt and never friendly. Wait times are off when ordering online. Just feel this could be improved on greatly

name: Vimal V
text: The waiter was kind enough to smile at me. That was the only positive. The pizza was a half baked pizza, the WORST I have ever eaten! Pizza Hut should see these reviews and close the store!! It will be some months before I even try to taste at another Pizza Hut location!

name: Scott Reinstein
text: Pizza Hut still the best pizza you can buy bar none! Staff at this Pizza Hut are friendly and helpful! Pizza at this Pizza Hut is quite good and the service is pretty fast!

text: Average pizza - even after putting in request to make the pizza well done, they do not bake it enough. Always have to wait more time that the expected time to get the pizza ready.

text: We had a big order they came on time and the food was so good. The delivery man was pleasant and happy. Thank you !

name: Aiko Crutchfield
text: I came by for the lunch buffet. Everything was well stocked and the staff was definitely helpful with everything I asked for. Very accommodating with the kids too.

name: Maria Moraru
text: Worst pizza I’ve had in a very long time. There was no sauce on the pizza. The cheese was completely burned. And it had no flavor. Because the wait time on the app and online did not reflect actual delivery times they called me told me to come pick my pizza up. When I got there the guy that was packaging the pizza let it sit at the end of the heating rack for a bit because he’s playing with his phone and putting on music.

text: Dirty counters, doors, windows and floors. Unfriendly cashier. Needs a MAJOR cleaning. First walk in speaks volumes for service and quality of food.

text: Ordered 11:20 delivery man showed up 2pm. I called three times and was told three different stories. 1st - its on the way 12:20 time. 2nd time shorthanded and the manager will deliver. 3rd time there is no order and no one able to deliver if even I had ordered.

name: Aaisha Brown
text: Ilove the food here. Close by home. I order, pick up and catch bus and continue my way home..

name: Jason Mansfield
text:
Update:
Decided to try them again a few years later, and things have somewhat improved, so I'm upping my score from 1 star to 3. Staff is still hit or miss, and pizza is still sometimes late, but it's now a decidedly "meh" experience rather than an awful one.

Original review:
Avoid.

I have never once had my food ready on time for in store pickup.

Most of the time, it hasn't even been started yet even 15 minutes past the pickup time. This last time, they just lost it, yelling across the store to one another, finally finding it just laying on the counter cold, and then just giving it to me without even attempting to reheat it.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback, we'll pass this along to our team.

name: Robert Mc
text: The food is always good but the service sucks they stop delivering I don't know when they're going to start back delivering so don't call to get delivery cuz it's going to take 2 hours

name: Joel Martin
text: Worst experience of my pizza ordering life.  Ordered a large thin crust pizza last week and the crust was completely ruined and falling apart in 2 different layers, tasted like dough.  Got a credit which I used tonight and was quoted 55 minutes.  2.5 hours later and 2 phone calls and I'm still waiting..  That's 2 ruined dinners.  2/2   How does this store survive?

name: Kousuke Kanzaki
text:
Order type: Delivery
Time Placed: 9:35pm - July 17th, 2019 (Wednesday)
Estimated Delivery Time: 23-33 mins (screenshot attached).
Time set "On the way" on website: 19 mins after order.

Given the estimated time, it should be delivered at slightly after 10 at the latest.

An hour later (10:35pm), I called the store to get a status update. Over 40 mins after it was set to "On the way." The manager said that the estimated time was an hour and some change. Customers can see estimated times. I would completely understand if the store is somehow busy during dead hours on a Wednesday night(?), but lying is never cool. I updated by review from 4 to 1 star because of this.

Order finally delivered at 10:50pm.

name: JD AGUILAR
text: I'd order 20 minutes ago and still nobody is fixing my order they told me to wait other 20 minutes before someone is coming. The lady at front desk is just answering the phone nothing else.

How can i report this.. I have videos

Tonight we ordered from them and got pizza and wings and when we received the wings it was like dried up day old chicken tenders in the box with no sauce! worst Wings ever and more than that it ruined my dinner for my children definitely will not be going back there 😡 I guess by now we should learn a lesson and go with some other pizza place

text: I ordered online and it stated that it would be ready at 1015..got there at 1020. The 2 employees were joking with a customer at the counter for a good while until one aske what I needed. The third employee came from back and told the one searching that pizza had just come out of oven. Another problem is the man who was cooking rang it up and took the money. This place is chaos at the highest. Only good thing I can say is pizza was fresh

text: Awful customer service. Asked for a large pizza, got a $14 or so price. When I asked about the 7.99 deal, Belinda said to me, "Well you ain't say no 7 99." Pretty funny, but extremely rude. Also, pizza did not have chicken, it had beef. Overall, don't eat here.

text: Great customer service but the pizza was very doughy. Upon arrival (after ordering online) there seemed to be only one girl working. I realize this may save them money on labor, but it’s piss-poor service to have people piled up in line behind me waiting for her to finish making and cutting up pizzas. There should be more than one person on the clock at 12:30...

name: Bill Bryan - personal
text: I ordered my pizza online and requested it be available at 6pm. No where online was there any indication the store was closed. When I arrived at 5:55pm, myself and other customers found the doors locked and no one available. After a few moments an employee did show but she was just as confused as to whether the store was open or closed. She contacted the owner who stated it was closed. Neither I nor the 3 other customers received our orders and had to find other dinner options. This store is chronically having issues and this franchisee should not be allowed to have a franchise if he/she cannot manage it better. As long as this store stays under the current management I will not be purchasing pizza hut products. I hope my money is refunded for the Pizza I never received but only time will tell! Horrendous experience!!!

name: k2 kossivi
text: I was looking for African food the first time I went to Charlotte, NC and this place came up.  I went with my siblings and they were closing but the were kind enough to serve us and allowed us to eat there. A very friendly people and the food was great.  Thank you. We will be back again.

name: Sammy
text: So so good. The portion size is enough for 2 people. My favorite is the egusi soup with fufu and the puff puffs are so delightful.

text: It is nice to have place that introduces some of the very best West African 👌 cusines. I love the Egusi with Panda Yam.... ETC

name: I queen
text: Just finished meal at Samoha with co-worker and it was an awesome experience! Staff was really friendly, restaurant was clean, music was nice and can't to come back next week to share this experience with my other co-workers.

text:
It was me and my family first time eat This type of food. It was super good. Will go here again

Thanks for the experience.
Blessings

name: Adaeze Obi
text: This place is horrible too much palm oil in egusi soup. It’s always different staff working in there that Is so confused on what to do they mess my order up big Time I tried to give this place another chance but I see what the problem is never going  back. Let me not forget to mention how ghetto they are. They hire anybody to fix your food. Don’t go at night it’s a zoo. I expected real African food definitely loss a valuable customer

name: Iris
text:
A bit of a long trip out of town and after eating all kinds of things, I was craving nigerian food. Found this place through Google. It was way out but I had to go check it out.
The interior is nicely done, very clean and welcoming. The food is precooked and displayed in a hot bar. The guy serving was not Nigerian but knew the food quite well.
I got 3 Entrées - jollof rice with beef stew and plantains, white rice with fish stew and plantains, and pounded yam with Efo riro. The portions were pretty generous. The taste was good, although I would have liked some heat (pepper). The best of the three was the Efo riro.
The restaurant is located in a row of stores which look somewhat rundown, but the place itself is nice.

name: Edna Hayes
text: Lord thank you. The best african cuisine. I'm in love with the Egusi soup stewed beef and pounded yam. Mmmmmmmhnnn need more stars. Perfection is the taste.

name: Oluseye Gbemiro
text: Courteous staff,  freshly prepared meals. This is one spot you gotta check out if you are craving popular Nigerian grub. Am here almost every day for real pounded yam, Egusi soup and also Goat meat pepper soup. Oh, meat pies are also scrumptious.

name: Val Boston III
text: First visit. Very pleased.

name: Shabazz H
text: Food is soooooo good, I came here with my lady, we are in love with the food! We went 2 days in a row and ordered the exact same thing! Literally no difference! It was just as good and  as the day before, we couldn't stop licking our fingers! We appreciate good food to the maximum capacity and now she wants it for every birthday party 😂

name: Bailey Coggins
text: Amazing food with wonderful hospitality! Thank you!

name: jean rudy eko ndong
text:
This Homemade Juice and the Okra soup such a wonderful combination.  Well done folks. Thanks for the beautiful welcoming.
!GABON REPRESENTED🇬🇦!

Keep well regards

Jean Rudy

name: Maria Ortega
text: First time eating here and I was impressed with the spinach soup was very good and seasoned to perfection. I also had the fufu with egusi and also was better than fufu from other places...5 star rating in my book.

name: Kay
text: Some of the worse food I’ve ever had. The food isn’t made fresh & sits in metal containers all day. The chicken was dry, whatever soup I had tasted like fish and spinach, and the plantains were very dry. Waste of money.

name: Nae N
text: Chicken was overcooked and dried out. Egusi soup was full of oil and no flavor. I’m not sure what happened! First time but unfortunately the last.

name: Samantha Fox
text: The worst place in Charlotte, Nc they are not authentic at all their food is old and nasty, not Nigerian,African cuisine, it's fake and made my daughter and my grandchildren, and myself sick vomiting every where.

resp.text: Dear Samantha! We are extremely sorry and saddened by your experience with our food. We cook authentic Nigerian dishes, and our food is made fresh and displayed in an approved setting to provide a quicker service to our customers. We would like to learn more about your experience, and to know what you particularly had from our restaurant that might have lead to this experience. We have looked through our records and did not find any evidence of you coming to our store, please kindly call our restaurant’s mobile line at (980) 315-3468 and ask to speak to the Manager.

name: jamie davis
text: First time trying Nigerian food! It was delicious! Fufu, jellof, goat, beef, stewed hen!

name: Hannah Steer
text: The driest chicken, ever!! The egusi was well prepared and seasoned.

name: Kimeo Little
text: Delicious! Wish they wouldn’t have run out of cassava, I did visit towards the end of business hours though.

name: juts ponciano
text:
Awesome egusi! They have goat option too! The owner is very lovely; amazing service. The place is clean. I’ll definitely be back to try more.

Update: Second time here. The goat meat was very tough as in I couldn’t get it off the bone. Also, I was served three pieces of bony parts. Service was amazing! Wait time, not very. Hence, I took a star off.

name: Sol Hernandez
text: Service was great! The girl who too our orden was avery helpful un explaining some  of the menú choices. Even the owner camera out to see how everything was for us. The fried fisher was delicious  and so wire the plantains but I was a little disappointed with the rice. The pot must have overheated because the rice tasted burned.

name: Aleta Russell
text: Order food on DoorDash for pickup, wait 15 extra minutes past the time it specified done. Paid $20 for six pieces of plantains, fufu and oha soup. The meat in the soup was super dry and the soup was bland. Portion sizes with subpar for the price. Super disappointed Will not go there again.

name: Ywh Krgb
text: The cassava leaf tasted burnt plus it didn't have salt or pepper in it. The plantain was good though

name: Racquel Mcneil
text: Delicious. Friendly. Clean and quick service

name: Katrina B.
text: Food was really, really good and customer service very professional. I would come to eat again when I am in town.

name: Tahira
text: I ordered from this place twice! Delivery wait time was long but the food was fresh and warm when delivered. Today I did a walk in and was impressed with how clean and decorative the restaurant was, not to mention the great customer service. I do wish that the portions of food and the amount of meat was more! Overall I will definitely recommend Samoha to love ones!

name: Siennia Coleman
text: The sauce on the stewed beef was very flavorful! Next time I will go earlier to get it fresher.

P

text: I'm sooo glad i found this place! Authentic Nigerian food. I live on the complete opposite side of town and driving here is worth it. Even in these weird times with the virus they manage to still have a wide selection of dishes to choose from and readily available, and the flavors are soo good. Thanks guys!

text: So good and delicious. Won't be the last time coming

name: Tunde Soremekun
text: Good food and service, i had the jollof and 🐐 meat.

name: Monica Randell
text: I hate to give them such a low rating because I bet it's usually delicious but I think the jollof rice burned and the tried to save what they could. The burnt smell of my food was overwhelming, but the underlying flavor was so good that I ate it anyway. I want to try it again and hope it isn't burnt next time.

resp.text: Thank you, Monica, for your review. The authentic Nigerian jollof rice comes very smoky, if you are not used to the smokiness, you would think it is burned. As you noted in your review, the rice tasted really good that you ate it all, burnt and good taste don't go together. Please come back to patronize us and ensure to emphasize that you do not want the smokey jollof rice. We also provide free taste for all our food, that way, you are comfortable with the taste before purchase. We look forward to seeing you again.

name: David Ogedegbe
text: Tasty fried rice. Enjoyed it

name: Stephanie Sullivan
text: Food was outstanding and the prices were ridiculously high.  The only reason I would not return is due to the prices. The food was very very good. They put their foot in it! (Which means, for those who do not know, it was shockingly good food)

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie for your great review. We definitely want you to come back and enjoy our great and delicious food. Please ask for the manager the next time you come. There are many ways we can make it affordable to you.

name: Anastasia Prapas
text: I called in an order and a very cheerful person named Chi answered the phone and stepping me through all my vegetarian questions. In person the restaurant was spotless and the lady at the front register was very friendly. Their Corona protocol made me feel at ease ordering food. The Tofu and Broccoli was delicious and my husband loved his Chicken Lo Men. I highly recommend it here.

name: David Winters
text: A little gem hidden in Dilworth.  This is our go-to place for an easy relaxing dinner.   The atmosphere as well as the very gracious owner is completely non-pretentious and very friendly. The food is always consistent and moderately priced.   Also a standard takeout place for us as well!

name: Donell Lyons
text: Wow a miracle place to eat great quality food, if you want some of the best tasting food, trust me this is the place family or a special date, if you have read my reviews in the past , this place gets 10 . The best place ,clean and friendly.....

name: Jeff Snow
text: Great food and customer experience. General Tso has some nice heat to it and lo mein is generous with the meat and vegetables!!
