text: really good just a little pricey

name: Kris Wheeler
text: Truly nice Asian fusion restaurant. Always good, clean, staff Always friendly and welcoming. On the top of my list for Chinese restaurants.

name: Justine V
text: Can’t go wrong with any of the noodle dishes! I love the Lo mein and the chow mein with pork/chicken

name: John Siebert
text: I went in for Lunch. The food was hot, fresh and tasty. It's quiet inside, an intimate little space. The servers were all smiles and very polite. The food came in a very reasonable time, even with a steady stream of take out and online orders going out all the time. Overall it was a very pleasant experience.

name: James Wheeler
text: Persuasion is great. Have ordered take  out a lot. The  chicken and broccoli  and vegetables  is great. Chi and his staff are most pleasant!!

name: Elizabeth Sutton
text: Delicious!  Our first time trying this place. Comfortable, pleasant decor and quick service.  The staff was great.  Definitely a place to come back to.

name: Kyle Winters
text: We've become regulars. The food and service is always consistent and they know us by name. Cozy laid back restaurant.

name: Haley Dugger
text: Ordered delivery from postmates. Had the egg roll, white rice, and sesame chicken with broccoli. Large portions of chicken, very little broccoli. The dish was very “meh” with almost no flavor at all. Chicken did not taste fresh.

name: Mudit Mehta
text: Beautiful place to hangout with friends and enjoy delicious food...!!!! Real good ambience and the owner is such a gentleman. In the nutshell “Great Place to be”

name: Carol Rego
text: Ordered chicken pho to go from Uber Eats. Got here quickly and was delicious. Lots of fresh toppings.

name: Ryan Ostrow
text: Our go-to for Chinese. Value and consistent quality.

name: Omar Smith
text: The food was good, I absolutely loved the way you get to select your input such as your rice, your sauce  and obviously the meats that you want in your fried rice.  When I dined there for lunch, there were some in my party who had to go to another table as they refused to join the tables so that 9 of us could sit together. We spent an hour there and while my table was served after 30 minutes, they had to take theirs go-to. As good tasting as the food was, it was not hot when it came out. Honestly, the food is Good, but the service was deplorable

name: kelly jeffries
text: Chi is a great host. Staff is very knowledgeable about menu. Accurate wait times for carry out. Very fresh food.

name: Erick Thomas
text: Very nice. Good atmosphere and good service.  Some of the best hot and sour soup in town and I have tried at least 20 different versions in the area.  The bar must be decent as it appeared to have a couple regulars.  Also looked like good wine/beer selection.  Recommend for intimate date night or a quiet but fun hang out.

name: JON DRIGGERS
text: Chi is awesome! The food is always impeccable and the service is great! The fried pork dumplings are a favorite and the pho is delicious! It's a great place to grab dinner and a cocktail after work.

name: Frank George
text: Lots of options to choose from. Friendly staff. The food was excellent and I had leftovers to take home. I had the Lo mein noodles with broccoli, shrimp and chicken. It was delicious! Next time I plan to try the orange chicken and broccoli. The ambiance is relaxing and it's good for families, friends and a perfect place to bring a date.

text:
Friendly staff, but pretty bland food.  The dumplings were so so at best.  The orange and spicy general chicken were exactly the same dish, and that’s not a good dish.  The chicken crust was mushy and the flavor was pretty boring.

Probably gonna stick with Charlotte’s other options

name: Mania Rosen
text: Great food!  Fantastic staff!  The atmosphere of this restaurant is a perfect hybrid of "fine-dining" and "local comfort".  The menu options included various asian cuisine influences which can be ordered in their original taste or blended to create a fusion of flavor.  The wait staff is prompt and energetic and the owner makes it a point to check in with every customer.  This is a perfect destination for families looking to find and chat or friends looking to have drinks and relax.  The desert menu also had a little something for everyone...  If you haven't tried Persu-asian... Do it!

name: Sean David Holleran

name: Melissa Summitt

name: Rachel C Kelly
text: We ordered food from here last night because of the good reviews. It was some of the worst Chinese food ive had. We ordered orange chicken and beef lo mein. Both were over cooked and bland. Terrible. I'm just glad it didn't hurt my stomach.

Also harly any sauce inside.  Does not live up to the name they have for tamales. Tamaleria Laurita.... HMMMM. DONT  spend your money on the tamales in this place.

name: John MacQueen
text: I have lived in Charlotte for over 15 years. I have tried many restaurants. The pork tamales I just had were amazing--the kind where every bite gets better. I am excited to come back and take my friends! Thank you! Well done. (And they sing!) 🙂

text: This place is my favorite spot for authentic Latin cuisine after getting burned out on several others in the “little latina” corridor on South Blvd (L’Empira, Taqueria Mexico, etc).  The enchiladas are my fave however the pork used in the tamales looks and tastes like it came out of a can ☹️

name: Karina Larrea
text: My brother found a long metal rod in our pork tamales!!! He chipped his tooth in the process but thankfully he didn't swallow it!! Imagine the damage that could of done to him! I was so concerned and embarrassed because I had given him this to eat! We will be calling the restaurant first thing tomorrow please inspect your food before eating!

text: Outstanding tamales! The best I've ever had. The rest of the menu is good, but the tamales are where it's at.

text: I was in the mood for Mexican so I searched up “Mexican food near me” this place came up & I was really excited to try this place because of the good ratings.. BUT there was a BUG in my food!!!!! I had noticed AFTER I already ate it and all that was left was rice. 😷 Will not be returning I’m still sick to my stomach at the thought of it, & it’s been a week.

name: Queen Rosa
text: If you're looking for some real real mexican authentic food, this is the place to go! I had tried the menudo, tamales, and tacos.... they are to die for. Mmmm yummy. They also have Horchata there and sell a large cup for $3 which is a good deal especially if it's your favorite beverage to drink. I highly recommend this place if you're searching for the real tastes of Mexico.

text: Beat Detroit pizza? I agree... although haven't been to Detroit yet. The deep dish pizza is delicious with its fresh mozzarella and crispy pepperoni. The 8 corner deep dish is our new favorite.

name: Steven G
text:
These guys are artists. Never in my life, have I been to a dining establishment who could so masterfully design a symphony of flavors, smells, and textures that not only tease the senses but also satisfy even the most ravenous of hungers. The 8 corner pizza can only be described as two bread pillows in a cheesy pillow case thats soft enough to give you support but also allow an easy bite with a satisfying crunch.

Their delivery sometimes shows up early 🤯

name: vaishali Babu
text: One of the best pizza in the world.. must try buffalo ranch chicken pizza.

text: 8 corner pizza is amazing. I caused my own issue with a payment receipt which Larry and Rodney quickly resolved. Their pizza is amazing and their customer service is on par. I really appreciate it guys!

text: I live in concord and I drive to this location just for the jets bread. It’s so cheesy and amazing. The one on mallard Creek is not even close to being this good. Doesn’t even taste like it’s the same thing. I definitely recommend. It’s highly addictive, I go at least twice a week. I wish they had more coupons like Toppers because I’d probably go everyday

text: I gave this place another try after having terrible delivery service. Once I picked up and once I ordered delivery. We live a lot closer to this location so I think that helped ensure the pizza reaches us hot this time within 30 minutes! Pizza was delicious and I love the well done turbo crust. This is my favorite pizza by far.

text: Great food, great place this location especially, shout out to the manager Johnny nice guy and friendly

text: Great good, but twice in a row, I was not given items that I paid for and then told to pay again for those items. The second time, I was eventually given the item for free, but only after being offered a lesser item instead.  The online ordering gives a total which matches their in-store total, but they still claim you didn't pay enough for the missing items.  Great food, but will only visit another location in the future.

name: Alisse Grady
text:
This location consistantly closes before the posted closing time. What pizza shop closes at 11pm on a Saturday anyway? Its located on a street full of bars. Seems a little stupid.
On one occasion they canceled our delivery order because .. who knows? Guess they didnt feel like delivering near to closing time.  And tonight they had the doors locked and sign off 15 minutes before close.
Lazy much??

text: Fast delivery, great taste, great price. They need to bring menus with the deliveries tho. The food is great!

#detroitstylepizza#
deliciouspizza

name: Michael Williams
text: I think the bad reviews are "fake news" or just unreasonable unhappy people. The pizza is top tier and people working there are courteous and attentive to details in my experiences. I have gotten so sick of the typical big chains and their lousy food. Jets is delicious and I can enjoy pizza again!

name: Carson Dahlberg
text: Deep diiiiiish delish

name: Tyler Borden
text:
**this location is now permanently closed

Honestly my favorite greasy pizza in Charlotte. The deep dish is just amazing. Had a weird experience though where i tried to use a coupon, but it expired at 6pm??? I’ve never heard of a coupon being valid for only 6 hours (part of 1 day)?  I was told that I was 45 mins too late to use the coupon. No apology or explanation... just short and kind of stand-off-ish.... i get treated better at the dominos so will probably just go there now.  This honestly makes me sad because I’m on their team here! I want them to succeed!!!

Hey, Jets Management. Maybe take a look at your customer service at this store. It looks like I’m not alone with my bad experience. Best of luck guys. I really hope you can get it together cause you got the best greasy za in town!

name: Martin Pruitt
text: If I could give Jets on Montford a million stars I probably would! This place is delicious and fast! Go for an eight corner pepperoni with turbo crust!!!!

name: Darryl Frost
text: Before I was vegan this was the spot!/Really cheesy pizza with delicious crunchy crust. If you make some vegan options I'll be back.

name: Don Johnson
text:
Initially hesitant due to scathing reviews on Google with a common theme of poor service, I decided to give Jet's a try anyway.  My Jet's experience was the exact oopposite of what I had read: the service I received was GREAT!  Maybe they took heed to past feedback. All I know is the person answering my call was pleasant, professional & efficient. My order arrived in 30-40 mins, far less time than I was quoted (pleasant surprise! ).  The delivery person was pleasant,  had change & the pizza was fresh,  hot.
More on the pizza itself: THE BEST I've had here in Charlotte,  hands down... Better by far than Toppers,  Papa Johns,  Dominoes. In fairness, I haven't had Pizza Hut since arriving here, but it is at least AS good as any PH pizza I have had in my life in other cities... The flavor & consistency of the crust, sauce gives Jets an overall edge, even over PH. The PRICE (value) is definitely better than anyone else around serving decent pizza.  Also, they have good specials. I've been trying to find the "IT" pizza spot in Charlotte &  had grown frustrated, weary in that effort.  However, delayed is not denied... I found it today.  Unless this was an exceptional experience, which I hope is not the case, Jet's Pizza is definitely the winner. Without question, I will go back again & again! It's so refreshing to give a review of an exceptional experience instead of protesting sub-standard, unsatisfactory service!  I am smiling right now.

name: David McCann
text: Jet's deep dish is my favorite pizza in Charlotte. The crispy, cheesy crust is totally addictive.

text: Great customer service.  Delicious smoothies!  Five dollar Friday, AWESOME!!!

name: Anatol Schweizer
text: Service is great,  and smoothies are also really good. Just don't understand why the price of my smoothies gone up in the past 2 weeks.

text: Got to love $5 Fridays! Menu changed recently so my favorite was gone.

name: George Truesdale
text: Frist time visiting, service provider was nice ,helpful , friendly and the smoothie was great.

name: Carlton Gunter Watkins III
text: At one point I was averaging $60-$90 a week on smoothies, I must say that Power Punch Plus w/whole blueberries & raspberries it then becomes The Best Friday Bang for your buck since the added fruit usually makes enough smoothie to turn a medium into a large once blended. So just remember to oversee the end pour, then you'll get the best bang for your buck. Not to mention that I'm under $50 a week over there, while still adding my whole berries to each smoothie .

name: Roslyn Macon
text: Alex, Courtney and Rachel are wonderful at knowing what I want as well as the other frequent visitors (by name/drink choice)!! Sometimes they need a little support in the mornings when people (like me) are trying to get their smoothies before work. However, I've never been late due to my wait.

name: Robert Dearman
text: Any place that has been around for 88 years under the same name must be doing something right, and they are: great food, great beer and wine selection, cozy atmosphere, and hands down the best bartender in Charlotte. What more could anyone want?

name: JJ Souther
text: Social distancing! Great wait staff. Good food and solid drinks.  Who can ask for anything better?  The "garage doors were open to allow fresh air too.  I ordered the fish tacos and they were really good.  I'd order them again. Loved the tater tots too!

name: Edward Taylor
text: First time here and decided to try a Guinness for the first time. Cheeseburger was huge. I was expecting a single and got a double. Very good, juicy burger. Side of mac & cheese was amongst the best I've ever had. Nice ambiance and seemed to be doing well for early Saturday evening. Waitress was good with only one minor snafu. I would defonately go here again and I highly recommend Providence Rd. Sundries.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We hope you come back to see us!

name: Hi
text: Food is good. However, i would HIGHLY suggest NOT to order take out. I ordered mac n cheese and wasnt given a fork. When I had to turn around and go back inside to get one, I was told there was a shortage and that's why they were not giving out flatware. Which is ridiculous, if you pay for something to eat with a fork, how are you supposed to eat it without a fork?? I want told prior to ordering- def lack of communication!! Regret leaving a tip.

name: John Ackerman
text: Local Providence Rd Eatery.  Decor is Rustic.  Great lunch and Carry Out menu.  Sandwiches and plates our specialties.  Staff is somewhat old school.  Prices competitive.  Parking and on/off Prob. Rd. a challenge.  jca

name: T R
text: First visit....found it to be a really nice place, tucked away on  Providence Road. Menu offered lots of different items and sides. Looks like there were so other specials offered too. I had the Ruben and fried okra. Sandwich was delicious and the okra fried to perfection. Both were served in a good portion, and freshly prepared. Overall a great lunch stop. I did see some taps, so I assume beer is available as well. Definitely well worth a drop by....

name: Tony Battaglia
text: Bar first.  Food second.  Had the sloppy hot chicken on toast with fried okra.  Bar food. Nothing more nothing less.  Decent beer selection.   Very nice staff.

name: Jason Barnett
text: Great food and service.

name: Alan Baker
text: Service is excellent and food is delicious.  Hometown atmosphere.

name: Aaron Bock
text: This place is underrated in my opinion.  Only thing that is tough is the parking but we have never had any issues.  The food is delicious.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and five star review! We hope to see you again soon at Sundries.

name: Jon Canupp
text: Wonderful neighborhood restaurant and bar.  The appetizers and food were delicious!  Love the pretzels with mustard and the warm pimento cheese dip.  One of my favorite places when coming in from out of town!

resp.text: Thank you! Come back to see us at Sundries.

name: Nicole Bullinger
text: We just went there for the first time and weren't at all disappointed! If you have anyone in your group with a gluten allergy I highly recommend ordering their wings. They have a dedicated fryer! Everyone was very friendly and they even made a special drink for our kids. This will definitely be a regular spot for us.

resp.text: Thank you for coming to see us and for your very nice review! Please come back soon and bring the kids!

name: Ellen Harvey
text: Katie was efficient and friendly. The southwestern avacado chicken salad and dressing was very good. Chicken not overcooked. Would have liked more like 1/2 avacado sliced instead of 1/4 but was still a very nice salad.

name: Will Proctor
text: Love this place. Great place to go for a beer or to get a meal. The homemade pork rinds are fantastic!

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Drew
text: It's a Charlotte treasure. Located on Providence road for a long as I can remember. They serve fantastic food and have a full bar that are both very reasonably priced - especially given the area they are in. There are booths and other seating available but we prefer the bar where service is fast and friendly. Menu is diverse for bar fare and all the items I've ordered have been great. Definitely a place to check out.

resp.text: Thank you!! Come back to see us soon at Sundries.

name: Philip Norvell
text: I love this bar. It's low key, family friendly, and a great atmosphere. I frequently drop in on the way home from work, grab a beer and get take out food. The food is top notch as well.

resp.text: Thank you for the five stars! Hope to see you again soon at Sundries.

resp.text: Thank you! Come back to see us.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Come back to see us.

text: You get what you pay for usually applies to most things. But not here. It seemed way overpriced for what it was. Decent atmosphere though and decent service.

text: First time eating here in over 20 years.  Had the fried fish with fries.  The fries were amazing.  Love the seasoning.

resp.text: We hope you come back to see us soon, please don’t wait another 20 years! Thank you for the very nice review.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words! Come back to see us.

I have been going to the Sundries for the past 25years,  it's a great restaurant,  food and salads are very good. They have a very nice bar
And the employees are very helpful with food selections and are very nice. Katie Brett

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Sundries and for the very nice review. We hope you will come back to see us.

text: Holly took my to go order and it was ready. This seems small but time is money when your doing grubhub. Thank you.

resp.text: Thank you!

text: Never had a bad experience in all the years I've been going. Fantastic food, friendly staff. Good for watching games and for families!

resp.text: What nice words about our restaurant. Thank you. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Murphy Carpenter
text: Absolutely THE best place in Charlotte for great lunch, casual dinner. Lots of history! A neighborhood favorite! Consistently good food and great bartender Alyson! She's the best!

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: David Gammage
text: Great neighborhood bar and grill. Service is always great, especially when you become a regular. Great wings, just ask them to fry them a little longer and they will be crispy like a true buffalo wing should be. I've enjoyed everything I've had on the menu. Kid friendly as well.

name: monty ridenhour
text: Great neighborhood spot. Food is good. Service is great. Location sucks. Parking is horrible and leaving onto Providence Road is more than entertaining.

name: Susan Weisbrich
text: Food was great.  Very noisy on the side that has the video machines due to lots of small children running around.  Bar side is much better.

name: Bryan Manges
text: Good neighborhood bar. The food got a lot better over the past couple of years. On a nice day, they open the doors on the front of the building which is cool. The right side of the restaurant fills up with young families on some weeknights. Great if you have little kids, but sit on the bar side if you don't.

name: Jack Allen
text: One of our favorite neighbor hood spots. Large, diverse menu with something for everyone. With a great atmosphere to watch a sports game, the restaurant has plenty of TV's. Seating availability can be limited at lunchtime on Saturdays and Sundays so be prepared.

resp.text:
What a wonderful review. Thank you!
Come back to see us.

name: Sky Broome
text: Providence Road Sundries (or just Sundries to locals) has been a local landmark for decades. Laid back environment with burgers, sandwiches and salads as well as a nice sized bar. A great place for a casual meal or a meeting place to catch up with friends!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review! We hope to see you again at Sundries.

name: Patrick Fox
text: Great location and lots of history.  The food is good, and the bar lively at times.  The only drawback I had was we sat at the bar and the bar doors were open and it was very chilly sitting at that spot.  Good service but the bartender (gentleman) could be a bit friendlier.

name: Heath Bartley
text: Hmmmmmm. Since 1933, this place seems to be either resting on their laurels, or somehow have a Bobby Bonilla like contract that they're still paying on. The food is decent. Not great, decent. The prices, astronomical for the quality, and quantity. I can think of several other places in the area that you can get more bang for you buck. My suggestion, meet friends here for a drink and decide where to head for the evening. There is ample parking 'round back, but come on guys, too much competition here these days...

name: John Clay
text: One of my favorites for over 20 years...

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 stars! Hope to see you again soon!

name: Jarvis Miller
text: Great place in a nice neighborhood. It's full of regulars and the bartenders and wait staff are awesome! Very sports oriented -they work hard to get whatever you want to see -even Grand Slam tennis! Prices are great, and it's a cool place to visit if you've never been. Personally, I'm  wanderer turned regular :D

name: Lara Mitchell
text: Food was ok. Wait staff was slow and only as friendly as necessary

name: Monalisa NotDaVinci
text: Came in and Forest welcomed us with a smile and hello. He let us know the specials and gave great recommendations.  I have been coming here for over 40 years and always great food and service. Keep up the continued great work.

name: Tim Carpenter
text: Nice laid back neighborhood pub. Allyson   is terrific! Try the hot dog. Be sure to ask for a toasted bun. Yum!

resp.text: Thank you for the review!

name: Margaret Black
text:
Great neighborhood bar and one time soda shop.  Sit at the bar, in original wooden booths or at tables in the newer (since the '90s) family section.
Good beer, good food, good atmosphere but busy and curt wait staff.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. I would like to hear more details and correct anything we did wrong. Please call the restaurant at your convenience and ask for the owner. 704-366-4467

text: Great food, with great prices.  Went for lunch on a day that was more crowded then the staff expected.  Still our server was amazing.  She kept her cool and made sure we were served in a timely manner.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We are glad you enjoyed Providence Road Sundries and hope you come back to see us.

resp.text:
Glad you came back to Sundries. Our menu still has the original great burgers but we have added many fresh items. Everything is now made in house.
Come back to see us!

name: TheChefCesar YourCityGuide
text:
UPDATE..
Thank you for your fast reply ..  I will visit again to try other dishes .

Food was good but we asked for nuclear wings gilled and they got the order wrong.send us regular breaded and texas pete is hotter than the "nuclear wings" However no big deal. Service was alright maybe because was busy. I will like to give them 5 stars but for those 2 reasons I didnt love it.

resp.text:
I am sorry your order was wrong. We will do better next time.
Our wing sauces are: Nuclear, Sweet Chili, Garlic Parmesan, Blackened, Jerk, Bar-Ballo, Buffalo and Chipotle Honey. We don’t serve “Atomic Wings” so I am not sure what you ordered.
I hope you will come back to see us. If you do give us another chance, our Nuclear wings are our spiciest Wings, we are always happy to give you extra sauce.
Thank you for the review and letting us know the problems you see. It always helps us improve!

name: Jayson
text: Stopped into the shop for my morning caffeine fix. Staff was friendly and inviting and made short work of an otherwise long line. Coffee was as usual done great i did the day break blend with an extra shot of pick me up. Exactly what I needed to start my day off right! If you are in the neighborhood definitely check this place out; won’t disappoint!

resp.text: Thank you for being our customer, Jayson! We look forward to your next visit!

name: Brandon Kohr
text: Great spot to grab a cup of morning joe. Staff are super friendly and it's usually pretty entertaining to see an interesting trivia question every day. I would say that their pastry selection is a little limited, but other than that, a solid coffee shop.

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know, Brandon. We appreciate you being a Caribou customer! Have a great day!

name: D B
text: First try ordered a breakfast sandwich it tasted old like it had been sitting on shelf for weeks it was cold and the bag that it came in did not have a date on it. Second and last try after standing waiting for 10 min looking crazy I finally got on line to find out about my mobile order and they knew exactly what I ordered and that they didn't have any bubbles for my tea. How was I supposed to know the guy act like I did something wrong by ordering from App. Terrible customer service never going back.

resp.text: Thank you for reaching out to us and we are sorry to hear about your experience. We will be following up with this location to address what happened. If you would like to send us an email at customerrelations@cariboucoffee.com with the location you visited and the details of your experience we would love to help!

name: Jennifer Gherardi
text: This Caribou is filled with the most friendly, welcoming staff, and their coffee is always on point with every visit. Highly recommend the visit!

text: First time visiting Chex Grill, I heard about the restaurant from a friend.  I tried the strawberry wings, not bad but I still prefer the lemon pepper wings.  I will go back to try their sandwiches.

name: Mark
text: I read all of the amazing reviews so was very excited to try this place. But the reviews set me up for a big disappointment. I got the Philly cheese steak because it got such positive reviews and I never had a Philly cheese steak sandwich that tasted nothing like a Philly cheese steak sandwich. My girlfriend got the chicken tenders and after both of us trying them they seem that they came frozen in a bag. I give them two stars because the order was correct which is amazing in this day and age to get a correct order from a restaurant and the service was great.

name: Oscar Carmona
text: First time here with fam. Never seen such a cool place with HUGE play area  where u can clearly see kids. Great s Bruce and the food was ver satisfying and tasty. 👍👍👍

name: Susan Clayton
text: Their wings are so good! And the fries are  great too.....some of the freshest wings in Charlotte. Definately not prepared days before, or frozen. Great place!

name: Yew Kar
text: The chicken wings were cold when I got home, however, the Philly was still hot. I felt like they gave me old set of chicken wings. Besides that everything else was good

name: Dilora Obi
text: Wonderful customer service from Jenny!!!! Thank you so much, I'm  so glad I saw this ad  suggested to me on Facebook! This is a great  restaurant and it is very clean and peaceful!!!! Definitely worth the drive and visit! They even wrap the food up nicely and it's presented well!

name: Davette Mahan
text: I'm so glad this Chex opened closer to me. My boyfriend brought me their strawberry hot wings and I have been in love every since. Now that they are closer I find myself exploring their menu more and I'm enjoying most items. Their burgers are really good burgers. Their boneless wings are so good and you can get them anyway you like. Needless to say I'm enjoying Chex and the service is great, Guss in the front is so friendly and welcoming too. This is a great place for lunch and those tired nights you don't feel like cooking dinner as soon as you get home. 😔 I'm so glad you are closer welcome to the neighborhood 😋😊

name: Anthony Thereal
text:
Hey, I'm something of a wing and spice guru and I love this place. The wings are crispy and meaty, and the sauces are diverse and great. Seen a lot of love for strawberry spice on other reviews and I can agree. But, as a spice guru, I've got to be say that their spiciest sauce, the "challenge sauce" is about a 6/10 on the spice scale. Imagine that Frank's Red Hot is a 2/10. Even so, the challenge sauce has great flavor and I'll definitely be back for more.

I'm really pleased with this place.

Edit 11/24/20: After teasing the owner that his "challenge wings" are weaksauce, I returned and he made them himself. Though I still didn't have to touch my water while eating the wings, they were significantly spicier (about 8/10) and kept a great flavor.

And the owner was a good sport about it.

I really love this place.

Edit 12/12/20: I returned to my favorite local wing joint and was once again presented with the owner's latest batch of "challenge wings." And this batch brought tears to my eyes while remaining delicious. Definitely worthy of their name.

name: Jocelyn Griffith
text: So freaking delicious. The wings, salad and fries were on point!!!

name: Eric B.
text: Awesome wings, awesome frys, awesome burgers. Owner is always super nice and takes care of our crew when we dine there. Definitely recommend the honey hot wings!

text: I wish I could add the picture of my wings! They were so pretty and wet!! I tried the Gold Rush and Lemon Red. Omg!!! So delicious!! Highly recommend.

text: Food was GOOD, SERVICE was GOOD. I take ADVANTAGE of their 2-5 SPECIALS.  IT'S A GREAT DEAL.  THEY DON'T CHARGE FOR WATER WHICH IS NICE BECAUSE THERE ARE PLACES THAT DO. I'm NOT as big a FAN of Arby's ANYMORE. They have stopped having the 2-5 SPECIALS NOW (5/7/21). I'M A SENIOR CITIZEN SO I HAVE LIMITED FUNDS. THEY SHOULD HAVE SPECIALS FOR US. WITH THE OLD SPECIAL I COULD GET A "SNACK" for $3.25 with tax without a drink. NOW IT IS $6.08, ALMOST DOUBLE 😲😞👎.  I CAN PAY A COUPLE DOLLARS MORE AND GET A "REAL MEAL" AT SEVERAL OTHER PLACES.

text:
This place is a really nice spot to hang out and to check out.
It was my first time visiting and def not the last.
Our server Tyler was a nice cool guy and of course a great server. Drinks were good food was good. I do recommend the corn 🌽 oh my god it was sooo delicious also the nachos!!! were amazing!!!! That chicken is well seasoned.
The environment overall was very nice, love the little games, love the decor as well.

name: Erika T
text: El Thrifty never disappoints.  Went for brunch on V-day and the food and service were excellent as always! Food options were perfect for brunch.  Fluffiest waffle and yummy!  That Bloody Mary though....wow!  Another great thing is after you eat, or before, you have some great game choices and a wide open patio area!  With the cold weather it's also a bonus to have  Optimist Hall to walk around at. Adam and his staff are top notch!

name: Brittany Adams
text: So today my friend and I went to this restaurant and were treated horrible. When we arrived we found two chairs at the bar and sat down. The place was not packed at all, yet we were COMPLETELY ignored by the bartender and two gentleman cleaning glasses. It felt almost intentional. Not wanting to be antsy or come off as aggressive, we waited for several minutes as the bartender came and went, doing what appeared to be her absolute best to ignore us. Then, a couple came up to the bar and as soon as she noticed them she went right over and acknowledged them. Now I'm only stating this part because this is what it felt like: My friend and I are African American women and the couple appeared to be Caucasian. Again I am not 100% sure this is why we were ignored when we initially sat down and they were greeted almost instantly upon coming to the bar, but it felt bad. So after waiting several minutes finally my friend says, "Can someone please help us? We've been waiting". So both of the guys cleaning the glasses looks up. One guy said something so ridiculous! He goes, "I saw you guys having a conversation and didn't want to interrupt". Since when does a server or bartender not come check in with you when you arrive at an establishment they're working at? So we basically brushed him off because the comment was so ridiculous and then the other gentleman cleaning (who was possibly a manager) asked us what we wanted to drink and placed our order then eventually came back and placed our food order. No apology for being ignored, no acknowledgement of the behavior from the young lady behind the bar, who by the way continued to ignore us our entire visit. I'm just trying to understand what we did to deserve the treatment we received. Did they assume we weren't going to tip our something? It was madness. Never returning to this establishment again and I will be sure to let everyone I speak to know to do the same. The food is also not that great.

name: Emily Sorokes
text: This is a fun spot for margaritas and Tex mex, attached to Optimist Hall. The food menu has a good variety of things to choose from, and the drinks are all super tasty (like this margarita flight and loaded Bloody Mary!). Cute vibe inside and outside! Sometimes the service outdoors takes a little longer than I would like, but friendly and helpful staff.

name: Michael Afocx
text: Great area and great environment. First time going to optimist hall and this place has two indoor sections one a game type room and another a bar/restaurant. Then theres the outdoor section. They had great music playing that night as well definitely going back now and seeing more of optimist!

text: Such a great atmosphere here. Love the vibes, love the games that's provided and their outdoor setting is so comfortable.

text: Love the atmosphere. Tacos are great, but the drinks are watered down. Overall a good experience.

text: Chips and salsa was great. Really like the red bull tropical and tequila drink they make. Roasted chicken taco's presentation and taste was great.

text: Very nice place to enjoy with friends and play differents game for have fun and drink socially

name: Chris Hoy
text: Pretty expensive for what you get. The inside is average.  The patio is nice.  But I was disappointed paying $16 for three tacos that didn’t have much meat in them. Not going back.

name: Fancy Turner
text: I went twice in 1 week & had 2 different experiences. The first time was great. Was seated right away, great suggestions & service from Allison. She is sweet, attentive, & on her game. The bartender made my drink & it tasted beautifully (she had jet black hair & looks edgy yet dope) I had the matador. She even smiled & looked when i took my first sip. The second time the service was blah. But i watched as both came in to later shifts. I'll definitely be returning but only when both server & bartender combo is there!

resp.text: Antonia, thank you for the 4 star review! Hope to see you again.

text: Super nice bartenders and staff. Pretty clean, super chill love the outdoor seating and all the games, the music is always bumping lol. Only thing is they forgot my queso fresco on my elote 😔.

text: Had a send off for a buddy moving and wanted something safe and socially distanced, but fun.  Great time here and special thanks to Adam (manager) for all the help in making the evening great.  Aleigha & Becky were also extremely helpful, can't say enough nice things about them.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! Cheers.

resp.text: Thank you Nate for the 4 star review, would love to hear about the adjustments you suggest. Please email reid@elthrifty.com if you do not mind!

name: Ryan Warner
text: Good food, great drinks, live music, indoor & outdoor areas and tons of games to play! Fun on a weekday night if you're looking for a place to hang out with friends.

name: Debbie Smith
text: Atmosphere is pleasant.  Food and drinks were great.  Service was great.

name: The PreHab Company
text: Cool! Cool! Cool atmosphere! The staff is very attentive and welcoming! We had plenty to do while we were there and had a lot of fun!

name: Mimi Hsu
text:
This place is AMAZING!!! As soon as you walk in, the decor just took my breath away. It's exactly how I would design my restuarant (or house or any space I owned). It was spacious and the host was friendly. We were able to get seated right away. Due to covid, everyone wore masks and gloves and we were more separated from each other.
Ariel was our waitress and she was so sweet. She gave awesome recommendations on the food. We enjoyed white peach frozen sangria and El Matador cocktails. The guacamole and taquitos apps were to die for. It was all seasoned and prepped so well. We enjoyed the Al Pastor and Braised short rib tacos. Our fave was the short rib tacos. Delicious! I could've eaten about 5 of those!
They have a fantastic outdoor and indoor space. Great for just cocktails at the bar or parties.
They even have another room with duckpin bowling and pool tables and arcade games. I am definitely coming back here.

resp.text: Thank you Mimi! Great 5 star review. If you don’t mind  postIng that to yelp we will send you a gift card. Hope to see you back soon!

name: Laven Ramchandani
text: Mike the manager was very rude. I was drinking with my friend over whiskey. At first contact, he slams his hands on the table and in a rude tone say, finish up guys and leave. Not, hey thank you but we are closing but : *slam on table * finish up guys and leave. Nope. I'll even ask my friend not to come. We didn't do anything wrong. That was rude. Bartenders were nice. Not him

name: Tiffany Lee
text: Love the drinks, definitely the el Thrifty margarita and the Paloma. I always go on Tuesdays for $1 beef and chicken tacos. They're really good but small so order at least 5-6.

resp.text: Tiffany, thank you for the 5 star review! Hope to see you soon.

text: Terrible food! Do not recommend

name: Katie Nichols
text: This was my first time here and I loved it! I couldn’t believe how good the menu prices for drinks and food was. I got taquitos unlike any I’ve had before and the QUESO! 🙌🏻 I walked in wanting to take every piece of furniture home because the decor is so cute. We came here to celebrate a friends birthday and had so much fun playing games. Hopefully this becomes a regular spot for us.

resp.text: Katie, thank you for the 5 star review! Hope to see you soon.

text: Poppin on Sundays, even with social distancing. Lines a bit longer due to reduced capacity so show up early

My friend went to the bathroom next door and when I was going by their door to find him, the host opened the door and told me they still weren’t allowing us to come in and slammed the door (wasn’t even trying to go in).

name: Rhonda Sherman
text: Big patio space. Interesting tequila/mezcal cocktail options. Food was not great. Tacos were cold and had little filling. The Nashville Hot Chicken taco was anything but. There were only 2 tiny pieces of chicken and some lettuce.

resp.text: Hey Rhonda I am sorry we did not fulfill your expectations, we have addressed and will fix immediately.

name: Alicia Debnam
text: Place is good ... they proof good quality of ingredients with store codes )))) seriously food is NOT GOOD

name: Katie Adolph
text:
One of my all time favorite spots - end up there multiple times a week for any of their delicious drinks (especially the frozen ones), the soy basil wings are AMAZING and so are the Taquitos!
Trio dip and Flatbreads are tasty as well! Their $3 mimosas at Sunday brunch are keyy👌I love the outdoor vibes, great to chill or watch sports and those swings are my favee. Manager Jake is awesome and always helpful with anything we might need!

resp.text: Katie, thank you for the 5 star review! Hope to see you soon.

name: Charles A. III
text:
Disappointed...  There are some great things to say but many more negatives. Being that El Thrifty is in Optimist Hall, Charlotte's food hall with many outstanding food options. I fully expected great flavors and atmosphere. The main positive is the atmosphere. Other than that, the food was tasteless, small and outright dissatisfying.
I wont comment on staff since it is soft opening and mistakes and waits are expected at this point. (Still annoying however)
The pictures on Google are not from this location. They are from the Greenville location. That being said, this is the second location opened. Why is the food so bland if recipes are already tried and true?
Soft opening or not (only covers for operational and staffing flaws) the food should be up to par.
Meat was dry and tasteless. Ceviche was tasteless. Salsa was over salted. Torta was dry and flavorless. 4$ tacos have very little meat that tastes like nothing. Just all around very disappointing for our party and a $100 check. I would have rather went inside and ate Optimist Halls existing great food and came down to El Thrifty for drinks and games. We will not be returning for food.
Do yourself a favor and go for games/drinks not food.

resp.text: Charles, thank you for your feedback. We're sorry we didn't knock it out of the park for you on your recent visit. We'll pass your comments along to our chef and kitchen staff. We had a handful of photos from our sister restaurant to showcase our similar atmospheres. Now that construction is complete, we'll be uploading our own professional photos. If you have any more feedback, feel free to email our GM at drew@elthriftysocial.com. Thank you.

name: Liza Barroso
text: The ambiance is great and this place has tons of potential. The drinks are amazing. The food is mediocre, at best. The guacamole needs salt and lime juice. The salsa was not good at all. The cheese dip was fine. We ordered tacos and I couldn’t eat them. My husband even commented, “I’ve been married to you for 10 years and I have never seen you not eat your food at a restaurant”. Please keep in mind, we eat out 2-3 times per week. I want this place to succeed, I really do, but they are going to have to step up their food game. I strongly recommend they get a grip on real Mexican food. We will come back in a few months.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a review, Liza. We're constantly working to perfect our flavor, and we'll take your feedback as an opportunity to improve. We hope you'll give us another chance to impress you soon!

name: Brandon Winkler
text: Excellent vibe, totally feeling the decor. Was a bit apprehensive of the sanitation score at first, although upon my observations, everything met my stringent expectations. Our manager, Casey, was also the bartender, and he made awesome drinks.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a review, Brandon! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your recent visit to el Thrifty Social. We hope to see you back again soon!

name: Chris Wilson
text: Great place to relax and have a few drinks

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review! Cheers.

name: charles maxwell
text: Nice outside area..rate a 4 1/2

resp.text: Hola! Thank you for the 4.5 star review, see you back soon! Cheers.

name: Mark Andrews
text: Excellent bar staff and the best cocktails I've ever had. Seems like the most important member of the bar staff was a young brunette lady with bobbed hair. She had it going on and I left her an unusually large tip! (Megan I think)... Worth trying out.

resp.text: Cheers, Mark! Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent experience. We're happy to hear you enjoyed el Thrifty Social. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Matt Arnold
text: Has some of the best taquitos I've ever had. It's not the cheapest when it comes to food but they have a great environment. They have mini bowling, vitual golf, mini shuffle board and a couple more games. I come here for the food though because it is top notch.

resp.text: Matt, thank you for the 5 star review. We are taking the new government guidelines very seriously. It is our job to keep our staff and community safe as we navigate through these uncharted waters. I am glad you enjoyed your recent experience.

text: Server was super boring it was our first time barely explained the menu we had 1 12.99 drink and left...stars was for the drink

text: Good atmosphere and good drinks. The parking situation will likely deter me from coming here often. The last thing I want to do after a long day of work is to fight for a parking spot.

name: Mary Weston
text: I took a 6, 8, and 14 year old to dinner after school at el Thrifty yesterday around 4:30 pm. Once I saw the menu, I wasnt sure if it was kid friendly. I was pleasantly surprised. My kids loved the flavorful tacos. They shared a quesadilla, that according to my 8 year old, had the "most juiciest steak" in it. I had the Fried Chicken Salad but substituted with grill chicken and the most amazing blue cheese dressing.  Our server was knowledgeable and patient (as first timers). The manager, Adam, was very friendly and sought feedback. I can't wait to go back with my husband or girlfriends. The atmosphere looks great for adult fun and drinks!!!

resp.text: Hola, Thank you for the review! Come back again soon.

name: Ramon Jaquez
text: Friendly staff, good food, and great activities inside such as fooseball, air hockey and other games

resp.text: Ramon, thank you for the 5 star review. We are taking the new government guidelines very seriously. It is our job to keep our staff and community safe as we navigate through these uncharted waters. I am glad you enjoyed your recent experience.

text: Cozy place with good eats/drinks. I’m sure there’s going to be some minor fixes along the way (as it is brand new). The vibe is a good time with a nice setup that is not overwhelming, but enjoyable and inviting.

text: great place for drinks and fun and food!

resp.text: Cleve, thank you for the 5 star review! Hope to see you soon.

text: Space is great. Food is OK. I recommend the sandwiches (tortas) if you are hungry.

resp.text: Hey Philip sorry we did not exceed your expecationns, please give us another shot and I promise you will see improvement.

name: Julian Cortez

resp.text: Hey Julian thank you for the 5 star review. See you again, Cheers.

resp.text: Thank you for your review & recommendation, Will. So happy you enjoyed our drinks and food. Can't wait to have you back again soon!

name: Lilia Wu
text: Cool place to hang out with friends!!!!!

name: Lauren Teer
text:
Visited as part of a work social event. Got to sample several food items - the queso and guac were both great but the sleeper item was the wings! Very unique flavor and cooked perfectly. I understand they typically serve a dip trio and that + wings are reason enough to return. Chicken quesadilla was average as were the tacos but definitely no complaints food wise.

All the games were unlocked so we got to try out the mini bowling and the basketball games which were both lots of fun! Our drink options were limited to beer and wine so I can't speak for the cocktails but am very excited to give them a try!

Also - if you go when they're slow the chairs on the patio are the coolest. I want one in all aspects of my life - work, home etc.

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review, see you again!

name: Byrdy
text: I love El Thrifty!! One of the best locations in Charlotte to eat, drink and have a great time!!! I highly recommend this spot for sure!!!

resp.text: Cheers! Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent experience. We're happy to hear you enjoyed el Thrifty Social. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: Michael Bowman
text: All I have to say is no thank you to this place. I was intending on having a group of 15 join me here for birthday drinks and tacos, but clearly this operation isn’t ready for such a party. After calling on 3 separate occasions, over the course of 2 days, and speaking to 4 different employees including the GM, and getting hung up on by the rude lady answering the phones, I elected to take my business elsewhere. As an aside, RuRus has excellent tacos!

resp.text: Michael, thank you for your feedback. We're disappointed to hear about your recent experience and can assure you that this behavior you described does not meet our standards. We have addressed this issue with our staff to ensure this does not happen again. We hope that you will give us another chance to impress you, as we make every effort to improve.

name: Marco Mares
text: Poor service and bad food; menu was very limited... somewhat expensive for what you get.

resp.text: Marco, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We're disappointed to hear you were not pleased with your recent experience. We'll take your review as an opportunity to improve and hope we get a second chance to impress you!

name: Noah Weiss
text: Tasty food. Jackfruit torta was solid. Good service. Fun place

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review, see you again!

name: J. Irvin
text: Food was good. Clean environment. For family or adults.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, would love to hear how we can get 5 stars on your next visit.

name: carlos osorio
text: Another great date idea

resp.text: Hola! Thank you for the 5 star review, see you back soon! Cheers.

name: Carolyn Wiese
text:
Go for the environment, not for the food.

I went here with my husband for lunch on a Sunday. We were excited to try it out because we had heard that it was an interesting place. We ordered some beer, 4 tacos and the seasonal vegetables.

The beer was fine. Not a huge selection, but you could find something that you would like (even though they were out of two of their IPAs)

The tacos were mediocre. We had two al pastor tacos, a shrimp taco and a steak taco. The tortillas all fell apart as we were eating them. The shrimp was probably the best, but still not something I would go back to eat. The al pastor tasted like it was unseasoned chicken with pineapple sprinkled on it. The steak was chewy.
The seasoned veggies were just mushy zucchini and squash with some corn and a touch of aioli.

It looked like the games would have been fun, but the area with the bowling and everything was closed for a private party when we were there.

Overall, it’s a good concept for a fun night. It is not a place you seek out to eat at, especially with all of the great food stalls on the upper level of optimist hall.

resp.text: Carolyn, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We're disappointed to hear you were not pleased with your recent experience. We'll take your review as an opportunity to improve and hope we get a second chance to impress you!

name: andrew cofield
text: Great food fun atmosphere and games. Great service!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Andrew! We're so glad you enjoyed our atmosphere and games. Can't wait to have you back again soon!

name: Michael Ellis
text: They said this was 4 taquitos, but is it really just 2 small taquitos cut in half in disguise??? You be the judge. Reminiscent of frozen taquitos I’ve had at the store. The staff were great tho

resp.text: Michael, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We're disappointed to hear you were not pleased with your recent experience. We'll take your review as an opportunity to improve and hope we get a second chance to impress you.

name: wes thomas
text: Fun games, is a bit tight space-wise though.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us a review, Wes! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your recent visit to el Thrifty Social. We hope to see you back again soon!

name: Justine V
text: Loved the flavored margaritas.

resp.text: Justine, thank you for the 5 star review! Hope to see you again.

name: Rianna Schoenleber
text:
My first time here and I’m trying to be understanding that this has not been open for a long time. First impression? Very disorganized. We got here, the hostess at the front is the same that takes you to your table so you Ohhh arrive and there is nobody there in the front for you. We asked for outside area which some people get here and just take tables btw so we checked the game area and while playing air hockey and a guy who works here came and said “ for some reason this game is acting up and I keep turning off but people here keep turning up so please unplug when you finish” ... like, no signage there at all and then asking us to go and unplug while other stuff was plugged into the same device? No thanks. Okay, we sat down... drinks are really good here. We got chips, salsa and queso and we shared a chicken torta. The chips came and had a hair on it, queso was so salty I couldn’t finish... also, no silverware and no napkins were provided so my husband had to pick it up for us. Guess what? We paid for the salty queso and the hairy chips.

P.S: the table in front of us just got uncooked chicken.

resp.text: Rianna, thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your patience during our soft opening phase. We're sorry for your troubles on your recent visit. If you have any more feedback, please email our GM Drew at drew@elthriftysocial.com to discuss. Thank you.

name: Michael Brown
text: Great food, friendly staff even better atmosphere!

resp.text: Cheers, Michael! Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your recent experience. We're happy to hear you enjoyed el Thrifty Social. We look forward to serving you again soon!

name: joshua friday
text:
Overpriced for sure
And I guess I got lucky and ended with the rude bartender 🤷🏾‍♂️
Looks cool though

resp.text: Hey Joshua can you respond to info@elthriftysocial.com with your contact information?

name: Jamal Payne
text: Amazing place!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review, see you again!

name: Bill Aird
text: Drinks and Atmosphere

resp.text: Hey Bill thank you for the 5 star review. See you again, Cheers.
Thank you for your review! Can't wait to have you back again soon.

Hola! Thank you for the 5 star review, see you back soon! Cheers.
Hola thank you for the 5 star review!

Hey Marino thank you for the 5 star review. See you again, Cheers.
Destiny, thank you for the 5 star review! Hope to see you again.
Hey Jonathan thank you for the 5 star review. See you again, Cheers.
Thanks for leaving us a review, Brad! We're happy to hear you enjoyed your recent visit to el Thrifty Social. We hope to see you back again soon!
Colby I am sorry we did not exceed the hype. Can you please contact me at mike@elthriftysocial.com so we can remedy the experience.

Thank you for the 5 star review, see you again!
